Nimb gunap yip niŋem, bi yikop rek ayip ak pen; niŋrep ginimimb. Nimb Krays ker mindpim rek chin kunep mindpun.
Biyomb ak nep chinup woŋg aŋgayek, biynimb gok kuyip kond mindpun apiyn ak, yimb nuk key dand aranjap aŋgniŋgambim ak pen, yip nambiŋ ma giniŋgamb. Pen woŋg aŋgek gipun kun ak; biynimb gok kuyip aŋgem apyap pikniŋgiy aŋgiy ma aŋgak; kuyip aŋgem mindrep giniŋgiy aŋgiy chinup aŋgek gipun.
Pen nimbip minj tikyokpiyn gok niŋiy, piriknimimb aŋgiy ma yokpiyn.
Biynimb gunap yip apay, “Nuk par okok mindiy, minj nep tikyokiy, minim kilis yimb aŋgip ak pen; biy apek niŋon, biyomb minim apay rek ma aŋgip apay.”
Pen biynimb kun apay kun gok niŋmindeniŋgiy. Chin amjakiy, ar bap key ma giniŋgambun; par akniy mindiy, minj tikiy apun rek nep giniŋgambun.
Pen biynimb, chin yomb yimb mindpun apay kun gok; kiyk yomb mindpay akaŋ, chin yomb mindpun aŋgiy piyow niŋun aŋgon, chinup jel ma gip. Kiyk apay, “Chin gipun ar ak nep yipund gip, chin nep biynimb tep yimb; biynimb maŋgiysek kayaŋ rek mindpay apay.” Apay kun ak mindrep giy ma apay.
Pen chin Gor woŋg ak tep gipun akaŋ, minim kun ak rek aŋgniŋg, biynimb gunap woŋg geyak, chin ap yikop ar koyoŋ ginuk ak sek, ma aŋgniŋgambun; Gor chinup bilok ayek key gipun ak nep aŋgniŋgambun.
Nimbip nen, Gor chinup aŋgek, chin nind nep amiy minim tep aŋgñonuk; nup ker mindpim minim ak aŋgniŋgambun.
Biynimb gunap miñmon nimb ak am kiñiŋ giy woŋg gey, chin ar okok apiy, miñmon biy Gor woŋg ak chin gipun aŋgiy ma aŋgniŋgambun. Pen chinup tep giniŋgamb ak; nimb Gor nup chiŋgrep yimb giy mey, woŋg chinup aŋgayak ak, nimb yip gon amrep giniŋgamb.
Kisen mey nimbip silawiy, am miñmon nind ma aŋgñiyak kondoŋ okok amiy, kuyip minim tep ak aŋgñiniŋgambun. Pen chin bi gunap gipay rek, yimb yomb dun aŋgiy, bi gunap woŋg giniŋgambay ar ak chin gipun aŋgiy, ma aŋgniŋgambun; key gipun ak nep aŋgniŋgambun.
Pen Baybol buk ak tikiy aŋgyak, “Biynimb miñmiñ giniŋg, Biyomb ak kuyip gek minim ma mindip ak niŋiy, miñmiñ giniŋgiy aŋgyak.”
Yenen: Biyomb chin ak biynimb key tep giniŋgamb gok ma diniŋgamb; biynimb nuk niŋek minim ma mindip gok diniŋgamb.
Yand sakiy minim rek aŋgniŋgayn ak pen, minim kiñiŋ mindakniŋ aŋgniŋg gispiyn.
Gor nimbip wasemb ayip rek, yand kunep gipiyn. Nimbip biyn piñ mindrep giy bi nokom diniŋg gek, dam bi kun ak nup ñinik. Bi kun ak mey Krays.
Pen yand pirikpiyn ak; nind yimb yimb siyŋ ak tom gek, Yiyp niŋdak rek, biynimb gunap nimbip kunep minim yesek gok aŋg dand amey, gos kiyk niŋbay rek niŋiy, Krays nup gosimb nokom niŋiy direp gipim ak, kirginimimb rek ayip.
Yenen: nimb kuyip tip ñem, Jiysis chin ak nup minim aŋgñimbun ak ma apay; Jiysis bap key rek minim ak aŋgñey, monmon dispim. Pen Gor Kawnan ak sek, minim tep ak sek kunep, key kisenimb bap rek ak dispim.
Pen yand niŋen, bi Jiysis minim dand amemb nimbik kun gok biyomb; yand bi tam okok rek ma mindpiyn.
Minim kiyk ak, yindik yimb apay ak pen, yand apiyn rek niŋrep giy ma apay. Chin nimbip per niŋrep giy nep, aŋgñimbun ak niŋrep gipim!
Pen nimbip Gor minim tep aŋgñinik ak; bi gunap gipay rek, pen tap gunap ñinimimb aŋgiy ma aŋgnik. Ginik kun ak, yip bi tam okok bap aŋgiy niŋbim?
Nimbip woŋg giniŋg genik, Gor ker mindpay biynimb tiŋgoŋ gunap, yip maniy tap gunap ñiyak.
Nimb yip mindenik ñin ak, tap nimbip bap ma dinik; mam ay Masedoniya nimb wiyak gok nep, tap yip yerip tikdak gok dap ñiyak. Kisen kunep, tap nimbip gunap ma aŋgniŋniŋgayn.
Nimb Akaya propens mindpim gok, tap nimbip ma dipiyn rek, aŋgyiŋg nep mindeniŋgayn. Krays binuk mindpiyn rek, niŋind yimb aspiyn.
Pen apiyn kun ak, nimbip yiruk niŋiy ma aspiyn. Gor niŋimb: nimbip wasemb yimb aypiyn.
Pen maniy tap nimbip gok ma nep don, bi Jiysis minim dand amemb mindpun aŋgiy nimbip tom gipay gok, chin gipun rek nep gipay aŋgiy, aŋgniŋgiy rek ma ayniŋgamb.
Bi minim yesek aŋgñimbay kun gok, Jiysis woŋg gispun aŋgiy tom gipay ak; niŋind kun gipay. Yenen: ñin gunap nop kiyk Seytan kunep; Gor enjol melik tep nuk bap rek silok ay wip.
<range>
Kun ak bi nup woŋg gipay gok, bi suŋ-tep rek silok ay apey, gos yomb ma niŋjun. Pen gipay kun ak, Gor kuyip yerer giniŋgamb ak, giy diniŋgambay.
Yand tip ak aspiyn: nimb gunap yip bi sakiy aŋgiy, ma niŋnimimb. Pen yip bi sakiy aŋgiy niŋniŋgambim ak, yip kirgem; bi sakiy gok, yimb kiyk key dand aranimbay rek minim gunap aŋgnim.
Pen minim kun biy Biyomb ak gos ñimb rek ma aŋgniŋg gispiyn; bi sakiy ayek, yimb key dand aranimbay rek aŋgniŋg gispiyn.
Bi gunap gos key niŋiy, yimb kiyk key dand aranimbay ak, yand kunep ginim.
Yenen: nimb gos niŋrep yimb gipim rek, bi sakiy gok minim aŋgey, nimbip yiruk ma gip.
Bi yesek aŋgiy, nimbip lipiŋg dand amiy, maniy tap nimbip gok diyiŋg, nimbip monmon giyiŋg, yimb yomb dipay gok; nimbip tep gip.
Pen yand bi tam okok mindpiyn ak, nimb yip mindiy, tap nimbip gunap ma dinik. Pen sakiy minim rek aspiyn ak, yimb kiyk key dand aranimbay rek, yand kunep giniŋgayn.
Kiyk Hiybriw biynimb? Yand kunep Hiybriw bap. Kiyk Yisrel biynimb? Yand kunep Yisrel bap. Kiyk Ebraham kiñiŋ bap? Yand kunep Ebraham kiñiŋ ak mindpiyn.
Kiyk Krays nup woŋg gipay? Yand bi sakiy rek yimb key dand aranjipiyn ak pen; kiyk yand woŋg kilis giy, miker ar keykey dipiyn rek ma gipay. Yip ñin kuŋaynep, kalambis ayak. Ñin kuŋaynep tapin pikyak. Ñin kuŋaynep kumdam namb ay winik.
Jiwda kay yip ñin keykey anep mamind ak, miñ diy yinj ñin jiwiy, andikiy jiy piskind ak pikyak.
Rom kay kunep yip ñin keykey omiŋal nokom, kur diy pikyak. Ñin bap biynimb kuŋaynep, yip kamb jiw pikyak. Siyip taŋgenik; ñin keykey minek omiŋal nokom, siyip ak pisnep paŋg pikek amdak. Siyip timey gak ñin kun gok, minek bap tap day band bap chichiy diy, ñiŋg kas ar ak aran apyan gi minden minden, pumb saŋind amiy, kisyim apiy, miñmon yowak.
Per miñmon kumemb rek namb okok taŋgyiŋg, ñiŋg wilik gok tikpiyn; bi biynimb pikay tap kuyip siy dipay namb okok tapiyn; biynimb yand Jiwda yipund giy akaŋ, Jiwda mer namb okok girapiyn; biynimb mam ay apay ak pen, Krays ker ma mindpay namb okok akaŋ, dawin yomb okok akaŋ, solwara namb okok akaŋ, saŋgiy okok akaŋ giraŋgiy per mey kumbiyn.
Woŋg kosyam giy, wisin ma kiniy, chech ma mindiy, keñmaŋgiy ma mindiy, yiwan giy, ñiŋg nen giy, takil giy gip.
Pen miker bap mey, biynimb Krays ker mindpay miñmon keykey okok, mindrep gispay akaŋ aŋgiy gos yomb ak niŋbiyn.
Krays biynimb nuk gunap apyap pikniŋg gey, gos yomb yimb niŋbiyn. Pen biynimb gunap kuyip gey apyap pikpay ak niŋen timey yimb gip.
Biynimb gunap chin biynimb yomb kalrimey mindpun aŋgiy, tep gakniŋ yimb dand aranimbay ak pen; yand miñ ar kun ak ma giniŋgayn; bi tep ma mindpiyn rek, tep gakniŋ mindeniŋgayn.
Jiysis Krays Nop Gor, Biyomb pernep yimb dand aranemb ak, yand yesek ma apiyn ak niŋimb.
Yand dawin yomb Damaskas mindenik, kiyŋ Areytas binuk aŋgayek Damaskas kond mindyiŋgip ak, yip kalambis ayin aŋgiy, poliys nuk gok aŋgek, kinjeŋram okok maŋgiysek tikyak.
Kun giyak ak pen; mam chin gunap yip di wand yomb miŋgan ak ay, miñ tiwniŋgiy, kamb wariy kus kus giyak wiyndiw miŋgan ak lipiŋg yokey, am am man biyaŋ amiy, pirik amninik.
Yimb yand key dand aranen tep ma giniŋgamb ak pen; Biyomb chin ak, bi bap nup gek day niŋak minim ak, aŋgniŋg aŋgniŋgayn.
Wosrey bi yand niŋep rek Krays nup chiŋgrep gak bap, Gor dand miñmon tep semb biyoŋ amnak. Gak kun ak, miñiy simiy yin yin ayip wanjrem piskind ak. Pen bi kun ak mumbwak sek kun biyoŋ amnak akaŋ, mumbwak kirgiy Kawnan nep amnak akaŋ, ma niŋbiyn; Gor nep niŋimb.
Minim ar kun anep tip aspiyn. Nup dand miñmon tep biyoŋ amnak ak pen; mumbwak sek akaŋ, mumbwak kirgiy kawnan nep amnak akaŋ, ma niŋbiyn; Gor nuk nep niŋimb.
Pen kun biyoŋ amiy, key yimb mindek ak niŋak. Key yimb gak kun ak, biynimb aŋgñemb rek ma ayak.
Bi bap nup gak kun ak rek aŋgniŋgayn ak pen; yimb key dand aranbinip ak, tep ma gipkop. Minim yand key aŋgniŋg; bi kilis ma mindiy, kosyam mindpiyn rek nep aŋgniŋgayn.
Yimb key dand aranemb minim gunap ma mindek ma aspiyn. Pen biynimb gunap yip niŋiy, ak bi tep key mindip aŋgey, yip tep ma gipkop. Yip tep gip ak, gipiyn gipiyn rek niŋiy akaŋ, minim apiyn rek niŋiy, bi yerip rek mindpiyn ak key niŋniŋgiy.
Yenen: Gor yip dand biyoŋ amnak kun ak, biynimb gunap ma niŋyak, yand nep niŋnik rek, yimb yand key dand aranim rek ayek, Gor yip tap miker ñemb bap ñimb. Tap kun ak Seytan ker apiy, yip ñiw rek pinjikyiŋg mindip.
Biyomb ak nup ñin omiŋal nokom aŋgniŋiy, yip kun gisap rek ma ginimuŋ aŋgnik ak pen;
yip aŋgak, “Biynimb gok, keynep mindiy, mindrep giniŋgiy rek ma ayip ak niŋrep giy mey; kuyip simb niŋiy kond mindnikniŋ mindeniŋgambay. Kun ak gos yomb ma niŋnimin aŋgak.” Kun aŋgak ak, yimb key dand aranemb ak yip tep ma gip. Yip tep gip ak mey: bi tep ma mindpiyn rek aŋgniŋ minden, yip direp giyiŋg mindonimuŋ.
Kun ak Krays ker mindpiyn rek; yip aŋgjiwpay akaŋ, timey gipay akaŋ, kosyam mindiy mindrep ma gipiyn akaŋ, yip yerer gek, yand miñmiñ yimb gipiyn. Yenen kilis yand ma mindip ñin ak, Gor yip kond mindrep gip ak mey, kilis yimb giy mindenim rek ayip.
Pen yand bi sakiy rek yimb key dand aranbiyn ak, nimb nep gem kun gipiyn. Yip diy, minim tep gunap apkip ak pen; yip kirgiy, bi gunap kuyip diy, minim kuyip ak dipim. Yand bi tam okok mindpiyn ak pen; kiyk biyomb yand bi sikoy aŋgiy ma niŋbiyn.
Nimb yip mindiy, nimbip direp yimb giy, chin bi Jiysis minim dand amemb gok gipun rek, gon amek, Gor tap gep magep gok keykey gek niŋbik.
Kun ak biynimb Krays ker mindpay wikan gunap kuyip, ginik ginik rek nimbip kunep gipiyn ak pen; ar nokom bap nep key gipiyn rek ayip. Ar kun ak mey: tap yip tikdak gok, yip ñim aŋgiy ma aŋgnik. Nimb niŋem; nimbip timey ginik mey, ar kun ak rek ayip. Pen nimbip tep ma ginik kun ak, niŋiy kirginimimb.
Nimbip nind ñin omiŋal am niŋnik, miñiy tip ak niniŋg gispiyn. Tap nimbip bap diniŋg ma niniŋgayn; nimbip nen aŋgiy niniŋgayn. Nop nonim sikop tap dayrep giy mey, ñapan nuk sikop kuyip yimaŋgiypay. Pen ñapan kiyk gok, nop nonim sikop kuyip kun ma gipay.
Kun ak gos yand niŋbiyn ak, nimbip nen minim tep ak aŋgñi dand amiy, maniy tap yand gok maŋgiysek yokdiniŋgayn akaŋ, kumniŋgayn ak; minim ma mindip. Pen nimbip wasemb yimb aypiyn ak niŋiy, yip pen niŋem yiruk yiruk gip?
Akaŋ pen, maniy tap chinup gok ma dip rek, kisen yesek aŋg dand amiy, tap chinup gok diniŋgamb aŋgiy niŋbim?
Nimbip bi akay rek yokiy, tap nimbip gok windin windin ay dinik?
Taytas nup yokniŋg, mam chin bap sek nimbip ker yoknik. Pen yand niŋbiyn: Taytas tap nimbip gunap yesek aŋgiy ma dak. Nuk ar bap key ma giniŋgamb; yand gipiyn ar ak nep giniŋgamb.
Pen mam ay sikop. Pol bi gok minim aspay ak, yimb chinup ma apyownimuŋ aŋgiy aspay aŋgniŋgambim ak pen; chin Krays ker mindiy, Gor niŋmindakniŋ, nimb Gor nup nep chiŋgrep ginimimb aŋgiy aspun.
Yand pirikpiyn ak; am nimbip niŋniŋgayn ñin ak, gipim rek niŋen, yip tep ma giniŋgamb. Penpen aŋgiy, miluk niŋiy, tap gok chin nep dinjun aŋgiy, monmon giy, minim timey aŋgiy, biynimb gok kuyip minim diy, yimb key dand araniy, asik keykey ay gi mindenimimb rek ayip.
Pen gos bap niŋbiyn ak; kayaŋ amiy niŋniŋgayn; nimb gunap yenen kun gipun aŋgiy ma kirgiy, biyn siy bi siy giy, monmon ginep mindeniŋgambim. Giniŋgambim kun ak Gor niŋimb aŋgiy, yand bi tam okok rek mindiy, nambiŋ gakniŋ, nimbip nen siy aŋg mindeniŋgayn.
Yand nimbip am ñin omiŋal niŋnik; miñiy pen tip ak niniŋg gispiyn. Baybol buk ak tikiy aŋgyak, “Biynimb gunap timey gipay aŋgeniŋgiy, biynimb omiŋal akaŋ, omiŋal nokom rek niŋmindey giniŋgamb ak; niŋind apay aŋgiy, minim aŋgem tep giniŋgamb aŋgyak.”
Kun ak menikarik namb siŋak nimbip am niŋiy, biynimb timey giyak gok kuyip giniŋgayn rek, aŋgrep giy winik. Miñiy tip ak biynimb nind timey giyak gok sek, miñiy timey gispay gok sek aspiyn; amjakiy kuyip simb ma niŋniŋgayn.
Pen nimb Pol Krays yip mindip akaŋ, mer aŋgiy niŋbim gok, niŋrep ginimimb. Krays tap gunap miñmon nimbip okok gek niŋbik ak, nuk bi yikop mer; nuk Bi kalrimey yimb.
Nuk bi yikop rek tikiy, mon kiros bak biyoŋ kumak ak pen; nuk Gor yip mindip rek, tip ak tikjakiy kim mindip. Kun ak rek, chin bi minim nup dand amemb mindpun gok. Bi yikop rek mindpun ak pen; Gor kilis ak dipun rek, nimbip aŋgiy woŋg gipun.
Kun ak nimb key gos niŋem amiy apiy gek, Krays nup chiŋgipun akaŋ, mer aŋgiy niŋnimimb. Pen yand niŋbiyn ak, Krays nimb yip nep mindip. Akaŋ pen, nimb gunap gos kun ak niŋem amiy apiy gek, nup ker ma mindpim ak niŋbim.
Pen yip tep gip ak, Gor nimbip gos tep ñek mey; yand bi yerip rek mindpiyn ak niŋrep giniŋgambim.
Chin nimbip nen, Gor nup aŋgniŋiy apun, “Kuyip kond mindenimin, timey ar ak ma giniŋgiy apun.” Pen nup aŋgniŋbun kun ak; mindrep gem yimb chinup aranimuŋ aŋgiy, ma aŋgniŋbun. Yimb chin yowniŋgamb ak tap yikop; Gor niŋek mindrep giniŋgambim ak tap yomb yimb.
Pen Gor nup woŋg giñimbun rek, minim yipul yimb nuk ak yomb ginimuŋ ar ak giniŋgambun; yesek ar ak ma giniŋgambun.
Nimb Gor nup chiŋgrep giy mindem, chin amjakiy, nimbip niŋon tep gek, minim kilis ma aŋgjun. Kun ak Gor nup aŋgniŋiy, kuyip kond mindenimin, nip chiŋgrep yimb giniŋgiy apun.
Ar kun anep, yand paryomb akniy mindiy, nimbip minj tikyoksipiyn. Nimb minj kun ak niŋiy, Gor nup chiŋgrep giy mindem mey, yand amjakiy, minim kilis aŋgniŋg niŋbiyn ak kirginiŋgayn. Gor yip aŋgek woŋg nup gipiyn rek, minim kilis gunap aŋgniŋg aŋgniŋgayn. Pen yip woŋg aŋgayak kun ak, nimbip apyap pikim aŋgiy ma aŋgniŋgayn; mindrep gim aŋgiy aŋgniŋgayn.
Mam ay sikop. Miñiy minim aŋgjiwniŋg, “Nimb mindem” aspiyn. Minim aŋgen asaw ak niŋiy, Gor nup chiŋgrep giy, minim aŋg ar nokom ay, mindrep ginimimb. Kun gem mey, Biyomb biynimb wasemb ay direp gip ak, nimb yip nep mindeniŋgamb.
Nimbip tep gakniŋ, mam ay Krays ker mindpay gunap yip, ñin piksaknimimb.
Biynimb Gor ker mindpay akniy nimbip, “Mindpim?” apay.
Yand Pol, bi Jiysis minim dand amemb ak mindpiyn. Pen woŋg gipiyn kun ak, biynimb gunap aŋgey akaŋ, gos yand key niŋiy ma gipiyn; Jiysis Krays sek, Nop nup gek tikjakak ak sek kiyk apiymiŋay nep aŋger gipiyn.
Chin mam ay Krays ker mindpun akniy, nimbip mam ay Krays ker Galesiya propens mindpim gok, “Nimb mindpim?” aspun.
Bapiy yomb chin apiymiŋay ak nimbip simb niŋiy kond minder, mindrep ginimimb.
Tap siy tap timey gach ak, chinup pisnep timey ginimuŋ rek ayek, Nop Ñinuk nup ginimuŋ aŋgak rek, chinup di Nop yip jimñiniŋg kumek mey, biynimb tap siy tap timey giyiŋg nep mindpay gok yip, yiwur yomb ma diniŋgambun.
Kun ak Nop nup yimb ak, pernep dand aranjun. Tep.
Yand gos kuŋay yimb niŋsipiyn. Gor chinup simb niŋiy Jiysis nup aŋgek, chinup nen kumak ak pen, per mindiy mer; minim tep kun ak kirgiy, minim kisen dand wiyak bap key niŋniŋg gispim.
Minim kun ak, Jiysis Krays minim tep ak mer: yikop biynimb gunap apiy, minim yesek ak nimbip aŋgey, niŋniŋg gispim.
Krays minim tep nimbip aŋgñinuk ak, minim niŋind yimb ak aŋgñinuk. Pen chin key akaŋ, enjol semb biyoŋ nimb gunap apiy, minim yesek okok nimb gunap yiŋgoŋg giy aŋgniŋgambun ak, mon key yinjap ak amniŋg, mey kun aŋgniŋgambun.
Minim kun ak nimbip tip aspiyn. Bi gunap ap nimbip minim yesek okok nimb gunap yiŋgoŋg giy aŋgniŋgambay ak, mon key yinjap ak amniŋgiy.
Yimb yip ak dand aranyaŋ aŋgiy ma aspiyn; Gor nup yimb ak dand aranyaŋ aŋgiy aspiyn. Biynimb gok yip kindik giyaŋ aŋgiy ma aspiyn. Yenen, yand kun giy apnip ak; bi minim yesek aŋgep bap rek mindiy; Krays nup woŋg giñemb bi ak ma mindembinip.
Mam ay sikop. Yand nimbip niŋind aspiyn. Minim tep nimbip aŋgnik ak, biynimb nep aŋgey niŋiy akaŋ, gos yand key niŋiy ma aŋgnik; Jiysis Krays yip gos ñek, nimbip aŋgñinik.
<range>
Pen yand giyiŋgipiyn ar ak, nimb niŋbim. Jiysis nup minim ak ma diy, basind sikop minim ak diy, kilis yimb giyiŋgipiyn. Bi Jiwda yand yip yomb ginuk gok kuyip tawsak ay, Jiysis nup chiŋgyak biynimb gok kuyip, gi timey yimb giyiŋgipiyn.
<range>
Pen amiy yip ma tikak ñin ak, Gor Biyomb biynimb simb niŋiy dip ak, yip diniŋgayn aŋgiy niŋak. Kisen yip tikey yomb gen, Gor yip simb niŋiy diniŋg niŋayak ñin ak apek,
Ñiyand Jiysis; Pol nup yomen niŋrep giy, kisen biynimb Jiwda mer gok kuyip, minim tep yip ak aŋgñirep giniŋgamb aŋgiy, Ñinuk nup yip yomek niŋrep ginik. Kun gek, Jiysis minim ak yergiy rek mindip aŋgiy, biynimb gunap ma aŋgniŋnik.
Bi Jiysis minim dand amemb Jerusalem mindeyak gok kuyip, niŋniŋg ma amninik. Yikop miñmon paryomb Areybiya am mindiy, andkind ap miñmon Damaskas mindyiŋgipiyn.
Simiy omiŋal nokom yinek, Piyta Jerusalem mindek ak niŋniŋg amiy, nund yip ñin kuŋay ma mindenik; yikop ñin onep anjip piskind ak mindenik.
Pen yand bi Jiysis minim dand amemb gunap ma niŋnik; Piyta yip, Jiysis numam Jemis yip kuyip nep niŋnik.
Minim tiksipiyn kun biy, Gor niŋmindip ak, nimbip niŋind yimb aspiyn.
Pen kisen miñmon Siyriya amiy, miñmon Siyliysiya amiy ginik.
Ñin kun ak, Jiwdiya biynimb Krays ker mindeyak miñmon sikoy keykey okok, yip miseŋ ma niŋyak;
yikop biynimb gunap minim yip ak yiŋg dand amiy, bi Jiysis nup minim ak aŋgjiwiy, chinup gi timey giyiŋgip ak, miñiy Jiysis minim tep ak biynimb okok kuyip aŋgñirasap aŋgey niŋiy;
Gor nup yimb ak dand aranyak.
Pen mind dand amiy, simiy ak yin wanjrem piskind ak ayek, Jiwda bi gunap miñmon Antiyok nimb apiy, biynimb Jiwda mer Jiysis minim aŋgñenik nup gosimb niŋyak gok kuyip, yesek aŋgiy aŋgyak, “Nimb chin Jiwda kumbak tikpun rek tikiy, tap yerip yerip asikpun gok asikrep giy mey, Gor biynimb nuk yimb mindeniŋgambim aŋgyak.” Minim aŋgyak kun ak niŋen yipund ma gek, Gor yip gos ñek, mam Banabas yip, Taytas yip kuyip poŋind Jerusalem amninuk. Amiy, biyomb Jiysis nup niŋyak gok yip, am wikan bap bisgiy, kiy yerip rek aŋgniŋgiy aŋgiy; kuyip aŋgnik, “Biynimb Jiwda mer gok kuyip Jiysis minim tep ak aŋgñimbiyn; pen Jiwda kumbak tikep minim ar ak sek, tap yerip yerip asik mosik gipay minim ak sek kuyip ma aŋgñimbiyn aŋgnik.” Kun aŋgen, yip pen ma aŋgyak. Pen yand am kuyip niŋnik ñin kun ak, am kiy yip mindiy, minim aŋgrep ma giniŋgambun ak; Jiwda biynimb gok ap minim yomb aŋgey, Gor woŋg gipiyn ak pisnep yowniŋgamb aŋgiy niŋnik.
<range>
Bi yand Taytas, nuk Jiwda mer: bi Griyk nimb ak pen, bi Jiwda gunap Jiysis Krays binuk yimb rek ay, kapkap ap chin yip wilikiy aŋgyak, “Taytas kumbak tikiy, chin Jiwda biynimb gipun ar ak nep ginimuŋ aŋgyak.” Kun aŋgey, chin minim kun ak aŋg amiy apiy giy, minim yand ak niŋind ayek, kumbak ma tikniŋgamb aŋgnuk. Pen chin Jiysis nup chiŋgiy mindrep gipun rek niŋey, kuyip tep ma gek; kirgiy, chin low keykey apun rek giyaŋ aŋgiy, ap minim yesek kun ak aŋgyak.
<range>
Yand nimbip biynimb Jiwda mer gok gos niŋiy, Jiysis minim niŋind yimb ak nep diniŋgiy aŋgiy, minim kiyk aŋgyak ak ma nep dinuk.
Piyta, Jemis, bi gok rek, biyomb aŋgniŋgambun ak pen; Gor niŋek chin nep kuyip kun aŋgniŋgambun. Pen biyomb kun gok, biynimb gok kuyip kun kun giy aŋgñinimin aŋgiy, yip ma aŋgyak. Yand Jiysis minim aŋgñimbiyn rek niŋiy aŋgyak, “Mey aŋgip ak aŋgyak.”
Kiyk niŋyak: Gor Piyta nup kond mindek, bi Jiysis minim dand amemb ak mindiy, Jiwda biynimb gok kuyip aŋgñiraŋgip rek; yip kunep kond mindek, bi minim nup dand amemb ak mindiy, biynimb Jiwda mer gok kuyip aŋgñirapiyn.
Kun ak niŋiy mey aŋgyak, “Gor Piyta nup kond mindakniŋ, Jiwda biynimb okok kuyip aŋgñiraŋgip rek, Pol nup kunep kond mindakniŋ, am biynimb Jiwda mer gok kuyip aŋgñiraŋgip aŋgyak.”
Jemis, Piyta, Jon kuyipyakam biyomb apay ak pen; kiykyakam nep, Gor yip woŋg kun ak aŋgayek niŋyak rek; woŋg chin ar nokom gipun aŋgiy, Banabas chirup ñin piksakyak. Kun giy minim aŋg ar nokom ay aŋgnuk, “Banabas chir biynimb Jiwda mer gok kuyip Gor minim aŋgñiniŋgambur; nimb Jiwda biynimb gok kuyip aŋgñinimimb aŋgnuk.”
Pen kiyk minim nokom bap aŋgiy aŋgyak, “Am miñmon kun okok taŋgiy, biynimb Jiysis nup dipay gok kuyip aŋgenimiyr; biynimb simbgeprek miñmon Jiwda biy mindpay gok kuyip sakiy ma giy, kuyip maniy gunap ñiniŋgiy aŋgyak.” Minim aŋgyak kun ak, yip tep gak ar ak nep aŋgyak.
Pen kisen miñmon Antiyok am mindonuk ñin ak, Piyta apiy, ar kun ak key gek, nup miseŋ aŋg ginik.
Yenen: nuk nind biynimb Jiwda mer namb okok mindiy, biynimb Jiysis nup chiŋgyak gok yip, tap jimñiy ñimbyiŋgip. Pen Jemis binuk gunap Jerusalem nimb wiyak gok yip aŋgniŋgambay, “Yenen bi kumbak ma tikpay gok yip tap ñimbsap aŋgniŋgambay” aŋgiy pirikiy, Jiwda mer gok yip tap ma ñiŋak.
Kun gek, Jiwda biynimb nind jiw am miñmon kun okok mindeyak gok, yesek gak kun ak niŋiy, kunep giyak. Pen mam Banabas kunep niŋiy, kiyk giyak ar kun ak kindik gak.
Pen Jiysis minim tep ak kun giy kirgeyak, biynimb gok niŋmindyakniŋ, Piyta nup aŋgnik, “Nand bi Jiwda nimb ak pen, biynimb Jiwda mer gok rek mindyiŋgipan. Pen miñiy yenen key asik ay, biynimb Jiwda mer gok, chin Jiwda kay gipun gipun rek ginimimb aŋgiy aspan aŋgnik?”
Chin Jiwda biynimb yipund giy gok, biynimb yikop gok rek ma mindpun ak mey;
chin niŋbun: low minim ar ak gon amek, Gor niŋek biynimb suŋ-tep nuk gok ma mindeniŋgambun. Chin biynimb Jiysis Krays chinup nen kumak aŋgiy, nup gosimb niŋbun gok nep biynimb suŋ-tep nuk gok mindpun. Pen biynimb low minim ar ak gey amniŋgamb gok, biynimb suŋ-tep yand aŋgiy ma aŋgniŋgamb.
Pen nimb gunap aŋgniŋgambim, “Chin Jiwda biynimb Krays chinup aŋgiy kumak rek, suŋ-tep mindonjun aŋgiy,” low minim ar ak niŋiy, tap kilrimey gipay gok kirginiŋgambun ak; Jiwda mer gok Gor nup kirpay rek ak giniŋgambun. Ar kun ak Krays nep gek, timey giniŋgambun aŋgniŋgambim ak pen; ak mer.
Chin key Gor minim ak timbrikpun. Krays nup diy, won ak pen nup kirgiy, chin Jiwda biynimb low minim ak tip kisen giyiŋg, tap kilrimey giyiŋgipun ar ak amiy, minim nup ak timbrikniŋgambun.
Yand low minim ak niŋdand amiy, mindrep ginim rek ma ayek, ar kun ak pisnep kirgiy, Jiysis nup diy mey; Gor yip tapiyn.
Gor Ñinuk yip simb niŋiy kumak ak nup chiŋgiy mey; nuk kumak ak, yand yip kumruk rek ayip. Kun ak low minim tap kilrimey ginimimb aŋgyiŋgipay gok kirgiy, nup chiŋgiy mey; mindyiŋgipiyn rek ma mindpiyn: miñiy kim yimb mindiy, nup gosimb niŋyiŋg, yip gos ñimb ar ak nep gipiyn.
Pen low minim ak nep niŋiy, Gor biynimb nuk mindombinup rek aŋgep, Nop aŋgek Krays chinup nen ma kumbikop. Low minim ar ak giy, Gor yip jimñiy mindonjun rek ma ayek, chinup simb niŋiy, Ñinuk nup aŋgek apiy, chinup nen kumak. Kun ak yand minim tep nup chinup nen kumak ak, ma kirginiŋgayn.
Galesiya biynimb. Nimbip sakiy ayip akaŋ yergip? Chin Jiysis Krays nup mon kiros bak biyoŋ ñaŋgbirikyak minim tep ak, aŋgñirep gon niŋbik ak pen; yergek apim, “Low minim kilrimey giyiŋgipay rek nep giy, biynimb nuk mindoniŋgambun apim?”
Pen yand nimbip minim nokom bap aŋgniŋsipiyn. Nimb nind yerer gem, Gor Kawnan nuk ak nimbip yokak? Low minim ak niŋem nimbip ma yokak; minim tep nimbip aŋgñinuk ak nep niŋem, nimbip yokak.
Gor Kawnan ak nup diy mey, biynimb suŋ-tep nuk gok mindpim ak pen, miñiy sakiy ayek, chin key kilrimey giy, mindrep giniŋgambun aŋgiy gispim.
Nind Krays nup dem nimbip timey geyak, nup ma kirpik ak pen; miñiy yenen low minim ak aŋgey, minim kun ak diy, nup kirginiŋg gispim?
Yip aŋgem niŋiyn. Low minim ar ak gem niŋiy, Gor Kawnan nuk ak yokek tap mageprek gok gipik?
Gor basind Ebraham nup gak rek, chinup kunep gip. Baybol buk ak tikiy aŋgyak, “Gor giniŋgayn aŋgiy aŋgayak minim ak, Ebraham niŋind aŋgip aŋgiy niŋek, bi suŋ-tep yand aŋgip” aŋgyak.
Kun ak niŋim: biynimb kumbak tikiy, Jiwda low aŋgip aŋgip rek giy mey, Ebraham ker mindeniŋgambim apay gok; yesek apay. Biynimb Gor aŋgip minim ak niŋiy, niŋind aŋgip aŋgiy dipay gok, Ebraham ker mindpay.
Gor Ebraham nup aŋgak, “Nand mindpan rek, kisen biynimb miñmon okok maŋgiysek tep giniŋgamb aŋgak.” Minim aŋgak kun ak, “Kisen biynimb Jiwda mer gok, Jiysis minim tep ak niŋind aŋgip aŋgiy diniŋgambay ak mey; kuyip diniŋgayn aŋgiy,” aŋgak.
Kun ak biynimb minim tep nup ak niŋiy, nup gosimb niŋniŋgambay gok, Ebraham Gor nup gosimb niŋiy, am nuk yip mindrep gip rek ak, am mindeniŋgambay.
Pen biynimb Gor low ar ak gon, chinup biynimb suŋ-tep aŋgiy diniŋgamb apay gok, yiwur yomb yimb diniŋgambay. Yenen, Baybol buk ak tikiy aŋgyak, “Biynimb Gor low minim tikyak tikyak rek maŋgiysek kisen ma giniŋgambay gok, yiwur yomb diniŋgambay aŋgyak.”
Pen minim bap tikiy aŋgyak, “Biynimb yip gosimb niŋbay gok nep mey, biynimb suŋ-tep yand mindeniŋgambay aŋgyak.” Kun ak niŋbun: Biynimb low minim ar ak nep niŋiy gey amniŋgamb gok, biynimb suŋ-tep nuk mindey, kuyip dinimuŋ rek ma ayniŋgamb.
Biynimb, “Jiysis chinup nen kumak rek, Nop chinup diniŋgamb aŋgiy” niŋbay gok nep, ñin ar kuyip apiymiŋay ak mindeniŋgambay. Pen low minim niŋiy gipay ak, Baybol buk tikiy aŋgyak, “Gor low gok maŋgiysek kisen giy mey, kim amniŋgambay aŋgyak.”
Pen chin, Gor low minim ar ak gi mer niŋiy, apyap pikiy yiwur yomb diniŋg gon, Krays Nop Gor nup aŋgak, “Yand tip kuyip ak diy, bi timey rek bap minden, yip mon bak biyoŋ ñaŋgbirik ayey kumiyn aŋgiy,” kumak. Baybol buk ak tikiy aŋgyak, “Bi mon bak biyoŋ tiwniŋgaypay gok, Gor kuyip yiwur yomb ñamb mey; kun giy kumbay aŋgyak.” Kun ak niŋbun: chin yiwur yomb diniŋg gon, Krays tip chinup ak diy, yiwur yomb kun ak diy kumak.
Pen Krays kumak ak, biynimb Jiwda mer gok kuyip kunep diniŋg kumak. Gor Ebraham nup minim aŋgay aŋgak, “Nand mindpan ak mey, biynimb miñmon okok kuŋaynep, kuyip tep giniŋgamb aŋgak.” Ar kun ak nep, Krays Jiysis chinup nen kumek mey; nup gosimb niŋiy kond mindon, Gor Kawnan nuk ak nup yokek apiy, chinup bak ayip.
Mam ay sikop. Yand nimbip minim bap aŋgiyn. Bi gunap minim aŋg ar nokom ay, apay rek nep gipay. Bi bap ap timbrikiy monmon ma giniŋgamb.
Kun ak rek, Gor Ebraham nup giniŋgayn aŋgiy aŋgayak minim ak, kisen minim bap key ma aŋgniŋgamb. Pen minim aŋgayek, Baybol buk tikyak ak, “Ñapan nip gok,” aŋgiy ma tikyak; “Ñapan nip ak,” aŋgiy tikyak.” Ñapan nokom aŋgyak kun ak, Krays nup nep aŋgyak.
Pen yand aspiyn ak: Gor Ebraham nup giniŋgayn aŋgiy aŋgayak minim ak, pisnep aŋgay, simiy kuŋaynep mindiy, low minim kisen aŋgyak ak; yergiy minim nuk nindnimb aŋgayak ak kirginiŋgamb. Nuk kun ma giniŋgamb; minim nind aŋgak kun ak pisnep aŋgak.
Pen basind chin Ebraham low minim ak niŋek, Gor nup dak ma aŋgnimimb; nup simb niŋiy, giniŋgayn aŋgiy aŋgayak rek dak.
Pen kun apiyn ak nimb aŋgniŋgambim, “Gor Ebraham nup yikop dak kun ak; nuk yenen Jiwda biynimb gok kuyip, low minim ak aŋgñak aŋgniŋgambim.” Pen Gor nup giniŋgayn aŋgiy aŋgayak minim ak, aŋgak rek mindakniŋ, low minim ak kisen sesek aŋgak. Pen gak kun ak aŋgak, “Giniŋgayn aŋgiy aŋgaynik rek, Ebraham tikek tik dand amiy tikniŋgamb Ñi ak, kuyip aŋgyokniŋgayn ak pen, ñin namb biy tap siy tap timey keykey gispay rek, kuyip low minim ak aŋgen mey; low kun gok timbrikyiŋg, Gor minim nup timbriksipun aŋgiy, niŋrep giniŋgambay aŋgak.” Pen low minim ak enjol gok nep dand apiy, Mosis nup aŋgñeyak, Mosis nund pen biynimb gok kuyip aŋgñak. Minim chinup giniŋgayn aŋgiy aŋgayak ak, minim yomb yimb ak mey, nuk key apiy Ebraham nup aŋgñak.
<range>
Nimb gos bap niŋiy aŋgniŋgambim, Gor chinup minim ar omiŋal aŋgak ak; low minim aŋgak ak dep nep; giniŋgayn aŋgiy aŋgayak minim ak dep nep aŋgniŋgambim. Pen minim omiŋal kun ak keykey ma mindip. Biynimb suŋ-tep mindeniŋgiy aŋgiy low minim bap aŋgombikop; low ar kun ak giy kim amiy, perper mindombinup. Pen low kun ak rek bap ma aŋgak.
Baybol buk tikyak rek nep mindip. Chin biynimb miñmon okok maŋgiysek tap siy tap timey ar ak gon gon, gach kun ak kom kom gek, key kim amjun rek ma ayip. Pen biynimb Jiysis Krays nup gosimb niŋniŋgambun gok, Gor giniŋgayn aŋgiy aŋgayak rek giy, chinup diniŋgamb.
Pen Krays ma awak ñin ak, nup gosimb ma niŋnuk ak mey, Mosis low minim aŋgak ak, chinup wariy rek gi kus kus gak.
Kun ak low minim ak chinup gos timund winjik dand apiy, Krays apek nup gosimb niŋon, Gor niŋek biynimb minim ma mindip gok mindpun.
Krays chinup aŋgiy owak rek nup gosimb niŋiy mey, kilrimey giyiŋgipay low ar ak kirpun.
Nimb nup gosimb niŋiy mey, maŋgiysek Gor ñapan nuk mindiy, ñiŋg pikiy, nup chiŋgiy, chech kisenimb rek ak aypim.
<range>
Kun ak Jiwda kiñiŋ ak key, Jiwda mer kiñiŋ ak key; biyn kiñiŋ ak key, bi kiñiŋ ak key ma mindpun; biynimb kalambis woŋg gipay gok key, biynimb yikop mindpay gok key ma mindpun; chin Krays Jiysis biynimb nuk mindpun rek, kiñiŋ nokom yimb mindpun.
Krays ker mindpun rek, Ebraham biynimb kiñiŋ nuk nokom mindpun ak mey; Gor chinup Ebraham nup giniŋgayn aŋgak rek giniŋgamb.
Minim yand apiyn ak kun giy mindip: bi tap kuŋay mindip gok kumey, tap kiyk gok, ñapan kiyk gok kuyip aŋgaypay. Ñapan kun gok tap kuŋay mindip ak pen; kiyk sikoy mindey, tap kiyk ma mindip rek ayip.
Pen bi ñapan kun gok kuyip kond mindpay gok, kun kun ginimimb aŋgiy aŋg dand amiy, nop aŋgayak ñin ak apek nep, tap kiyk kun gok dipay.
Chin kunep Gor nup chiŋgrep ma ginuk ñin ak, kichekiy, chipday, tap yerip yerip okok minim aŋgyak ak niŋiy, mindrep ma giyiŋgipun.
Pen Gor key niŋayak ñin ak apek, Ñinuk nup yokek, Jiwda biyn bap nup tikak. Tikek, nuk Jiwda low minim ar ak niŋmind dand amiy,
biynimb low minim dipay gok sek di Gor yip jimñiy ayniŋg kumak.
Nimb ñapan nuk yimb mindpim rek, Kawnan nup ak yokek apiy, nimbip bak ayip ak mey; Gor nup Bapiy chin apim.
Kun ak nimb biynimb Seytan nup kalambis woŋg rek giyiŋgipim gok, miñiy Gor Ñapan nuk mindpim ak; Gor nimbip mindrep giyaŋ aŋgiy aŋgayak rek, mindrep giniŋgambim.
Pen nind Gor nup ma chiŋgiy, tap yesek okok lotiw gi dand amiy, tap kun gok kirgiy, Gor nup gosimb niŋnimimb rek ma ayak.
Pen miñiy Gor nup chiŋgipim. Kun ak nimb niŋiy nup ma dipik; nuk key niŋiy nimbip dak. Pen yenen andkind amiy, nind giyiŋgipim rek giniŋg gispim? Gispim kun ak, tip ak kosyam mindon aŋgiy gispim.
Per ñin yomb apay ak nep niŋiy, takin yomb apay ak nep niŋiy, pumb yombip apay ak nep niŋiy, simiy yomb apay ak nep niŋiy gipim.
Nimbip minim tep aŋgñen niŋbik ak pen; miñiy kirgipim rek ayek, nimbip gos kuŋay niŋsipiyn.
Mam ay sikop. Yand nimbip simb niŋiy aspiyn! Nind Jiwda low minim niŋyiŋgipiyn ak kirgiy, nimb yikop mindyiŋgipim rek mindpiyn ak; nimb kunep low minim kun ak kirgiy, Gor nup nokom chiŋgnimimb. Yand nimb yip mindenik ñin ak, yip direp yimb gipik.
Nimb niŋbim, yip tap gak ak mey; miñmon nimb ak mindiy, nimbip minim tep ak aŋgñinik.
Mindrep ma ginik kun ak, yip yiruk niŋiy ma kirpik; Gor enjol bap akaŋ, Krays Jiysis nep aŋgiy dipay rek yip dipik.
Yip dipik miñ ar kun ak, miñiy dam yokpim akay? Akaŋ minim niŋind aŋgnik ar ak niŋiy, miluk niŋbim? Am nimb yip mindenik ñin ak, yip simb niŋiy, windin maŋgiy nimbik gok tuŋgjiw yip ñemb rek ayek, monmon tuŋgjiw ñinimimb rek ak mindenimbik. Pen miñiy yip yenen kirpim?
<range>
Bi nimbip timund winjikpay gok, yimb kiyk ak nep dand aranyiŋg, Pol nup kirgiyaŋ aŋgiy, nimbip per tom gipay.
Yand nimb yip mindiy akaŋ, par okok minden, bi gunap nimbip gosimb ñiniŋgambay ak, tep giniŋgambay ak pen; yimb kiyk dand aranyiŋg, nimbip tom gipay ak, tep ma gip.
Pen ñapan yand gok. Nimb yip am mindenik ñin ak, Krays nup chiŋgiy, nuk mindip rek mindeniŋgiy aŋgiy, biyn gok ñapan tikniŋg gey miker yimb gip rek gak ak, miñiy yip tip ak gisap.
Nimb yip mindembinip ak, minim akay diy aŋgnim aŋgiy, niŋbinip ak pen; par akniy mindpiyn rek, gos niŋen tikindyowip.
Pen nimb low minim nep niŋjun apim gok, low minim tikyiŋg aŋgyak minim ak ma niŋbim rek ayip.
Minim kun ak tikiy aŋgyak, “Ebraham ñi omiŋal tikak. Ñinuk bap, biyn piñ ap biynuk nup woŋg giñiyiŋgip ak nup diy tikak; ñinuk bap, biynuk yipund giy ak yip tikak.
Biyn woŋg giyiŋgip ñi tikak ak, ñapan tikpay rek tikak; pen biynuk nind ak ñapan wom mindiy, Gor Ebraham nup ñi bap tikniŋgamban aŋgiy minim aŋgayak rek, ñi ak tikak.”
Pen kesim ar kun ak, minim gunap bak okok mindip. Biyn woŋg giñemb Hega mey, low minim rek ak; biyn Sera mey, minim giniŋgayn aŋgiy aŋgayak ak rek. Biyn Hega miñmon nuk Areybiya nimb. Miñmon Areybiya kun ak mey, nind Gor low minim ak, Mosis nup ñak miñmon sikoy Saynay dum. Pen Jiwda kiyk pernep low apay ak mey; Jerusalem miñiy mindip ak, miñmon Saynay dum rek ayip. Kiyk mey, Hega ñapan nuk gok kun gim kun gim aŋgyakniŋ, kalambis woŋg giyiŋgipay rek ak gipay.
<range>
Pen chin biyn Hega kind ak nimb ma mindpun. Amiy chin mey, Jerusalem, semb biyoŋ nimb ak. Biynimb Jerusalem kun biyoŋ nimb gok kuyip, minim sosim aŋgniŋgiy rek ma ayip; Gor chinup minim aŋgayak rek giniŋgamb aŋgiy niŋbay rek, kuyip dip.
Kun ak rek, Baybol buk tikiy aŋgyak, “Biyn ñapan wom ak, ñapan tikek nup tep gakniŋ, miñmiñ yimb giniŋgamb. Kiñiŋ nuk ak yomb yimb mindeniŋgambay. Pen biyn nuŋgumiy yip taŋgyiŋgip ak ñapan tikek, kiñiŋ yomb ma mindeniŋgambay aŋgyak.”
Mam ay sikop. Gor Ebraham nup, biyn nand yipund giy yimb ak, ñapan bap tikniŋgamb aŋgek, gos kun ak niŋmindiy, ñinuk Aysek nup tikek, kiñiŋ yomb yimb amnak. Kun ak rek, Gor chinup diniŋgayn aŋgek, gos kun ak nep niŋmindon, chinup dek, miñiy kiñiŋ yomb yimb ak mindpun.
Ñin kun ak, basind Ebraham ñinuk biynimb ñapan tikpay rek tikak ak tikjakiy, numam andik Gor Kawnan gek tikak ak nup miluk niŋak. Kun ak rek, miñiy biynimb Jiwda low minim niŋbay gok, chinup Jiysis nup gos niŋbun gok kunep gipay.
Pen Baybol buk ak tikiy aŋgyak, “Biyn woŋg giñemb amiymiŋay ak kuyip aŋgyoknimin. Biyn yipund giy diy ñi tiknak ak, tap niripapiy gok, ñi bap ma diniŋgamb aŋgyak.”
Kun ak mam ay sikop niŋim! Chin biyn yikop ap woŋg giñiyiŋgip ñapan nuk rek ma mindpun; Ebraham biynuk yipund giy diy ñapan tikak rek gok mindpun.
Nind mindrep ma giy, mind dand amiy, Krays chinup nen kumek, nup diy mindrep gipun ak pen; miñiy nimbip Jiwda low minim ak tip niŋyaŋ aŋgiy, nembnemb gi dand amjipay ak, niŋrep ginimimb.
Yand Pol nimbip aspiyn: Gor biynimb nuk mindenjun aŋgiy, Jiwda kay minim ak diy kumbak tikniŋgambim ak; Krays nup kirginiŋgambim.
Yand nimbip tip ak aŋgrep giniŋg gispiyn: kumbak tikep ar kun ak kindik giniŋg; Gor low minim aŋgyak aŋgyak rek giniŋgambim.
Nimb biynimb low minim niŋdon, Gor chinup diniŋgamb aŋgiy niŋbim gok; Krays nup kirgiy yap pikpim. Gos kun giy niŋbim rek, nimbip simb niŋiy dinimuŋ rek ma ayip.
Pen chin biynimb Gor nup gosimb niŋon, Kawnan nuk ak chinup bak ayip gok, suŋ-tep yimb mindeniŋgambun aŋgiy, tep gakniŋ kond mindpun.
Biynimb Krays Jiysis nup chiŋgipay gok, kumbak tikyak akaŋ ma tikyak ak, minim ma mindip. Pen Gor nup gosimb niŋiy, biynimb gok kuyip simb niŋniŋgambay ak; tep yimb.
Nind taŋgrep giyiŋgipim; miñiy an nimbip kinjeŋ tikek, minim tep ak kirgiy, minim yesek apay ak niŋniŋg gispim?
Gor nimbip kinjeŋ tikek, minim tep ak kirpim? Nuk nep mey nimbip suk aŋgek, minim tep ak niŋiy dipik.
Minim yesek apay ak ma niŋnimimb. Tap yiys ak, sikoy band gunap biret sek ay daŋgiyey, yin tanimb. Kun ak rek nimbip giniŋgamb ak mey, minim kuyip ak ma dinimimb.
Yand niŋbiyn: Krays nup chiŋgiy jimñiy mindpun ak mey; minim tep nimbip aŋgnik ak, ma kirginiŋgambim. Pen bi an ap aŋgek, gosow gosow niŋsipim ak, yiwur yomb yimb diniŋgamb.
Pen mam ay sikop niŋim! Yip timey giyiŋg nep mindpay ak, Jiysis minim anep aŋgen yip kun gipay. Pen Jiysis minim ak aŋgñiyiŋg, kumbak tikep minim ak sek apnip ak; yip timey ma gipyap.
Pen bi nimbip kumbak tiknimimb aŋgiy, kilpul apay kun gok, walak ak sek dipyap ak tep!
Pen mam ay sikop. Gor nimbip diyn aŋgiy pisnep dak ak mey, low minim diy kosyam mindeyaŋ aŋgiy, nimbip ma dak. Pen chin low minim sek ma apun ak niŋiy, gos nimbik ak key niŋiy, monmon ma ginimimb; biynimb gok kuyip simb niŋiy, direp ginimimb.
Gor low minim nuk ak, maŋgiysek di jimñiy minim won nokom bap aŋgiy aŋgak, “Nimb key wasemb aypim rek, biynimb gunap kuyip kunep wasemb aynimimb aŋgak.”
Kun ak, nimb key niŋrep ginimimb. Kanj kayn gok gipay rek miluk yapek, penpen giniŋgambim ak; maŋgiysek yap pikniŋgambim.
Kun ak nimbip apiyn: Gor Kawnan gos ñimb ar ak nep geniŋgambim mey, gos nimb key niŋiy tap siy tap timey giyiŋgipim ar ak kirginiŋgambim.
Gos omiŋal kun ak, bap pis bap lipiŋg dand amniŋgamb, bap pis bap lipiŋg dand amniŋgamb ak mey, ginjun aŋgiy niŋniŋgambim ar ak, ginimimb rek ma ayniŋgamb.
Pen Gor Kawnan gos ñakniŋ gon amek, low minim bap niŋiy chinup kor ma giniŋgamb.
Gos key niŋiy gipay ar ak mey: biyn siy bi siy giy, monmon giraŋgiy, timey yimb giy,
tap yikop okok aŋgniŋiy, kunj giy, koyimb pikiy, miluk niŋiy, simbwur timey gek, yand key biyomb minden aŋgiy, penpen giy, mindrep ma gipay.
Tap kiyk gok yand rek mindombikop aŋgiy; tap yesek aŋgniŋyiŋg, ñiŋg kilis ñimbiy sakiy ay, timey yimb nep gipay. Yand nimbip minim aŋgnik ak, miñiy tip ak nimbip aspiyn. Biynimb kun ak rek gi mindpay gok, Gor kuyip diy ma kond mindeniŋgamb.
Pen biynimb Gor Kawnan gos ñakniŋ gey amimb gok, miñmiñ yimb giy; biynimb simb niŋiy; biynimb gunap kuyip timey gey, pen miluk ma niŋbay. Kapkap jimñiy mindiy, biynimb key okok nimb gunap yip minim sayn aŋgiy, biynimb sik aŋgdiy, apay rek niŋiy, kal ma jiwiy, niŋrep yimb giy nokom gipay. Gipay kun ak, yenen kun gipim aŋgiy, aŋgniŋgiy rek low bap ma mindip.
<range>
Biynimb Krays Jiysis nup chiŋgipay gok, gos key niŋiy monmon giyiŋgipay ar ak kirpay. Miñ ar giyiŋgipun kun ak, Krays yip kumimb aŋgiy, Krays gos ñimb rek nep gipay.
Kun ak Gor Kawnan anep gek, biynimb nuk mindpun ak; tap yerip yerip giniŋg, chinup gos ñakniŋ nep ginjun.
Pen chin key yimb yomb mindeŋ aŋgiy, yimb chin dand aranyiŋg, penpen miluk ma niŋjun.
Mam ay sikop. Biynimb chin gunap miñ timey ar gunap geniŋgiy, nimb biynimb Gor nup chiŋgrep gipim gok, chin kunep timey ginjun rek ayip aŋgiy, kuyip minim sisayn aŋgiy, aŋgrep gem, tip ak mindrep giniŋgiy.
Kun ak biynimb chin gunap miker gonimuŋ, kuyip simb niŋiy kond mindem, mindrep giniŋgiy. Giniŋgambim kun ak, Krays bi biynimb simb niŋimb ak, aŋgak rek giniŋgambim.
Pen biynimb gunap, biynimb yomb mindpun ak, yergiy kuyip kun ginjun aŋgniŋgambay ak, yesek aŋgniŋgambay.
Biynimb gunap yomb akaŋ; yand yomb rek mindpiyn aŋgiy gos ak ma niŋnimimb. Gor yip niŋek, mindrep gipiyn akaŋ, mindrep ma gipiyn aŋgiy gos ak niŋnimimb.
Yenen: chin nokom nokom miker keykey mindip rek niŋiy, yerer giy mindrep giniŋgambun ak, key niŋrep ginjun.
Pen biynimb Gor minim aŋgñimbay gok kuyip sakiy ma giniŋgiy; tap kiy mindonimuŋ gok, kuyip gunap bilok ñiniŋgiy.
Pen Gor bi sakiy aŋgiy, nup monmon ma ginjun. Nup kun giniŋgambun ak, chinup pen kunep giniŋgamb.
Chin niŋbun: tap yimniŋgambun rek nep jakniŋgamb; tap key gunap ma jakniŋgamb. Kun ak gos chin key niŋbun rek ginjun aŋgniŋgambun ak; kinjeŋ timey amniŋg kun aŋgniŋgambun. Pen Gor Kawnan gos ñimb rek ginjun aŋgniŋgambun ak; Gor Kawnan ak chinup gek perper mindeniŋgambun.
Kun ak yiruk gek ma kirginjun, kilis giy gi yimiy, ñiŋemb ñin ak, tep gakniŋ nep ñiŋniŋgambun.
Pen tap ñiŋemb kun ak wos ma gip ñin biy, biynimb Gor ker mindpay gok kuyip, direp ginjun rek ayek, direp ginjun. Pen biynimb yikop gok kunep ginjun.
Yand aŋgen, mam bap minj biy tikip. Pen miñiy ñin maŋgiy yand key tiksipiyn ak mey, maŋgiy yomb yomb rek tiksipiyn.
Tiysa nimbip minim yesek kumbak tiknimimb apay gok, kumbak kiyk key tikpay ak pen; tikiy Jiwda low gok maŋgiysek kisen ma gipay. Kun ak kiyk kumbak tikpay ak, Jiwda gunap Krays mon bak biyoŋ kumak minim ak dipun rek, miker ma ñiniŋgiy aŋgiy tikpay. Nimbip kumbak tiknimimb apay ak, key yimb yomb diy, miñmiñ gun aŋgiy apay.
<range>
Pen yand gos gunap niŋiy miñmiñ ma gipiyn: Jiysis yip aŋgiy mon kiros bak biyoŋ kumek, yand yip kumnik rek ayip ak niŋiy mey; miñmiñ gipiyn. Nuk yip kumnik kun ak, bi pisnep kumemb rek ak minden, biynimb yikop gok tap kuyip tep gip gok, yip ma gos gip. Pen biynimb kun gok yip pen niŋey, tap yikop bap rek ayek, bi pisnep kumemb rek ak mindpiyn.
Chin kumbak tiknuk akaŋ, ma tiknuk ak, minim ma mindip. Gor gek biynimb kisenimb ay, biynimb nuk mindpun ak, tap yimb.
Nimb biynimb kisenimb rek ay, Gor ker mindpim gok; biynimb nuk yipund giy mindpim. Kun ak Gor ñin ar ak mindiy, gos kuŋay ma niŋnimimb.
Yand minim won nokom bap mindip ak, nimbip aŋgniŋg gispiyn. Jiysis minim tep ak aŋgen, yip pikpay kiñowiŋ gok mindip ak; yip kisen Gor nup chiŋgrep ma gip akaŋ, monmon gip aŋgiy minim ak ma aŋgniŋgiy.
Mam ay yand gok. Nimb Biyomb chin Krays ñin ar ak mindem, nimbip kond mindonimuŋ. Tep.
Yand Pol, Gor nep aŋgek bi Jiysis Krays minim dand amemb ak mindpiyn. Nimbip Yipiyses biynimb Krays nup chiŋgrep giy mindpim gok minj tiksipiyn.
Biyomb chin apiymiŋay ak nimbip simb niŋiy kond minder, mindrep ginimimb.
Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays Nop anup tep aŋgjun. Ñinuk nup yokek apiy chinup dek mey, nup chiŋgon, chinup direp yimb gek mindrep gipun.
Miñmon ma alwol gayak ñin ak chinup gos niŋiy aŋgak, “Ñiyand Krays nup yoken am kuyip dek, biynimb suŋ-tep yand gok mindeniŋgambay aŋgak.”
Ñin kun anep aŋgak, “Ñiyand Krays kuyip dek, ñapan yand gok mindey, yip tep giniŋgamb aŋgak.”
Kun aŋgiy, Ñi mapin nuk ak monmon yokek apiy, chinup di Nop ñin ar ayak ak mey, tep gakniŋ yimb nup ak dand aranjun.
Jiysis Krays likañ yapiy kumak rek, kim amniŋgambun. Gor bi tep yimb ak, tap siy tap timey gipun gok niŋiy kirgiy, Ñinuk nup monmon yokek lum biy apiy kumiy chinup dip. Bi gos tipaŋgiy niŋimb kun ak,
<range>
Ñinuk nup yokniŋgayn aŋgiy niŋyiŋgip rek yokek awak ak niŋbun.
Minim bap kunep aŋgay aŋgak, “Ñin aŋgaypiyn ak apek, Ñiyand ak tap semb biyoŋ man biy, tap yerip yerip gaynik rek, maŋgiysek kond mindeniŋgamb aŋgak.”
Pen key niŋayak rek, chin miñiy Krays nup chiŋgiy, Gor biynimb nuk yimb gok mindpun. Yerer gip ak nuk key niŋayak rek nep gip.
Nuk gak kun ak, chin biynimb Krays nup nind gosimb niŋnuk gok, Nop nup yimb ak dand aranjun.
Pen nimb kunep minim tep ak niŋiy nup dem mey, Kawnan nuk ak yokek ap nimb yip mindip.
Kawnan nuk chinup yokip kun ak yikop ma yokip; kuyip pisnep dipiyn rek, kisen dand amniŋgayn aŋgiy yokip. Kun ak mey, yimb nup dand aranyiŋg nep mindonjun.
Kun ak nimb nind Jiysis nup diy, biynimb nup gok kuyip wasemb aypik ak niŋiy,
yand sakiy ma giy, nimbip nen Gor nup aŋgniŋyiŋg, tep aŋgyiŋg mindpiyn.
Jiysis Krays Nop nup per aŋgniŋiy apiyn, “Kiyk Kawnan nand ak yip nep mindpay rek, gos tep ak ñenimin, amemb owep nand ak niŋrep yimb giniŋgiy.
Nand kuyip diniŋg, Krays nup yokey apiy kuyip dek, mindrep yimb giniŋgambay aŋgiy dinak ak mey; kuyip gos tep ñenimin, giniŋgamban kun ak niŋiy tep gakniŋ mindeniŋgiy.
Nand Biyomb key yimb; biynimb nip dipay gok kuyip, kond mindrep yimb gipan ak niŋniŋgiy apiyn.” Nimb niŋbim: Biyomb chinup kond mindip kun ak key yimb mindip.
Krays pisnep kumek nuk gek tikjakiy, am ñin yipund kind nuk okok ken mindip.
Nop yip am bisgip rek, nuk kunep Biyomb kun ak key yimb mindip. Biyomb man ar biy mindpay rek mer; enjol biyomb mindpay rek mer; Seytan kichekiy tap okok biyomb mindpay rek mer; pen biynimb yomb nind mindyiŋgipay gok, biynimb yomb kisen mindeniŋgambay gok, yimb kiyk kayaŋ mindek; yimb nuk ak yiy ar biyoŋ mindakniŋ, maŋgiysek beŋ nuk okok mindeniŋgambay.
Nop biynimb tap okok maŋgiysek beŋ nup okok ayak. Pen chin biynimb nuk gok, nup korip sap yomb namb biyaŋ rek piŋiy, chinup piŋiy kus kus gip ak mey, pisnep di jimñimb.
<range>
Tap siy tap timey giyiŋgipim rek Gor yip jimñiy mindep rek ma ayak ak pen; Krays gek nuk yip jimñiy mindpim.
Nind ñin kun ak Seytan kichekiy tap gok ap bak ay mindey, Gor nup minim ak kirpay rek ak giyiŋgipim.
Chin maŋgiysek kun ak rek nep giyiŋgipun. Gos chin key niŋyiŋgipun rek giyiŋg, gos gunap key niŋep rek ma ayek, biynimb yikop gok, yiwur yomb ak kond mindpay rek ak, chin giyiŋgipun.
Kun ak chin Gor yip mindep rek ma ayek, nuk bi biynimb simb niŋimb ak, chinup simb niŋiy, Ñinuk Krays nup yokek apiy, chinup aŋgiy kumiy, Gor yip di jimñiy ayek mey, perper mindenjun rek ayip.
<range>
Krays kumak ak pen, Nop gek tikjakiy semb biyoŋ amnak. Pen Nop niŋek, chin Ñinuk yip jimñiy kumiy tikjakiy mindpun ak mey, chinup Ñinuk yip aŋgayip miñmon tep nuk biyoŋ.
Pen chinup simb niŋiy Ñinuk nup yokak kun ak, biynimb gok nup per, bi tep key yimb biynimb simb niŋimb ak niŋniŋgiy aŋgiy, gak.
Nimb Krays nup gosimb niŋem nimbip dip ak, kilis chin key gon chinup dip aŋgiy ma aŋgnimimb. Gor nuk nep chinup simb niŋiy Ñinuk Krays nup yokek apiy, chinup di Nop yip jimñiy ayek, biynimb nuk mindpun.
Pen chinup dek, biynimb gok kuyip direp giyiŋg mindrep giniŋgambun ak, ginimimb aŋgak rek nep giniŋgambun. Kun ak yimb chin key dand aranjun rek ma ayniŋgamb.
<range>
Nimb niŋbim: nind Gor nup gosimb ak ma niŋyiŋgipim. Biynimb yand Jiwda gok kumbak tikiy, nimbip aŋgjiwiy aŋgyiŋgipay, “Biynimb sakiy, kumbak ma tikpay gok aŋgyiŋgipay.” Pen kumbak tikpun gos niŋiy apay kun ak, Gor biynimb nuk ma mindpay. Nimb miñiy Krays nup chiŋgiy mey, Gor biynimb nuk yimb mindpim.
Pen nimb nind Gor biynimb nuk ma mindiy, minim nup niŋyiŋgipay kind ak ma mindiy, biynimb yand gok diniŋgayn aŋgak minim ak ma niŋiy, biynimb yikop gok gipay rek nep gi mindyiŋgipim.
Nimb par okok mindiy, nup ker mindenimimb rek ma ayak. Pen miñiy Krays likañ nuk yapek kumak rek niŋiy, nup chiŋgiy biynimb nuk mindpim.
Kun ak nuk kumak rek, chin Jiwda gok, Jiwda mer gok miluk niŋiy, penpen giyiŋgipun wariy ak timbwaliŋg yokiy, di jimñiy ayek mindpun.
Jiwda low minim kumbak tikep aŋgyiŋgipay gok maŋgiysek kirgiy mey, Jiwda kiñiŋ ak key, Jiwda mer kiñiŋ ak key ma mindpun. Jiysis kumak rek, chinup Gor yip di jimñiy ayek mey, chin biynimb nuk gok kiñiŋ nokom mindpun.
<range>
Nind keykey yimb mindyiŋgipun ak pen; Krays minim tep Gor yip jimñiy mindep ak dand apiy, nimbip biynimb paryomb okok rek mindyiŋgipim gok aŋgñiy, chin Jiwda maŋ okok mindyiŋgipun gok aŋgñiy gak. Kinjeŋ chinup ar nokom pindip kun ak, Bapiy yomb ker amjun rek ayip. Pen Kawnan nuk ak kuŋay ma mindip; nokom mindip ak diy mey, jimñiy mindpun.
<range>
Kun ak miñiy biynimb miñmon key okok nimb jiwapiy mindpay rek ak ma mindpim: biynimb ar okok tapay rek ma mindpim; Gor biynimb nuk nindnimb gok yip yiŋgoŋg giy, biynimb nuk yipund giy mindpun.
Kun ak chin Gor nup aŋgniŋep korip ak rek mindpun. Jiysis korip sap di mindep yomb namb biyaŋ mindip. Bi Gor minim aŋgep gok sek, bi Jiysis minim dand amemb gok sek korip sap siskoy titumbis okok piŋiypay rek ak mindpay; korip boŋg piŋiy kus kus gipay rek ak nimb mindpim.
<range>
Kun ak Gor Kawnan nuk ak, nimb Yipiyses biynimb Krays ker mindpim gok, di chin biynimb gunap nup ker mindpun gok yip di jimñiy ayek, korip miŋgan tep nuk ak mindniŋg gisap.
Yand Pol, Krays nup woŋg giñiyiŋg, nimbip biynimb Jiwda mer okok aŋgñiraŋgen, Jiwda gunap yip miluk niŋiy kalambis ayey mindpiyn.
Pen Gor yip simb niŋiy diy, nuk nep aŋgek nimbip aŋgñirapiyn ak; niŋbim rek ayip.
Minim nuk ma niŋyiŋgipay gunap, Gor gek day niŋnik ak, nimbip minj tikpiyn.
Nimb minim tikpiyn kun gok niŋiy mey, Krays minim tep nup niŋbiyn rek ak niŋniŋgambim.
Gor Kawnan ak chinup bi Gor minim aŋgep gok sek, bi Jiysis minim dand amemb gok sek gos ñek, minim nind ma niŋyiŋgipay ak niŋrep gipun.
Pen minim kun ak kun giy mindip: miñiy Krays apek, Jiwda biynimb gok sek, Jiwda biynimb mer gok sek minim tep aŋgayak ak dey mey, kuyip di jimñiy ayek; biynimb kiñiŋ nokom rek mindpay.
Gor Biyomb key yimb. Yip simb niŋiy, Ñinuk Krays nup monmon yokek apiy, yip diy kond mindakniŋ, woŋg nup ak giy, minim tep kun ak aŋgñi mindpiyn.
Gor biynimb nuk gunap biynimb tep, yand bi timey ak pen, yip simb niŋiy dek, Jiwda biynimb mer okok kuyip, Krays chinup direp yimb gip minim tep ak aŋgñimbiyn.
Pen Gor miñmon gay, biynimb par okok kuyip kunep diniŋgayn aŋgak ak pen; chin minim kun ak nind ma niŋiy, Jiwda biynimb gok kuyip nep diniŋgamb aŋgiy niŋnuk. Pen Gor yip diy aŋgek, biynimb paryomb okok kuyip aŋgñen, Krays nup dipay ak mey, Gor wosrey giniŋg niŋayak ak gek miseŋ niŋbun.
Gip kun ak biynimb nuk kuŋay mindyakniŋ, enjol gok sek, Seytan, Kichekiy, tap gok sek niŋiy; Gor bi gos tipaŋgiy niŋimb ak aŋgiy niŋniŋgambay.
Nuk gip kun ak Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays nup, chinup yokniŋg gos niŋak rek nep gip.
Pen owak rek nup gosimb niŋiy mey, Nop Gor nup ma pirikiy, monmon aŋgniŋbun.
Kun ak nimbip aŋgñiraŋgen, yip timey gey miker dipiyn ak, gos kuŋay ma niŋnimimb; ak nimbip biynimb tep yand aŋgiy miker dipiyn.
Ar kun ak Bapiy nup koŋgim yimiy aŋgniŋbiyn.
Chin yikop ma mindombinup; Bapiy yomb mindakniŋ chin kiñiŋ keykey, semb biyoŋ man biy mindpun.
Nup per aŋgniŋiy apiyn, “Biyomb key yimb mindpan. Kawnan nak ak, Yipiyses biynimb nip ker mindpay gok kuyip kond mindonimuŋ,
Ñinak nup ma kirginiŋgiy; nup gosimb niŋyiŋg chiŋgiy nep mindeniŋgiy. Chiŋgiy nep mindiy mey, nirapiy biynimb gok kuyip wasemb aypiyr rek ak giniŋgiy. Miñ ak jakiy, am mon ak paŋg dek, kilis mindip rek ak niŋrep giniŋgiy. Pen nand wasemb aypan ak, pernep wasemb aypan. Yiy akyoŋ amiy, akyaŋ amiy, akdoŋ amiy, akdoŋ amiy gip.
<range>
Kun ak biynimb nand gok kuyip gos tep ñenimin, Krays biynimb wasemb ayip rek niŋiy kunep giniŋgiy. Pen chin biynimb nep mindpun ak wasemb aypan rek maŋgiysek niŋjun rek ma ayip. Nirapiy bi tep key yimb mindpiyr. Pen nirip chiŋgiy, nand wasemb aypan kun ak rek nep ayniŋgiy apiyn.”
Pen nimbip aŋgaysipiyn ñin ar nuk ak. Chinup direp giniŋgamb ak, key yimb direp giniŋgamb. Niŋiy nup aŋgniŋjun ak pen; nuk bi key yimb ak, chin yip nep mindiy, key yimb giniŋgamb.
Kun ak biynimb Jiysis Krays nup chiŋgiy mindpun gok, yimb nup pernep dand aranyiŋg mindonjun! Tep.
Yand Krays ker minden yip kalambis ayey mindpiyn ak, minim yip ak niŋnimimb. Gor nimbip biynimb tep yand mindeyaŋ aŋgiy dak ak, mindrep yimb giyiŋg mindenimimb.
Biynimb yomb mindpun aŋgiy kal ma jiwnimimb; biynimb sayn tep gok mindenimimb. Key penpen wasemb aypim rek, penpen direp giyiŋg mindenimimb.
Gor Kawnan nimbip di jimñiy ayek, jimñiy mindpim rek; kun giy nep mindonjun aŋgiy gem amnimuŋ.
Pen Kawnan ak nokom, chin biynimb kiñiŋ nuk ak nokom. Nuk yip mindrep giniŋgambun gos ak nokom.
Biyomb chin ak nokom. Nup gosimb niŋep ar ak nokom. Ñiŋg pikpun ar ak nokom.
Bapiy Gor ak nokom Biyomb chin mindiy; chinup maŋgiysek namb ay mindek, woŋg nup ak gipun.
Pen Ñinuk Krays nup yokek apiy, kumiy tikjakiy chinup kond mindakniŋ, woŋg keykey aŋgip rek gipun.
Kun ak Baybol buk ak tikiy aŋgyak: “Nuk tikjak biyoŋ amyiŋg, bi nup miluk niŋyak gok kuyip taw dapyap ay, biynimb nuk gok kuyip girep yimb gak aŋgyak.”
Nuk aranjak amnak aŋgyak kiñiŋ ak, yergiy rek mindip? Mey man ar biy apiy kumiy, tikjakiy aranjak amnak aŋgiy aŋgyak. Yikop ak yergiy aranjak ambikop.
Kun ak chin niŋbun: bi man ar biy awak anep kumiy, tip aranjak amnak semb biyoŋ. Amiy, semb biyoŋ man biy maŋgiysek kond mindip.
Pen biynimb nuk gok kuyip direp yimb gak aŋgyak kun ak, biynimb nuk gok kond mindakniŋ, woŋg keykey aŋgayip rek gipay aŋgyak. Gunap aŋgayek, Jiysis minim dand amemb woŋg ak gipay. Gunap bi Gor minim aŋgep woŋg ak gipay. Gunap biynimb Gor nup gosimb ma niŋbay gok kuyip minim tep ak aŋgñimbay. Gunap biynimb nup dipay gok kuyip kond mindiy aŋgñirep gipay.
Biynimb nuk kond mindakniŋ, woŋg keykey gipay kun ak, biynimb kiñiŋ yand gok maŋgiysek yip niŋrep giy, jimñiy mindrep gi dand amiy, Bapiy yip, kiyk yip minim bap ma mindonimuŋ aŋgiy gak.
<range>
Gak ar kun ak mindon aŋgiy, ñapan sikoy rek ma mindon mey, bi Gor minim aspun aŋgiy yesek apay gok, chinup yiŋgen diy solwara tuŋgandik mandik gip rek ak ma giniŋgambay.
Niŋrep giy, biynimb gok kuyip wasemb ay, minim niŋind yimb nep aŋgiy, Krays nup chiŋgiy, nuk junwon rek mindeniŋgamb; chin mumbwak ñin kind tomb kind nuk gok rek mindoniŋgambun.
Kun ak chin nup chiŋgiy jimñiy mindiy, penpen wasemb ay, woŋg chinup keykey aŋgayip rek gon amek mey, maŋgiysek mindrep giniŋgambun.
Kun ak Krays nimbip dip ak niŋiy, biynimb nup ker ma mindpay gok gipay ar ak, kirginimimb. Gos kiyk ak yipund ma gip.
Kiyk Bi chinup gek perper mindoniŋgambun anup kirgiy, nup gosimb ma niŋjun aŋgiy, biynimb sakiy rek ay, kisyim wip kind ak mindpay.
Tap siy tap timey gun aŋgiy, nambiŋ ma diy, tapin monmon gey amjap.
Pen Krays chinup kun ak rek ginimimb aŋgiy ma aŋgak.
Minim tep nimbip aŋgyak ak niŋbim: biynimb nup ker mindpun gok mind maŋgiy chin limginiŋgamb ar ak monmon ma giniŋgambun.
Tap siy tap timey ginjun aŋgiy niŋyiŋgipun ak kirgiy,
gos tep kisenimb ar ak niŋniŋgambun.
Pen Gor gek biynimb kisenimb mindonjun rek ayip ak, miñ kisenimb ar ak diy mindenjun. Nind mindyiŋgipun rek kirgiy, nuk mindrep gip rek ak mindenjun.
Krays biynimb nuk mindpim ak maŋgiysek, keykey mindpim rek, mam ay gok kuyip yesek aŋgyiŋgipim ak kirgiy, minim niŋind gok nep aŋgnimimb.
Miluk niŋmindem pumb paŋind amniŋgamb ak, Gor nup tep ma giniŋgamb.
Pen monmon gem, Seytan nimbip gos timey ñek, timey ginimimb rek ayip ak, niŋrep ginimimb.
Biynimb tap siy diyiŋgipay gok siy ma diniŋgiy; key woŋg giy tap mindakniŋ, gunap biynimb yimgeprek gok kuyip ñiniŋgiy.
Minim aŋgniŋg, minim timey gunap ma aŋgnimimb. Minim teprep biynimb niŋiy, Gor nup chiŋgrep giniŋgiy rek aynimuŋ gok nep aŋgnimimb.
Gor chinup ñin kisen ak pisnep diniŋgayn aŋgiy niŋay, Kawnan nuk ak nind yokek apiy yip mindpun ak, timey giy nup miker ma ñinimimb.
Simbwur timey gek, kaljiwiy, miluk niŋiy, biynimb aŋgjiwiy, minim yomb aŋgiy gipim ak kirgiy,
penpen simb niŋiy, pen dek pen dek ginimimb. Nimb Krays ker mindem, Nop nimbip tap siy tap timey gipim ak niŋiy kirgip rek, pen niŋiy kirgek pen niŋiy kirgek ginimimb.
Nimb Bapiy Gor ñapan tep nuk mindpim ak, nuk gip rek ginimimb.
Ñinuk Krays biynimb simb niŋimb rek ak ginimimb. Chinup simb niŋiy, Gor nup tap pik simboŋgiy akaŋ opriyŋ tep ñimbay rek ak, chinup nen mon bak biyoŋ kumak. Kun ak rek biynimb gok kuyip wasemb ayiŋg mindenjun.
Pen Gor biynimb nuk yimb mindpun ak, mindmaŋgiy limgip rek ginjun aŋgiy, biyn siy bi siy ginjun aŋgiy akaŋ, chinup keynep tep giniŋgamb rek gun aŋgiy, ma nep niŋjun.
Ñiñloŋ ay, kunep minim timey yesek yesek kun ak rek ma aŋgjun. Gor bi tep aŋgiy, yimb nup anep dand aranjun.
Niŋrep gipun: biynimb biyn siy bi siy giy, monmon giy, chinup keynep tep ginimuŋ aŋgiy niŋbay gok; tap kuyip tep gip gok yomb rek ayek, Gor nup gosimb ma niŋbay ak mey, Gor apiymiŋay kuyip diy kond mindenimiyr rek ma ayip.
Biynimb Gor nup kirpay gok yiwur yomb yimb diniŋgambay. Kun ak minim monmon aŋgiy, nimbip yesek aŋgñey niŋnimimb rek ayip ak, niŋrep ginimimb.
Kiy yip taŋgiy, minim kuyip ak ma niŋnimimb.
Nind kisyimnamb okok mindyiŋgipim ak pen; miñiy Biyomb chin ak yip taŋgiy, melik ar ak mindpim.
Melik ar kun ak mindiy mey, yesek ma aŋgiy, timey ma giy, mindrep yimb giy mindeniŋgambun.
Kun ak Gor chinup niŋek tep ginimuŋ ar ak nep ginjun aŋgiy gem amnimuŋ.
Weygiy kisyim kind okok taŋgiy tap gipay ak, nimb yip ma ginimimb. Kiyk timey gipay ak; chin kun ak rek minim anep aŋgun aŋgon, nambiŋ gip. Pen biynimb kun gipay gok kuyip aŋgem, Gor nup timey gispay ak niŋniŋgiy.
<range>
Miñmon yapek tap maŋgiysek miseŋ niŋbun. Kun ak rek Gor melik nuk apek, tap yerip weygiy gipay ak miseŋ niŋniŋgambay.
Minim bap tikiy aŋgyak, “Biynimb kisyim kind ak mindiy, sakiy giy kinjipim gok Krays nimbip sup ak puŋgip nen; tikjakim aŋgyak.”
Kun ak biynimb gunap minim ma niŋiy, monmon gipay rek ma ginimimb. Niŋrep giy mindenimimb.
Biynimb timey nep gipay ñin biy, chin Gor biynimb nuk mindpun gok mindrep ginjun. Mer ak, ñin chin biy yikop siliŋg pandikniŋgamb.
Kun ak monmon ma ginimimb; nup tep giniŋgamb ar ak niŋiy ginimimb.
Ñiŋg kilis ñimbiy, sakiy ma aynimimb; Gor Kawnan ak yip nep mindyiŋg, gos tep ñimb rek ginimimb.
Baybol buk minim Sam apay gok penpen aŋgñiyiŋg, kamep aŋgyiŋg, minim tep nup aŋgyiŋg ginimimb. Tep gakniŋ, key niŋbim rek Biyomb chin ak nup, minim tep gunap aŋgnimimb.
Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays yip mindpun rek, minek minek yerer ginimuŋ ak yimb nup aŋgiy, Nop nup tep aŋgyiŋg mindenjun.
Biynimb nup ker mindpun gok Krays nup gosimb niŋyiŋg, penpen direp ginjun.
Nimb biyn gok Biyomb ker mindpim rek, naŋgumiy sikop aŋgniŋgiy rek niŋnimimb.
Ar kun ak kun giy mindip: Krays biynimb gok diy kond mindip rek; bi gok biyn kiyk gok diy kond mindpay.
Krays biynimb nuk gok kuyip aŋgek minim nup kisen gipay rek, biyn gok, bi kiyk gok aŋgniŋgiy rek kisen giniŋgiy.
Pen nimb bi gok, Krays biynimb nuk gok maŋgiysek wasemb ay monmon kumak rek niŋiy, biyn nimbik gok kuyip kunep wasemb yimb aynimimb.
Chinup biynimb nuk gok Gor yip mindeyaŋ aŋgiy, minim tep nuk ak sek, ñiŋg ak sek gek,
silik kiñowiŋ akaŋ, minim sikoy gunap ma mindiy, teprep nep mindey kuyip dand amniŋgayn aŋgiy gip.
Nimb bi gok, biyn nimb gok kun ak rek ginimimb. Mumbwak nimb key niŋrep gipim rek kuyip ginimimb. Bi biyn kiyk wasemb aypay gok; mumbwak nokom mindpiyr rek, mumbwak kiyk key wasemb aypay.
Mumbwak chin ak yiruk ma niŋbun; key niŋon tep gek, tap keñmaŋgiy ñiyiŋg ñiyiŋg nep mindpun. Krays biynimb nuk kond mindip gok kun ak rek gip.
Yenen: chin mumbwak ñin kind tomb kind nuk gok rek mindpun.
Pen Baybol buk ak tikiy aŋgyak, “Bi gok biyn diniŋg, nonim nop kuyip kirgiy, biyn diy jimñiy mindiy, mumbwak nokom rek ayek mindpay aŋgyak.”
Minim kun ak junj bap mindek aŋgak. Yand niŋiy aspiyn ak, Krays nuk mey junwon, chin biynimb nuk gok, ñin tomb kind okok rek mindpun.
Pen nimb bi gok nokom nokom, mumbwak nimbik ak key simb niŋbim rek, biyn nimbik gok kuyip simb niŋnimimb. Nimb biyn gok nokom nokom, naŋgumiy sikop kuyip, bi chin aŋgiy kuyip direp ginimimb.
Nimb ñapan gok, nap nanim sikop aŋgniŋgiy rek niŋdinimimb. Gor aŋgak miñ tep mey ar kun ak.
Nuk aŋgak, “Nap nanim sikop kuyip direp giy, aŋgnimiyr rek niŋdinimimb aŋgak.” Pen minim kun ak aŋgiy aŋgak, “Kun giniŋgambim ak kasek ma kumiy, man ar biy tapin mindiy, mindrep giniŋgambim aŋgak.”
<range>
Pen nop nonim sikop, ñapan nimbik gok mindrep giyaŋ aŋgiy, kuyip sosim rek ma aŋgnimimb. Kun gem, yiruk gek, minim aŋgniŋgambim ak ma niŋniŋgambay. Pen yomb giyakniŋ, gos wikrep giyiŋg, Gor minim aŋgñirep giyiŋg mindenimimb.
Pen nimb biynimb biyomb dap ayey kuyip yikop woŋg giñimbim gok, Krays minim aŋgek pirikiy direp gipim rek; biyomb nimb lum ar biy gok kuyip kunep ginimimb.
Biyomb gok niŋmindyakniŋ gon kuyip tep gaŋ aŋgiy, woŋg ma ginimimb; Gor nup gosimb niŋbim rek, Krays nup tep ginimuŋ aŋgiy ginimimb.
Biynimb lum ar biy kuyip nep gispun aŋgiy ma niŋnimimb; Krays Biyomb chin ak nup woŋg gispun aŋgiy, tep gakniŋ ginimimb.
Nimb niŋbim: chin biynimb yomb akaŋ, biynimb yikop woŋg giñemb akaŋ; Biyomb chin anup woŋg girep goniŋgambun, chinup direp giniŋgamb.
Pen nimb biyomb biynimb chinup yikop woŋg giyaŋ aŋgiy dap aypim gok; kuyip direp ginimimb. Minim kilis aŋgem pirikyiŋg, woŋg ma giniŋgiy. Biyomb chin semb biyoŋ biynimb maŋgiysek kond mindip ak, biynimb gok yomb biynimb gok sikoy aŋgiy ma niŋimb. Andip andip mindpay ak niŋiy, pis bap akaŋ pis bap ma amniŋgamb.
Minim aŋg day jiwniŋg gispiyn. Biyomb yimb anup chiŋgiy, nimbip kond mindakniŋ mindrep ginimimb.
Seytan chinup per timey giniŋg gip ak; chim yakam Gor chinup ñimb ak kinjeŋram ak ay niŋmindrep ginimimb.
Biynimb yikop gok yip ma penpen gispun: kichekiy malñiluk biyomb kiyk kiñiŋ keykey semb biyoŋ man biy mindiy, kisyimken tapay gok yip penpen gispun.
Kun ak tap penpen giniŋg aypay gok maŋgiysek ayrep giy mindiy mey; ñin kosyam mindep ak apek, kilis giy nep mindem, tap gunap nimbip giniŋgiy rek ma ayniŋgamb.
Kun ak Gor minim niŋind yimb ak, ler rek pimbriknimimb. Kond ñaŋgniŋgambay aŋgiy, tiŋgliys wos aypay rek, Gor nup di wiŋmiŋgan aynimimb.
Tomb tirup aypay rek, Gor yip jimñiy mindep minim tep ak dand amnimimb.
Kandiŋ teŋgiypay rek, chinup kond mindeniŋgamb aŋgiy nup gosimb niŋmindem mey; nuk gek Seytan yakam nuk mon rek yinakniŋ ñaŋgniŋgamb gok pisnep suŋgniŋgamb.
Wis wos band aypay rek, Gor nimbip simb niŋiy dip gos ak, di jun biyoŋ aynimimb. Baynat kind dand ambay rek, Gor Kawnan nimbip minim ñimb ak dand amnimimb.
Kawnan nuk gos ñakniŋ, Gor nup minim ar keykey aŋgniŋyiŋg mindenimimb.
Yip kunep ma kirginimimb. Gor nup aŋgniŋem yip kond mindakniŋ, ma pirikiy, minim tep weygiy mindyiŋgip ak biynimb gok kuyip monmon aŋgñinim.
Minim kun ak nep aŋgraŋgenik yip kalambis ayeyak mindpiyn ak pen, nup aŋgniŋem ma pirikiy monmon aŋgñinim.
Pen yand yergiy rek mindpiyn ak, mam tep chin Tikiykas, bi Gor nup woŋg girep gip ak, amjakiy nimbip aŋgñiniŋgamb.
Mindpiyn rek, woŋg gipiyn rek am aŋgek niŋiy, gos sek mindenimimb.
Bapiy Gor apiymiŋay nimbip kond mindrikniŋ, kuyipapiy gosimb niŋiy, biynimb kuyipapiy gok wasemb aymindenimimb.
Pen Gor nimbip biynimb Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays nup wasemb ayiŋg nep mindpim gok, simb niŋiy direp yimb ginimuŋ.
Yand Pol. Timotiy chirmiŋay Jiysis nup woŋg gipur rek, nuk ap mindakniŋ, nimbip minj tiksipiyn. Biyomb nimbip Gor minim aŋgñimbay gok sek, biyomb diykon gok sek kuyip nep ma aspiyn; Piyliypay biynimb Krays Jiysis ker mindpim gok maŋgiysek aspiyn.
Gor apiymiŋay nimbip simb niŋiy, kond minder, mindrep ginimimb.
Nimb Gor nup dipik ñin ak tikiy, minim nup ak biynimb gok kuyip aŋgñi dand apiy, aŋgñiyiŋg nep mindpim. Kun ak yand gipiyn rek gem, yip tep gek, nimbip sakiy ma gipiyn. Gor nup tep aŋgiy apiyn, “Piyliypay biynimb kuyip kond mindenimin apiyn.”
<range>
<range>
Yand niŋbiyn: Gor nimbip dak ak mey, ma kirginiŋgamb; nimbip kond mind dand amiy, Ñinuk Jiysis Krays nup aŋgayak ñin yomb ak winiŋgamb.
Gor niŋimb: yand Jiysis Krays binuk ak, nimbip wasemb aypiyn. Nuk chinup jimñiy kond mindip ak, minim tep nup ak aŋgñiraŋgyiŋg akaŋ, kalambis mindyiŋg akaŋ, nimbip ma sakiy gipiyn; gos niŋyiŋg nep mindpiyn.
<range>
Gor nup per aŋgniŋiy apiyn, “Piyliypay biynimb nip gosimb niŋbay gok kuyip, kond mindenimin; wasemb ayep ar ak sek, miñ tep nand yerip yerip mindip ak sek niŋrep giniŋgiy apiyn.”
Kun ak ar akay tep, ar akay timey ak, niŋrep giy; Jiysis Krays nimbip kond mindakniŋ, tep ar ak nep gi mindem mey; biynimb gok niŋiy, Gor nup yimb ak dand araniŋgambay. Pen Gor nimbip biynimb suŋ-tep yand aŋgyiŋg mindakniŋ, Jiysis Krays andkind winimuŋ.
<range>
Pen mam ay sikop niŋim! Krays minim tep ak ma niŋyaŋ aŋgiy, yip kalambis ayak ak pen, kalambis mindpiyn rek, minim kun ak amiy yomb amimb miñmon Rom biy.
Biyn bi gapman biyomb Siysa nup woŋg giñimbay gok, biynimb yikop gok kuŋaynep, yand Jiysis minim ak nep aŋgñiraŋgen, yip kalambis aypay ak niŋbay.
Pen kalambis mindiy ma pirikiy, Jiysis minim nup monmon aŋgñimbiyn ak, mam ay gunap niŋiy kunep aŋgñispay.
Gunap Gor yip kond mindakniŋ, monmon aŋgñimbiyn rek niŋiy, miluk yapek, chin kunep gon yimb yomb mindeŋ aŋgiy, aŋgñirapay.
Gunap pen, yip wasemb ay, Pol Krays minim tep ak kilis giy aŋgip rek aŋgun aŋgiy aŋgñirapay.
Biynimb yip miluk niŋiy aŋgñirapay gok apay, “Pol kalambis mindip ak mind timey yimb gaŋ aŋgiy,” yimb yomb diniŋg nep aŋgrapay.
Pen ak minim ma mindip; Krays minim tep ak aŋgñey okok amjap ak niŋen, yip tep yimb gip.
Biynimb gunap yip miluk niŋbay ak pen, yand niŋbiyn ak, nimb Gor nup aŋgniŋ mindem, Kawnan nuk ak yip kond mindek, yip yikop wisikyokeniŋgambay amniŋgayn.
Pen yip tep gip ak, yip pikayniŋgambay akaŋ, yerer giniŋgambay ak; Gor nup miñiy chiŋgrep gipiyn rek chiŋgen mey, yimb nup araniŋgamb. Pen mindrep giy, minim nup aŋgrep gen, biynimb gok yimb nup ak dand araniŋgambay.
Biy mindiy, Krays binuk mindpiyn ak pen; kumiy amiy, nuk yip perper mindeniŋgayn. Kun ak kumniŋgayn akaŋ, mindeniŋgayn ak ma niŋbiyn.
Pen biy mindiy, Krays woŋg nup gunap sek ginim rek ayniŋgamb. Kun ak, gos yip omiŋal wip.
Kumiy am Krays yip minden, yip tep gipkop ak pen; man ar biy mindiy, nimbip kond minden, mindrep ginimimb aŋgiy niŋbiyn.
Kun ak yand key niŋbiyn ak, ma kumniŋgayn; nimbip kond minden, Gor nup gosimb ak niŋrep giy, tep gakniŋ mindeniŋgambim.
<range>
Kun ak nimb mindpim ak tip amjaken, nimbip tep gek, Jiysis Krays yimb nup ak dand araniŋgambim.
Yip yerer giniŋgamb ak ma niŋbun rek; Jiysis Krays minim tep ak niŋrep giy, mindrep ginimimb. Kun geniŋgambim, yand mindpim ak niniŋgayn akaŋ, akniy minden minim apek, Gor woŋg ak jimñiy giy, mindrep gispay aŋgiy niŋniŋgayn.
Pen biynimb nimbip girimey gipay gok niŋiy, ma piriknimimb. Jimñiy mindiy ma pirikem, Gor ñin ar ak mindpay rek, kuyip tap bap ginjun rek ma ayip; chin key minim yomb diniŋgambun aŋgiy, nimbip kirginiŋgambay.
Gor nimbip dek, Krays biynimb nuk mindpim ak; biynimb nup ma dipay gok gey kosyam mindpim. Kun ak yand binuk minden niŋiy, timey gipay rek, nimbip gispay. Nimb yip minden yip timey geyak, kosyam mindyiŋgipiyn ak niŋbim. Miñiy kunep, yip timey gipay rek, biynimb gunap nimbip aŋgñey niŋbim.
<range>
Krays nimbip simb niŋiy dek mey, gos kuŋay ma niŋiy, mindrep gipim. Kawnan nuk ak yip mindiy, mam ay gok kuyip wasemb aypim.
Kun ak gi tep gipim ak pen, gos ar nokom niŋiy, jimñiy mindem mey, yip tep yimb giniŋgamb.
Chin nep biynimb yomb mindiy, mindrep ginjun aŋgiy gos ak ma niŋnimimb; biynimb gunap kunep mindrep giyaŋ aŋgiy gos ak niŋnimimb. Nimb pen, biynimb tam okok rek mindiy, biynimb gunap kuyip yimb ak dand aranimimb.
<range>
Kun ak biynimb yomb mindon aŋgiy ma aŋgnimimb; Krays gos niŋiy gak rek ak ginimimb.
Jiysis Krays Gor mindip rek mindip ak pen, nuk Nop nup nembnemb giy, andip andip mindor aŋgiy ma gak.
Nuk bi yikop woŋg giñemb rek minden aŋgiy mey, aŋgek; Gor Kawnan ak gek, biyn Mariya nup tikak. Tikek yomb giy, gos yand key niŋiy giyn aŋgiy ma gak;
Nop aŋgak rek nep gi dand amnakniŋ, nup bi timey tap yikop bap rek, mon kiros bak biyoŋ ñaŋgrimbik ayeyak kumak.
Gak kun ak, Nop nup dand miñmon nuk biyoŋ amiy, yimb nup ak dand yiy ar biyoŋ aranak ak mey;
kisen biynimb maŋgiysek: semb biyoŋ, man biy; kumyak gok, mindeniŋgambay gok; enjol, kichekiy, tap gok koŋgim yimiy,
Nop nup yimb ak dand aranyiŋg, Ñinuk nup Biyomb mindip aŋgiy miseŋ aŋgniŋgambay.
Kun ak Piyliypay biynimb Krays ker mindpim gok. Nimb yip mindiy, minim aŋgen niŋiy giyiŋgipim rek, miñiy akniy mindpiyn ak, kunep ginimimb. Nuk nep nimbip kond mindakniŋ, nup tep giniŋgamb ar ak gun aŋgiy gipim ak mey; niŋrep yimb giy, Biyomb nimbip dip anup ma kirginimimb.
<range>
Miluk ma niŋiy, penpen ma aŋgnimimb; kapkap jimñiy mindem mey;
biynimb yikop mindrep ma gipay gok kuyip, minim tep ak aŋgem, niŋind yimb apay aŋgniŋgambay. Kun ak Krays andkind winiŋgamb ñin ak, Gor minim tep nimbip per aŋgñimbiyn ak, aŋgen pikiy pikek ma amimb, niŋiy ar kun ak gipay aŋgiy, miñmiñ yimb giniŋgayn.
<range>
Nimb Gor nup gosimb niŋbim ak, nup tap simboŋg ñey tep gip rek ak gip. Pen nimbip per aŋgñimbiyn ak niŋiy, yip pikayey likañ yowniŋgamb ak, minim ma mindip. Ak yikop chin Jiwda biynimb ñiŋg wayn ak diy, tap pik nup simboŋgipun ar ak soŋgon amek, Gor nup sesek simboŋg ñon, nup tep gip rek giniŋgamb ak niŋiy, miñmiñ giniŋgayn.
Kun ak yip pikayeniŋgiy, nimb kunep, miñmiñ giyiŋg tep gakniŋ mindenimimb.
Nimb mindrep gipim akaŋ, yergiy rek mindpim ak ma niŋbiyn. Biyomb Jiysis yaw aŋgek, Timotiy nup yoken am nimbip niŋiy apiy, minim kun ak aŋgek, yip tep ginimuŋ.
Timotiy bi tep, yand nimbip simb niŋbiyn rek niŋimb.
Bi gunap kun ma gipay; gos kiyk keynep niŋiy, Jiysis Krays nup gosimb ak ma niŋbay.
Pen nimb niŋbim: Timotiy bi tep yimb. Nuk yip kondek, bi apiymiŋay rek Jiysis minim tep ak aŋgñirapur.
Maŋ mindip kalambis mindpiyn ak; minim aŋgey niŋiy, yip yerer giniŋgambay minim ak nup aŋgen, am nimbip aŋgñiniŋgamb.
Pen yand niŋbiyn ak maŋ mindip, Biyomb ak yip kond mindakniŋ, yand kunep mindpim ak niniŋgayn.
Pen nimb mam chin Epaprodaytas nup aŋgyokem apiy, yip kond mindakniŋ, Gor woŋg ak jimñiy gipur. Pen miñiy tapin mindpur aŋgiy, nup aŋgyoken tip ak andkind jap.
Nuk nimbip am niŋiyn aŋgiy, simb niŋimb ak pen; nup simb gip ak mey; nup tap gip aŋgey niŋbik ak.
Nup tap yomb gek, mer kumak kun ak, Gor nup simb niŋiy, gek jak amnak. Pen nup nep mer; yip kunep simb niŋak ak mey, gek jakamnak. Mam bap kumbikop ak, yip simb yimb gakniŋ mindembinip.
Kun ak, Epaprodaytas nup kasek yoken amjakek, nimbip tep gakniŋ mey, gos kuŋay niŋbiyn rek ma niŋnim.
Nimb nind paryomb okok mindem, bi yip kondep bap ma mindek, bi nimb kun ak aŋgenbik, Krays woŋg ak giyn aŋgiy, ap yip kond mindiy, mer kumak. Kun ak amjakek, Gor nup woŋg gip mam ak asaw aŋgiy, nup miñmiñ yimb ginimimb.
<range>
Mam ay sikop. Nimbip minim bap sek aŋgniŋg gispiyn. Gor ker mindpim rek miñmiñ ginimimb. Minim nimbip nind aŋgnik ak, tip ak aŋgiyn aŋgen yip miker ma gip. Tip ak aŋgen mindrep geniŋgambim mey, chinup maŋgiysek tep giniŋgamb.
Bi nimbip kumbak tikiy nep, Gor biynimb nuk mindeniŋgambim aŋgiy, per yesek apay gok; nimbip gey apyap piknimimb rek ayip. Minim kiyk apay kun ak ma niŋnimimb.
Chin mey, Gor biynimb nuk yipund giy mindpun. Yenen: Kawnan nuk ak yip mindiy, Ñinuk Jiysis nup chiŋgiy tep gakniŋ mindpun ak, Gor biynimb nuk mindpun aŋgiy, niŋrep gipun.
Pen yand kumbak tikpay minim ak aŋgniŋg, kunep apnip. Yand bi Jiwda yipund giy. Yip tikiy ñin onep jiy ak mindiy, kumbak ak tikyak. Basind yes chin Yisrel, ñinuk kisen Benjamen kiñiŋ ak mey, yand mindpiyn. Pen Jiwda low minim apay ak; yand bi Peresiy mindenik rek, minim kun ak niŋrep giy mindyiŋgipiyn.
<range>
Jiwda minim chin kun ak, niŋdand amiy kalrimey jiwiy, biynimb Jiysis ker gok kuyip niŋiy, girimey yimb giyiŋgipiyn. Chin Jiwda biynimb low minim siskoy keykey apun gok niŋyiŋgipiyn rek, biyomb gok yip pen aŋgniŋgiy rek ma ayak.
Pen kisen gos niŋiy, giyiŋgipiyn ar kun ak niŋrep giy ma giyiŋgipiyn ak niŋiy, Krays nup chiŋgiyn aŋgiy, tap chin Jiwda kilrimey giyiŋgipun kun gok kirginik.
Pen tap yerer gipun, gos yerip yerip biynimb niŋbay gok niŋen, tap day day rek ayek; Gor nep yip Jiysis Krays bi nup bap aŋgnimuŋ aŋgiy, tap yikop gok kirgiy, nup chiŋgipiyn.
Jiwda low minim apay ar ak gen amnimuŋ ak pen, yergiy keynep giy, Gor bi suŋrep nuk mindeniŋgayn? Nop chinup gos tep ñek, Ñinuk nup gosimb niŋon mey, chinup dip. Biynimb gunap low minim ar ak gon amek, chinup diniŋgamb aŋgniŋgambay ak pen, maŋgiysek kindik giniŋgiy rek ma ayip ak, Gor kuyip yergiy niŋek, tep giniŋgamb. Biynimb Ñinuk nup dipay gok nep, biynimb suŋ-tep nuk mindeniŋgambay.
Kun ak kumiy tip ak tikjaknim gos ak yomb ginimuŋ aŋgiy, Krays chinup direp gip rek, niŋrep giyn aŋgiy niŋbiyn. Nuk kumiy kilis mindek, tikjakak ak niŋrep giy, tip miker yomb diyiŋg mindrep gak ak niŋrep giy; nuk kumak ñin ak, yand yip kumnik rek ayip ak, niŋrep ginim aŋgiy niŋbiyn.
<range>
Mam ay sikop. Krays Jiysis chinup biynimb nuk gok dak ak pen, gos yand niŋbiyn ak; Gor mindrep yimb ginimimb aŋgip rek, ma mindpiyn. Pen aŋgip rek mindenim aŋgiy niŋbiyn ak mey; giyiŋgipiyn ak sakiy giy, am Gor yip mindenim aŋgiy gen amjap.
<range>
Biynimb puŋgrikind yimb aŋgiy am tap wiyn giy dinjun apay gok, gos nokom kun ak niŋiy, kilis giy nep amiy mey, wiyn giy tap dipay. Kun ak rek, am Gor yip per mindenim aŋgiy, Krays nup gosimb nokom niŋiy, kilis giy gen amjap.
Chin biynimb Gor nup chiŋgrep gipun gok maŋgiysek, gos kun ak rek nep niŋjun. Pen minim ar gunap gos key niŋeniŋgambim, Gor nimbip gos yipund giy niŋep ak yomniŋgamb.
Pen minim tep niŋiy dipun gok pisnep diy, niŋrep giyiŋg gon amnimuŋ.
Mam ay sikop. Yand gipiyn rek gi dand amiy, biynimb kun ak rek gey amimb gok niŋiy, kuyip dinimimb.
Pen biynimb chin gipun rek ma gipay gok, kuŋay mindpay. Nimbip minim kun ak nind aŋgnik ak pen, miñiy kunep mindrep ma gipay rek niŋen, yip simb yimb gip. Gos kiyk key amimb rek gun aŋgiy, Gor nup kirpay. Kiyk nambiŋ ma diy, yimb kiyk keynep dand araniy, tap man ar biy nep gos niŋiy, Jiysis chinup aŋgiy kumak ak nup, miluk niŋbay rek, miñmon timey mon key yinjap ak amniŋgambay.
<range>
Pen miñmon chin ak, Gor miñmon biyoŋ. Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays biynimb simb niŋiy dip ak apiy, chinup dand miñmon kun biyoŋ amniŋgamb aŋgiy, kond mindpun.
Nuk Bi kalrimey yimb yerip yerip giniŋg, giniŋgamb. Chinup gek, mumbwak nindnimb kuyiŋg yowip ak kirgiy, mumbwak kisenimb tep nuk rek ak diy mindoniŋgambun.
Biynimb tep yand gok. Paryomb akniy mindiy, nimbip gos niŋen yip simb gip. Gor nup minim tep aŋgñinik rek niŋbim ak, yip tep gip. Minim tep kun ak ma kirginimimb.
Yiwodiya yip Sintikiy yip. Yand nirip aspiyn: nir Biyomb chin anup gosimb niŋbiyr rek; penpen ma aŋgiy, jimñiy mindenimiyr.
Pen bi yand yip jimñiy woŋg gipur ak nip aspiyn: “Biyn omiŋal kun ak kuyip kond mindenimin, mindrep ginimiyr.” Nind biyn omiŋal kun ak, yand ak, Kilemend ak, biynimb gunap sek Gor yimb kuyip buk permindep biyaŋ tikayak gok; Gor woŋg ak jimñiy giyiŋgipun.
Gor nup gosimb niŋiy, miñmiñ giyiŋg mindenimimb. Tip ak nimbip aspiyn: miñmiñ giyiŋg mindenimimb!
Biyomb ak maŋ asaw. Mindrep giy, biynimb sayn tep kun gok key yimb mindenimimb.
Nimbip yerer gek, gos yomb ma niŋnimimb; Gor nup aŋgniŋyiŋg, tep aŋgyiŋg mindem mey,
nuk gek Ñinuk Krays nup chiŋgrep giy mindiy, gos kuŋay ma niŋiy, kapkap mindrep yimb giniŋgambim.
Mam ay sikop. Minim bap sek aŋgniŋg gispiyn. Gos gunap ma niŋnimimb. Pen: tap yerip ak niŋind yimb; tap yerip ak biyomb tep gok gipay; tap yerip ak tep; tap yerip ak gep; tap yerip ak suŋ-tep; tap yerip ak biynimb niŋey tep gip; tap yerip geniŋgambim, biynimb niŋey tep giniŋgamb, tap kun gok nep gos niŋyiŋg mindenimimb.
Tap yerip nimb yip mindiy gen niŋbik ak, minim yerip aŋgen niŋbik ak; niŋbik rek nep ginimimb. Kun geniŋgambim, Gor yip nep mindiy mey; nuk gek gos kuŋay ma niŋniŋgambim.
Yand aŋgnik-eŋ, yip sakiy gipim aŋgniŋnik ak pen, kinjeŋ ma mindek, yip maniy tap gok ma yokpik. Pen miñiy yokpim rek, yip gos niŋyiŋg mindpim ak niŋiy, Biyomb chin ak nup miñmiñ yimb gispiyn.
Ñin gunap yikop mindpiyn gos ak niŋiy ma aspiyn; yip yerer giniŋgamb ak, minim ma mindip.
Ñin gunap tap kuŋay mindip, ñin gunap ma mindip. Mindip ñin gok ñimbiyn; ma mindip ñin gok yikop mindpiyn. Gip kun ak tap kuŋay mindek akaŋ, ma mindek gos yomb ma niŋbiyn.
Pen Biyomb ak yip kond mindiy kilis ñimb ak mey, yip yerer ginimin aŋgniŋgamb ak giniŋgayn.
Pen yip tap ñimbim kun ak, tep yimb ñimbim.
Nimb niŋbim: Masedoniya propens kirgiy, Gor minim aŋgñi taŋgyiŋgipiyn ñin ak, Gor biynimb nuk mindeyak okok, gunap yip tap ma yokyiŋgipay. Nimb Piyliypay biynimb nep yip yokyiŋgipim.
Pen am Tesalonayka mindenik ñin ak, yip nind ak tap yokiy, kisen ak yokiy gipik.
Pen tap nen ma aspiyn; gos nimbik key niŋiy, tap monmon ñem, Gor nimbip miñmiñ yimb ginimuŋ aŋgiy aspiyn.
Pen bi nimb Epaprodaytas nup tap ñem, dap yip ñek mey, mindrep gipiyn. Tap ñiŋemb chech tap yand gok, miñiy kuŋay yimb mindip. Yip yokpim kun ak, Gor nup tap daŋgiy ñey, kuyrep apek nup tep giyiŋgip rek ak gipim.
Nimb Biyomb Jiysis Krays ker mindiy, yip tap yokpim ak, Nop bi gin yimb ak nimbip kond mindiy, tap yerip tikdinimuŋ gok ñinimuŋ.
Kun ak Bapiy yomb ak nup nep, yimb dand aranjun. Tep.
Biynimb Krays Jiysis ker biyomb Siysa yip mindpay gok, yip apay, “Kuyip mindpay akaŋ aŋgiy, aŋgniŋnimin apay.” Kun ak mey, Gor biynimb nuk mindpun gok maŋgiysek, nimbip Krays ker mindpim gok, “Nimb mindpim?” aspun.
<range>
Minim aŋgjiwpiyn. Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays nimbip kond mindonimuŋ.
Yand Pol. Bapiy Gor yip ñinen aŋgek, bi Jiysis Krays nup minim dand amemb ak mindpiyn. Pen miñiy mam chin Timotiy yip mindiy, nimb biynimb Krays nup chiŋgrep gipim gok minj tiksipur. Bapiy Gor, nimbip mam ay Kolosiy mindpim gok simb niŋiy, kond mindrep ginimuŋ.
<range>
Pen chir minim bap niŋbur ak, nimbip apay, “Jiysis Krays nup gosimb niŋiy, biynimb nup gok maŋgiysek wasemb aypay apay.” Kun aŋgey, chir niŋiy, per Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays Nop nup, nimbip nen aŋgniŋyiŋg, tep apur.
<range>
Yenen: Jiysis Krays minim tep yipul yimb ak, miñmon nimbip okok amek dipik ak mey, chinup simb niŋiy dip rek, direp giniŋgamb miñmon nuk biyoŋ aŋgiy, niŋrep giy gos sek kond mindpim.
Pen minim tep kun ak miñmon nimbip okok nep ma dand ambay; miñmon okok kind kind amjap. Amnakniŋ mey, kiyk kunep niŋiy, miñ tep gipim rek ak gispay.
Bi tep chin Epapras, woŋg yand gipiyn rek giyiŋg, nimbip Krays minim tep aŋgñimb ak, biy apiy aŋgak,
“Gor Kawnan ak kiy yip mindakniŋ, Krays biynimb nuk gunap kuyip wasemb aypay aŋgak.”
Aŋgek, Timotiy chir niŋiy, nimbip nen Gor nup per aŋgniŋbur. Pen chinup tep giniŋgamb ak mey, Gor Kawnan ak nimbip gos tep yimb ñonimuŋ, niŋrep giy, gos nuk ñiniŋgamb ar ak nep giniŋgambim.
Nimbip gos tep kun ak ñek, Gor miñ tep nup ak niŋrep giy mey, Biyomb chin anup tep giniŋgamb ar ak gem amniŋgamb.
Pen Biyomb yimb ak nimbip kond mindek, miker gunap apek gos kun ak ma niŋiy, chinup dek biynimb nuk mindpun aŋgiy gos sek mindiy, nup tep aŋgyiŋg nep mindenimimb.
<range>
Seytan, bi kisyim kind okok ken mindip ak, chinup tiwniŋg wos yimb giyiŋgip ak pen; Gor Ñi tep nuk ak chinup wisik yokek, miñiy biynimb nuk mindiy, melik kind okok ken mindpun.
Nuk nep mey, chinup nen kumiy, tap siy tap timey ginuk gach ak wiykyokak.
Nop Gor nup miseŋ niŋjun rek ma ayip ak pen; Ñinuk mey Nop rek mindip. Biynimb tap okok maŋgiysek kayaŋ rek mindip; Jiysis nuk koyoŋ mindiy mey, tap kun gok maŋgiysek kond mindip.
Tap semb biyoŋ, man biy; tap windin niŋbun gok, windin ma niŋbun gok; enjol, Seytan, chip kawnan, chipday, malñiluk, kichekiy tap okok maŋgiysek nuk nep gayak. Gayak kun ak yimb nuk araniŋgamb.
Miñmon ma alwol gayak ñin ak, nuk mindek. Miñiy nuk yip jimñiy, biynimb tap yerip okok mindrep giniŋgamb.
Nuk jun won rek mindamb, chin biynimb nuk gok, ñin kind tomb kind nuk gok rek mindpun. Nuk kiñiŋ giy kumiy tip tikjakak ak mey, tap yerip yerip mindip gok kayaŋ rek mindip; nuk Biyomb yimb koyoŋ mindip.
Yenen: Gor gos nuk key niŋiy gek, Ñinuk nundkaw rek nep mindiy,
mon kiros bak biyoŋ likañ yapek kumiy, biynimb akaŋ, tap yerip yerip semb biyoŋ man biy mindip gok, Gor yip jimñinimuŋ rek ayip.
Nimb nind tap siy tap timey giy, paryomb okok rek mindiy, Gor biynimb ñaŋgep nuk mindyiŋgipim.
Miñiy pen Ñinuk kumak rek, nimbip di jimñiy ayek, Gor niŋek minim bap ma mindip; biynimb suŋ-tep nuk gok mindpim.
Pen nimbip diniŋgamb minim tep ak ma kirgiy, direp gipim rek di mindiy, nup pisnep chiŋgiy gem amniŋgamb ak; biynimb tep nuk anep mindeniŋgambim. Minim tep nimbip aŋgey niŋbim kun ak, nimbip nep mer, biynimb miñmon okok kind kind aŋgñey amnak. Yand Pol kunep woŋg ar kun anep gipiyn.
Yand nimbip nen woŋg kun ak gen yip kalambis aypay ak, minim ma mindip; Krays chinup diniŋg, yiwur yomb yimb ak diy kumak. Kun ak chin kiñiŋ nokom mindpun rek, yand biynimb nup ker mindpay gok kuyip, woŋg aŋgayak rek giy miker diniŋgayn ak, minim ma mindip.
Gor nep yip aŋgek, nimbip biynimb Krays ker mindpim gok, direp giniŋg minim tep nup ak aŋgñirep gipiyn.
Minim teprep kun ak ma niŋyiŋgipay ak pen; miñiy Gor gos nuk key niŋiy, biynimb nup ker gok gos ñek; Krays chin yip nep mindeniŋgamb rek, chin am nuk yip mindrep giniŋgambun minim ak niŋrep giy mey, yip aŋgek nimbip biynimb Jiwda mer gok sesek aŋgñimbun.
<range>
Kun ak mey, biynimb okok monmon, Krays biynimb tep nuk mindey, Gor ñin ar ak ayjun aŋgiy, kuyip minim yipul kun ak aŋgñirep gipun.
Ar kun ak nep, Gor yip kond mindakniŋ, kilis giy woŋg gi mindpiyn.
Nimb Kolosiy biynimb gok diy, Leyodiysiya biynimb gok diy, biynimb jomluk yip ma niŋbim gok diy mindrep ginimimb aŋgiy, woŋg kilis giy gipiyn.
Kun ak nimb maŋgiysek gos sek mindiy, penpen wasemb ay, gosimb tep niŋiy mey, minim tep ma niŋyiŋgipay ak niŋrep yimb giniŋgambim. Minim nind ma niŋyiŋgipay kun ak mey, Krays minim tep ak nep.
Gos timund teprep ak nuk yip mindip. Biynimb nup chiŋgniŋgambay gok gos tep ñek, Gor gosimb tep nup ak niŋrep giniŋgambay.
Pen biynimb gunap tom giyiŋg, minim tep ar ak aspun aŋgey, minim yesek kiyk ak niŋnimimb rek ayip ak; nimbip aŋgrep gispiyn.
Yand miñmon paryomb biy mindpiyn ak pen, gos yand ak nimbip ker amnakniŋ, niŋyiŋg mindpiyn. Pen nimb Krays nup gosimb niŋyiŋg, jimñiy mindpim ak, yip tep gip.
Nimb Jiysis Krays nup gosimb niŋiy, Biyomb chin aŋgiy niŋbim ak mey; ar kun ak nep niŋiy gem amnimuŋ.
Nup chiŋgrep giy, minim niŋind yimb nimbip aŋgñeyak dipik ak direp giy, Gor nup tep aŋgyiŋg nep mindenimimb.
Pen niŋrep ginimimb. Biynimb gunap nimbip, Gor nup gosimb ak niŋbim ar ak kirgiy, gos chin niŋbun ar ak niŋyaŋ aŋgiy, nimbip nembnemb gi dand kind kiyk okok amey, minim tep ak tip niŋun aŋgiy kosyam niŋnimimb rek ayip. Yenen: kiyk Krays minim yipund giy ak ma apay; biynimb aŋgñiyiŋgipay ar ak niŋiy, Seytan layn nuk miseŋ ma niŋbun gok minim ak apay.
Krays mumbwak sek ak pen, Gor mindip rek yipund giy yimb mindip.
Nuk nep gek nup chiŋgiy, Gor biynimb nuk yipund giy yimb mindpim. Nuk nep mey, Biyomb yimb. Biynimb yomb, enjol yomb, tap simboŋgipay yomb gok maŋgiysek beŋ nup okok mindpay.
Nimb Krays nup diy mey, mindyiŋgipim rek ma mindpim: key yimb mindpim. Chin Jiwda biynimb kumbak tikyiŋgipun gok, biynimb tep kun gok key mindonjun aŋgiy tikyiŋgipun ak pen; nimb key yimb mindpim ak, biynimb gey kun giy ma mindpim; Krays nep gek kun giy mindpim.
Ñiŋg pikpik ak, Krays yip kumiy tip tikjakpun aŋgiy ñiŋg pikpik. Pen Gor bi kilis kun ak key yimb. Nuk Jiysis Krays nup gek tip tikjakak rek, chinup kunep gek, biynimb kim kisenimb mindpun.
Nimb nind tap siy tap timey ar anep giy, Gor yip minim aŋg amiy apiy ginimimb rek ma mindek, pisnep kumnimimb rek ayak ak pen; nuk gek Krays yip mindiy kim mindpim. Tap siy tap timey ginuk ak niŋiy kirgak ak mey;
minim keykey buk yomb biyaŋ tikayak ak wiykyokak. Minim keykey timbrikonuk, minim yomb mindek ak pen; nuk dam mon bak biyoŋ Jiysis yip sesek ayek kumak.
Kun gak rek, Seytan sek, kichekiy malñiluk tap yerip nup marik gipay gok sek wiyniym gek, pisnep apyap pikyak.
