Kun gak rek, nimb ñiŋg akaŋ tap gunap okok ñimbem, biynimb gunap nimbip aŋg sikoy ma giniŋgiy. Takin kisen wip ñin ak, ñin yomb aŋgiy asikniŋgambay akaŋ; Jiwda lotiw ñin yomb aŋgiy asikniŋgambay akaŋ; ñin yerip yerip asikniŋgambay ak; kindik ma gem nimbip aŋg sikoy geniŋgiy, gos kuŋay ma niŋnimimb.
Krays ma awak ñin ak, low minim kun ak kawnan rek niŋiy giyiŋgipay ak pen; miñiy Krays bi nonim ak pisnep miseŋ wip ak, minim kun ak rek nimbip ma aŋgniŋgiy.
Kun ak biynimb gunap biynimb yomb mindpun aŋgiy, tom giy aŋgniŋgambay, “Day niŋbun rek, chin enjol beŋ okok mindiy, kuyip lotiw gipun aŋgey,” minim kuyip ak ma dinimimb. Ak gos kiyk key niŋbay rek tom giniŋgambay.
Biynimb kun gok, Biyomb Jiysis Krays nup kirgiy mey, ar kun ak ambay. Pen nuk, Biyomb chin ak mey; chin biynimb nup ker mindpun gok di jimñiy ay, kond mindiy kilis ñamb, Gor nup tep gip ar ak gon amimb. Kun ak nuk jun won rek ak mindakniŋ, chin ñin kind tomb kind nuk gok rek mindiy, kindiy yimñi wos gakniŋ, mindrep gipun.
Krays ker mindpim ak, nuk yip kumnimbik rek ayip ak mey; Seytan layn nuk; kichekiy, chipday tap gok nimbip tiwniŋg ayiŋgipay miñ wos ak, pisnep puŋgrikip. Kun ak yenen biynimb yikop gok gos niŋbay rek niŋiy gi mindpim. Minim kilrimey nimbip apay kun ak:
“Tap ak ñin maŋgiy ma dinimimb,” “Tap ak ma ñimb niŋnimimb,” “Tap ak ma diniŋnimimb apay” ak,
minim rek ma ayip. Tap kun gok ñimbun akaŋ, yergon, tap yikop rek ayip. Minim kilrimey aŋgñimbay kun ak, biynimb gos key niŋiy apay ar ak nep aŋgñimbay.
Biynimb kun gok Gor nup ma chiŋgipay rek, lotiw yesek, gos kiyk key niŋbay rek giyiŋg, biynimb simbgeprek mindon tep giniŋgamb aŋgiy, tap asik mosik giy, kosyam mindpay. Kun gey, biynimb gunap niŋey, niŋind gispay rek ayniŋgamb ak pen; tap timey gep gos ak apek, Gor yip ma mindpay rek, tap bap kilis ñek, mindrep giniŋgiy rek ma mindip.
Pen nimb Krays yip, tip tikjakiy kim kisenimb mindpim ak, man ar biy tap gok gos ak ma niŋnimimb. Gos yomb nimb ak amnimuŋ; Krays semb biyoŋ amiy, Nop ñin yipund kind okok ken mindiy, chinup kond mindip ak nup.
<range>
Nimb Krays yip kumbik rek ayip ak mey; per mindeniŋgambim junj ak, kiy apiymiŋay yip mindip.
Kun ak chin perper mindeniŋgambun junj ak mey, Krays. Kisen nuk winiŋgamb ñin ak, am nuk yip mindrep giniŋgambun.
Krays yip kumbik rek, nuk yip mindnep mindeniŋgambim ak; monmon ma ginimimb. Biyn siy bi siy ma giy, timey ma giy, biynimb gunap tap kuyip gok yip rek mindombikop aŋgiy, gur-maniy tap gok nep dun aŋgiy ma gem amnimuŋ. Pen ar kun ak gem, biynimb tap yesek gunap aŋgniŋun aŋgiy, Gor nup kirpay rek ak giniŋgambim.
Ar kun gok gey, Gor nup tep ma gip rek, yiwur yomb diniŋgambay.
Nimb biynimb yikop mindyiŋgipim ñin ak, tap timey ar kun ak nep gos niŋiy giyiŋgipim.
Pen miñiy biynimb Krays ker kim kisenimb mindpim ak; nind miluk niŋiy, kalrimey jiwiy, penpen aŋgiy, minim timey aŋgiy, biynimb gok kuyip aŋg sikoy giy, wasik aŋgiy giyiŋgipim rek ma ginimimb.
Minim yesek aŋgiy, pen aŋgek pen aŋgek giyiŋgipim ak, kunep ma aŋgnimimb.
Krays yip kumbik rek ayip kun ak, timey giyiŋgipim miñ nimbip kom kom gak ak, nuk chech wor ayip band rek ak tuŋgasik yokak. Tuŋgasik yokiy, kim kisenimb bap rek ayñak ak mey, miñiy gos nup ak niŋrep giyiŋg, kim kisenimb rek ayiŋg, Biyomb tap maŋgiysek gayak ak mindip rek mindniŋg gispim.
Chinup kun gip rek, Jiwda biynimb gok key, Jiwda biynimb mer gok key ma mindpun. Biynimb kumbak tikpay gok key, biynimb kumbak ma tikpay gok key ma mindpun. Biynimb taw dam ayey woŋg yikop giñimbay gok key, biynimb gos key niŋiy woŋg gipay gok key ma mindpun. Biynimb riyt rayt gipay gok key, biynimb riyt rayt ma gipay gok key ma mindpun. Chin maŋgiysek kim kisenimb rek ay, Krays Biyomb chin ak yip nep mindpun.
Kun ak Gor nimbip diy, biynimb suŋ-tep yand aŋgiy, wasemb ay mindip ak; yimb nimbik key ma dand aranimimb. Biynimb sayn tep nuk gok mindiy, biynimb gok kuyip simb niŋiy, direp giy, nimbip timey geniŋgiy miluk ma niŋnimimb.
Biynimb Krays ker mindpay gunap, nimbip timey rek geniŋgiy, gos kun ak ma niŋnimimb. Minim gunap mindonimuŋ; Biyomb ak nimb timey gem niŋiy kirgak rek, kuyip kunep niŋiy kirginimimb.
Pen tap yomb yimb ak, biynimb wasemb aynimimb. Kun gem mey, minim gunap ap ar kun ak jimñiniŋgamb.
Krays nimbip kond mindip nen, gos yomb ma niŋnimimb. Biynimb yand gok jimñiy mindiy, mindrep giniŋgambay aŋgiy, nimbip dek jimñiy mindpim ak, gos gunap ma niŋnimimb. Gor nup tep aŋgyiŋg nep mindenimimb.
Krays minim tep ak, namb nimbip biyaŋ aranjakiy rek mindonimuŋ. Minim nup ak niŋrep yimb giy mey, penpen aŋgñirep giyiŋg, Gor nup yimb dand aranemb kamep saŋ salik gunap, Baybol buk “Sam” apay gunap aŋgyiŋg mindenimimb.
Pen minim aŋgniŋg akaŋ, yerer giniŋg, Biyomb Jiysis ker mindpun aŋgiy, kuyip apiymiŋay tep aŋgyiŋg gem amnimuŋ.
Krays ker mindpun ak, nimb biyn gok Biyomb chin ak nup tep ginimuŋ aŋgiy, naŋgumiy sikop minim aŋgniŋgiy ak kindik ginimimb.
Pen nimb bi gok, biyn nimb gok kuyip minim kilis giy ma aŋgnimimb; kuyip wasemb aynimimb.
Pen nimb ñapan gok, nap nanim aŋgniŋgiy rek niŋdinimimb. Kun geniŋgambim mey, Biyomb chin anup tep giniŋgamb.
Pen nimb nop sikop, ñapan nimb gok kuyip minim kilis giy aŋgem aŋgem, gos timey niŋiy, mind tep ma giniŋgiy rek ayip ak; niŋrep ginimimb.
Nimbip biynimb kalambis rek ay dand amey, biyomb gunap kuyip woŋg yikop giñimbim gok; niŋmindyakniŋ won anep woŋg gon, kuyip tep ginimuŋ aŋgiy, ma ginimimb; Biyomb chin semb biyoŋ ak niŋmindip rek, girep gun aŋgiy, tep gakniŋ ginimimb.
Nuk nep nimbip direp giniŋgamb ak mey; tap yerip yerip ginimimb okok, biyomb man ar biy gunap niŋey tep gaŋ aŋgiy ma ginimimb; Biyomb semb biyoŋ anup woŋg gispun aŋgiy ginimimb. Woŋg giñispim ak; Biyomb semb biyoŋ anup giñispim.
<range>
Pen Gor nuk biynimb timey giniŋgambay gok kor niŋniŋg; biynimb yomb gok, biynimb sikoy gok aŋgiy, ma kor giniŋgamb; ar nokom giy, yiwur ñiniŋgamb.
Kun ak nimb biyomb rek mindpim gok, Biyomb nimb semb biyoŋ mindip anup pirikiy, bi nimbip woŋg giñimbay gok kuyip kond mindrep giy, tap kuyip ñemb rek ak monmon ñinimimb.
Kolosiy biynimb. Gor nup aŋgniŋyiŋg nep mindenimimb. Gos sek mindiy, Gor nup aŋgniŋyiŋg, tep aŋgyiŋg mindenimimb.
Chinup kunep Gor nup aŋgniŋ mindem, kinjeŋ yomek, Krays biynimb miñmon okok kuyip kunep diniŋgamb minim tep ak; aŋgñiyiŋg nep mindenjun. Minim kun ak nep aŋgen, yip kalambis ayeyak mindpiyn.
Pen nup aŋgniŋem, yip kond mindakniŋ, minim kun ak aŋgrep gen, biynimb niŋrep giniŋgiy.
Pen nimb biynimb Krays ker ma mindpay gok kuyip aŋgrep gem, Gor nup gosimb ak niŋniŋgiy.
Gor nimbip kond mindakniŋ, meŋg miŋgan nimbik ak sol yindik rek ayonimuŋ; nimbip minim yerip rek aŋgniŋeniŋgambay, kuyip aŋgñirep yimb giniŋgambim.
Mam tep Tikiykas, woŋg yand gipiyn rek gip anup, yoken jap. Mindpim ak amiy, yand yergiy rek mindpiyn ak nimbip aŋgñek niŋiy, miñmiñ gim aŋgiy yoksipiyn.
<range>
Pen mam tep Oniysmas, bi nimbik key ak yip niniŋgayr. Amiy, tap yerip yerip akniy gisap ak maŋgiysek, nimbip aŋgñirep giniŋgambiyr.
Bi Ariystakas, yand yip kalambis mindpur ak sek, bi chin Mak sek nimbip, “Mindpim?” apiyr. Mak mey, bi chin Banabas numind nuk ak. Bi kun anep nind minim yokiy aŋgnik, “Nup kayaŋ ak amjakek dinimimb aŋgnik.”
Bi chin Josiwa yimb nup bap Jastas apay ak kunep, nimbip, “Mindpim?” aŋgip. Bi chin omiŋal nokom kun ak kuyipyakam niŋen yip tep gip. Yenen: Jiwda gunap yip gosow gosow niŋiy jimñiy ma woŋg gipun; kiykyakam nep yand yip, Gor biynimb diy kond mindeniŋgamb minim ak aŋgñimbun.
Bi nimb Epapras, Jiysis Krays nup woŋg gip ak, nimbip, “Mindpim?” aŋgip. Nuk per nimbip Gor nup aŋgniŋiy aŋgip, “Kiyk gos gunap ma niŋiy; nip chiŋgrep yimb giy, niŋrep yimb giy, apan rek nep gey amnimuŋ aŋgip.”
Yand nup niŋbiyn; nuk kilis giy nimbip woŋg giy, Leyodiysiya biynimb kuyip woŋg giy, Hiyrapoliys biynimb kuyip woŋg giy gip.
Pen Demas yip, bi tep yand dokta Luk yip nimbip, “Mindpim?” apiyr.
Leyodiysiya kay Krays ker mindiy mam ay apun gok, biynimb ap biyn Niympa korip lotiw apay gok maŋgiysek, “Pol nimbip, ‘Mindpim?’ aŋgip aŋgnimimb.”
Nimbip minj yoksipiyn biy niŋiy, ñem amek, Leyodiysiya biynimb Krays ker mindpay gok kunep niŋniŋgiy. Pen Leyodiysiya biynimb kuyip minj yokpiyn ak, nimb kunep diy niŋnimimb.
Pen Akiypas nup aŋgnimimb, “Biyomb woŋg nip aŋgak ak gi dinimin aŋgnimimb.”
Yand Pol, miñiy ñin maŋgiy yand ak key, minim day won biy tiksipiyn. Yip sen diy miñ wos aypay ak, yip sakiy ma ginimimb. Gor nimbip kond mindonimuŋ.
Chin Pol, Salas, Timotiy nimbip Tesalonayka biynimb Gor Biyomb chin apiymiŋay ak ker mindpim gok, minj tiksipun. Gor apiymiŋay nimbip simb niŋiy direp ger, mindrep ginimimb.
Chin per Gor nup aŋgniŋniŋg nimbip sakiy ma gipun, gos niŋmindiy, nup tep aŋgyiŋg kuyip maŋgiysek kond mindrep ginimin apun.
Pen nimb Gor nup gosimb niŋiy, aŋgip rek giyiŋg, biynimb gok kuyip wasemb ay direp giyiŋg, Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays andkind winiŋgamb aŋgiy kond mindem amjap ak; Bapiy Gor nup aŋgniŋyiŋg tep apun.
Chin niŋbun: nimb mey, mam ay Gor wasemb ay dak gok mindpim.
Pen chin Gor ker mindiy mindrep gipun rek, kiyk kunep mindeniŋgiy aŋgiy, minim tep ak dand amiy Kawnan nuk ak chinup gos ñek, nimbip minim yipund giy yimb ak aŋgñon niŋiy dipik.
Diy mey, Biyomb chin gip miñ ar ak sek, chin key gipun miñ ar ak sek kisen gipim.
Gipim kun ak, biynimb Krays nup gosimb niŋbay Akaya propens ak sek, Masedoniya propens ak sek niŋiy kunep gipay.
Pen nimb Biyomb ak nup gosimb niŋem, nuk gek mindrep gipim minim ak; miñmon okok kunep amjap. Miñmon gunap amjakon, biynimb kun okok key kesim diy apay,
“Tesalonayka biynimb kuyip minim tep ak aŋgñenbik, nimbip direp giy, tap yesek aŋgniŋyiŋgipay gok kirgiy, Biyomb permindep ak nup nep aŋgniŋiy, direp giyiŋg,
Ñinuk kumek Nop gek tikjakak ak andkind asaw aŋgiy, kond mindpay apay.” Jiysis kun ak nep chinup kond mindip rek, yiwur yomb ak ma diniŋgambun.
Mam ay sikop. Nimb key niŋbim: nind miñmon nimb ak amiy, Jiysis minim tep ak aŋgñon, niŋiy dipik.
Ñin kun ak miñmon Piyliypay nind amiy aŋgñonuk, biynimb gunap chinup minim timey aŋgiy, timey giyak ak pen; Gor chinup kond mindek, gos kun ak ma niŋiy, miñmon nimbip Tesalonayka am aŋgñonuk kunep giyak ak pen, monmon aŋgñinuk.
Kun ak niŋim! Minim nimbip apun ak yesek aŋgiy, tap nimbip gok diniŋg akaŋ, timey giniŋg ma aŋgñinuk; minim tep ak niŋyaŋ aŋgiy aŋgñinuk.
Minim chin key ak aŋgon, biynimb gok kuyip tep gaŋ aŋgiy ma aŋgñinuk; Gor yergiy rek mindpay ak key niŋimb rek, chinup woŋg aŋgayek, nimbip aŋgñinuk.
Nimb key niŋbim: minim nep aŋgon kuyip tep ginimuŋ aŋgiy, nimbip ma aŋgñinuk. Maniy tap gok dun aŋgiy akaŋ, yimb yomb dun aŋgiy ma aŋgñinuk ak, Gor kunep niŋimb.
<range>
Pen bi Jiysis minim dand amemb mindpun ak, nimbip minim kasek aŋgniŋg apnup ak pen, kun ma ginuk. Biyn gok ñapan kiyk key tikiy, diraŋgrep gipay rek ak ginuk.
Nimbip wasemb ay aŋgnuk, “Kuyip minim tep ak aŋgñon, biynimb gunap chinup ñaŋgniŋg ñaŋgniŋgiy aŋgiy, nimbip aŋgñinuk.”
Mam ay sikop. Nimb niŋbim: nimb yip mindiy, kosyam tap keñmaŋgiy chinup pipaŋg dap ñiniŋgambay aŋgiy, pumbnamb Gor biynimb diniŋgamb minim tep ak nimbip aŋgñi taŋgyiŋgipun; kisyimken maniy woŋg giy tap ñimbyiŋgipun.
Chin nimb biynimb Jiysis nup gosimb niŋbim gok yip mindyiŋg, kapkap mindrep giy, tap timey akaŋ, tap minim aŋgniŋgiy rek bap ma ginuk.
Nop sikop ñapan kiyk key aŋgñirep gipay rek nimbip ginuk.
Gor chinup diyn aŋgiy dek, biynimb nuk yip perper mindoniŋgambun gok mindpun ak; kapkap mindiy, aŋgip rek ginjun aŋgnuk.
Pen nimbip minim tep aŋgñonuk; minim kiyk key ma aspay, Gor minim tep ak aspay aŋgiy dipik ak mey; Gor nimbip kond mindakniŋ, aŋgip rek gipim. Kun ak Gor nup tep aŋgyiŋg mindpun.
Pen mam ay sikop. Biynimb chin Jiwdiya akay, chinup biynimb Jiysis nup nind gosimb niŋnuk gok timey giyak rek, miñiy Tesalonayka biynimb gok nimbip gispay.
Pen Jiwda biynimb gok Gor nup miluk niŋiy, biynimb okok miluk niŋiy gipay. Kiyk bi Gor minim aŋgep gok kuyip ñaŋgiy, Biyomb chin Jiysis nup ñaŋgiy, chinup yukyokyak.
Biynimb Jiwda mer gok kuyip, Gor nup gosimb niŋniŋgiy aŋgiy aŋgon, Jiwda biynimb kun gok kal jiwiy, timey yimb nep gipay. Gipay kun ak, Gor gek miker yomb yimb ak kuyip dip.
Mam ay sikop. Nimb yip mindon, Jiwda biynimb chinup yuk keykey yokyak ak, simb gakniŋ mindpun. Nimbip am niŋiy owun aŋgiy, gos ak niŋmindpun.
Yand Pol per gos kun ak niŋbiyn ak pen, Seytan kinjeŋ tikip.
Pen nimbip sakiy ma gipun: tep gakniŋ gos niŋyiŋg mindpun. Biyomb chin winiŋgamb ñin ak, nup tap yerip rek ñoniŋgambun; tep giniŋgamb? Nimbip nep. Nimb biynimb nuk mindeniŋgambim ak niŋek, tep giniŋgamb.
<range>
Pen nimbip am niŋun aŋgiy, kasek amemb rek ma ayek, nimbip simb niŋiy, chirmiŋay miñmon Atens mindiy, mam Timotiy bi Gor woŋg giy, Krays minim aŋgñirep gip anup, aŋgyokor nak. Pen nup aŋgruk, “Jiysis gosimb ak niŋiy aŋgip rek gipay ak, kuyip timey gispay. Nand am kiy yip mindiy, aŋgñirep gey, mindrep giniŋgiy.
<range>
Yikop ak, Gor nup kirginiŋgambay rek ayip aŋgruk.” Pen nimb niŋbim: biynimb Jiysis minim ma dipay gok, chinup timey gipay kun ak, giniŋgambay aŋgak rek nep gipay.
Pen nimb yip mindiy, kisen chinup timey giniŋgambay aŋgnuk ak, nimb key niŋbim.
Kun gipay kun ak niŋiy, bi timey Seytan gek, minim kosyam aŋgñen niŋbik ak kirginimimb rek ayek niŋiy, Timotiy nup aŋgen am nimbip aŋgñirep giy awak.
Pen nimbip am niŋiy apiy aŋgip, “Gor nup gosimb niŋiy, biynimb gok kuyip wasemb ay, niripmiŋay miñmiñ yimb gipay. Nirmiŋay par akniy mindiy, kuyip simb niŋbiyr rek, kiy pen miñmon kiyk okok mindiy, niripmiŋay simb niŋbay aŋgip.”
Pen biynimb Jiysis nup gosimb ma niŋbay gok, chinup timey giniŋg gey mindrep ma ginuk ñin ak, Timotiy apiy, nimb Gor yip jimñiy mindpim minim ak aŋgek, chinup mindmaŋgiy lim gip.
Gor nup per kun ak rek chiŋgiy mindeniŋgambim, tep yimb gakniŋ nep mindoniŋgambun.
Mindrep gipim kun ak Gor nup tep aŋgyiŋg, miñmiñ yimb gipun.
Tip am nimbip niŋiy aŋgrep gon, mindrep yimb ginimimb aŋgiy, Gor nup pumbnamb kisyimken aŋgniŋ mindpun.
Kun ak Gor apiymiŋay chinup kinjeŋ yomer, mindpim ak ninjun.
Biyomb chin ak nimbip gos tep yimb ñek, nimbip wasemb yimb aypun rek, nimb key penpen wasemb ay, biynimb okok kuyip wasemb ay ginimimb.
Nimbip kond mindiy, kond mind dand amiy, enjol suŋ-tep nuk gok diy andkind winiŋgamb ñin ak niŋek, biynimb suŋ-tep, minim ma mindip gok nep mindenimimb.
Mam ay sikop. Nimb yip mindonuk ñin ak, Biyomb chin Jiysis chinup gos ñek, nimbip Gor yip yergiy mindrep gipay minim ak, aŋgñon niŋbik. Niŋiy, nuk yip mindrep giyiŋgipim rek, miñiy ar kun ak nep gem amnimuŋ.
<range>
Gor biynimb nuk mindpim ak, aŋgip rek suŋ-tep mindonjun aŋgiy, biyn siy bi siy ma nep ginimimb.
Kun ak mindrep giyiŋg, bi gok biyn nimb nokom nokom keykey diy, mindrep ginimimb.
Biynimb Gor nup gosimb ma niŋbay gok, biyn siy bi siy dinjun aŋgiy, gi tapay rek ma ginimimb.
Bi biyn sek gok, biyn kiyk akaŋ, biyn bi sek gok, bi kiyk ak siy ma dinimimb. Biynimb gunap kun ak rek geniŋgambay, Gor kuyip yiwur ñiniŋgamb ak, nimbip nind aŋgrep ginuk.
Tap siy tap timey giyaŋ aŋgiy chinup ma dak; biynimb yand yimb mindiy, mindrep giniŋgiy aŋgiy dak.
Biynimb minim aspun kun biy kirginiŋgambay gok; minim chinup ak ma kirginiŋgambay; Gor Biyomb Kawnan suŋ-tep nuk nimbip yokip anup minim ak kirginiŋgambay.
Biynimb Jiysis ker mindpay gok kuyip wasemb ay, dinimimb aŋgiy minj tikjun ak pen; Gor gos tep ñek, key niŋiy penpen wasemb aypim.
Biynimb nup Masedoniya propens mindpay gok kunep niŋiy dipim. Ar kun ak nep gem amnimuŋ.
Pen nimbip aŋgnuk rek, biynimb gok yip kapkap mindrep ginjun aŋgiy gem amnimuŋ. Woŋg wariy nimb gok key giy tap ñiŋnimimb. Kun ak tap keñmaŋgiy, maniy nimb gok key mindakniŋ, tap nen asimb ma aŋgraŋgem mey; biynimb Jiysis nup ma niŋbay gok, nimbip niŋey tep giniŋgamb.
<range>
Pen mam ay sikop. Nimbip minim bap aŋgñirep ginim. Biynimb nimb gunap kumeniŋgiy, pisnep kumbay aŋgiy, biynimb gunap simb gek siy apay rek ma aŋgnimimb.
Jiysis kumiy pisnep ma kumak. Nop gek tikjakiy kim mindip aŋgiy niŋbim rek, biynimb nup gosimb niŋiy kumbay gok, kunep kim mindpay aŋgiy niŋbun. Kun ak Jiysis andkind winiŋgamb ñin ak, Nop gek biynimb nuk kun gok dand sesek winiŋgamb aŋgiy, niŋrep gipun.
Pen Biyomb chin ak minim aŋgñiyiŋgip rek niŋbun: chin biynimb kim mindnukniŋ winiŋgamb gok, biynimb nind kumyak gok kuyip ma kiriŋg amniŋgambun; jimñiy aranjak amniŋgambun.
Minim bap kun biyoŋ nimb “Miñiy” aŋgiy mey, enjol yomb ak kumb gawil gakniŋ, Gor biykul ak aŋgakniŋ winiŋgamb. Biynimb Krays ker mindiy kumyak gok, tikjakiy semb biyoŋ aranjak amniyakniŋ,
chin biynimb nuk kim mindoniŋgambun gok kiy yip wilikiy, aranjak am Biyomb chin ak yip perper mindoniŋgambun.
Kun ak nen: minim aspun kun biy penpen aŋg amiy apiy giy, biynimb chin Krays ker mindiy kumbay gok, yerginiŋgamb aŋgiy gos yomb ak ma niŋnimimb; gos sek mindenimimb.
Pen mam ay sikop, ñin akay winiŋgamb, biynimb yerer giyakniŋ winiŋgamb ak, nimbip ma aŋgniŋgayn;
nimb key niŋbim: winiŋgamb kun ak, nup kond mindeniŋgambay ñin ak ma winiŋgamb. Bi tap siy dep gok, biynimb kin ambay won ak opay rek ak winiŋgamb.
Chinup miñiy tap bap ma giniŋgamb aŋgniŋgambay ñin ak apek, gos yomb yimb niŋniŋgambay. Kasek yiŋgen rek diy winiŋgamb kun ak, biyn ñapan tikniŋg gey yiwur gip rek ak giniŋgamb; pirik amniŋgiy rek ma ayniŋgamb.
Pen mam ay sikop. Nimb kisyim wip kind ak ma mindpim; miñmon yowip kind ak mindpim. Kun ak ñin yomb kun ak apek, biynimb gunap pirikiy gos yomb niŋniŋgambay rek, chin kunep ma niŋjun.
Chin Seytan ñapan nuk gok windin koy mindpay rek ma mindpun: chin Gor ñapan nuk windin sek mindpun.
Biynimb gunap kinamiy mindpay rek ma mindonjun; niŋrep giy mindonjun.
Biynimb wisin kinbay gok, kisyimken nep kinbay. Biynimb ñiŋg kilis ñimbiy sakiy aypay gok, kisyimken nep ñimbay.
Pen chin biynimb pumbnamb tapun gok, gosimb niŋyiŋg mindenjun. Biyomb anup gosimb niŋiy wasemb ay gon mey, chinup boŋg rek giniŋgamb. Chinup di nop yip jimñiy ayniŋgamb aŋgiy niŋmindiy mey, kim amniŋgambun.
Gor chinup yiwur yomb diyaŋ aŋgiy ma aŋgak; Ñiyand Jiysis Krays kuyip tuŋgasik dinimuŋ aŋgiy aŋgak.
Pen chinup aŋgiy kumak ak, kim mindon winiŋgamb akaŋ, kumon winiŋgamb ak minim ma mindip; am nuk yip mindiy mindnep mindoniŋgambun.
Pen nimb Gor biynimb nuk gunap kuyip niŋem simb gonimuŋ, minim tiksipiyn biy per gipim rek penpen aŋgñirep giy, Jiysis nup chiŋgrep giy, mindrep ginimimb.
Mam ay sikop. Biyomb nimbip kosyam minim tuŋgasikyiŋg, minim aŋgñiyiŋg mindpay gok, kuyip ma kirginimimb. Gor key aŋgek woŋg kun gipay ak; kuyip wasemb ay direp ginimimb. Pen nimb maŋgiysek kapkap jimñiy mindenimimb.
<range>
Biynimb woŋg ma giy mindrep ma gipay gok kuyip, minim kilis aŋgnimimb. Biynimb simb gek gospar ay mindpay gok kuyip, kapkap aŋgñirep ginimimb. Biynimb kisen Gor nup gosimb niŋsipay gok kuyip, kunep aŋgñirep ginimimb. Minek minek aŋgñiyiŋg yiruk ma niŋnimimb.
Biynimb gunap nimbip timey geniŋgiy, pen timey ma ginimimb. Biynimb nimb key gok yip mindrep gipim rek, biynimb yikop gok yip kunep mindrep ginimimb.
Jiysis Krays biynimb nuk mindpim ak, Gor mindip aŋgiy miñmiñ giyiŋg, nup aŋgniŋyiŋg mindem, nimbip yerer gek nup tep aŋgnimimb. Kun gem mey, nup tep yimb giniŋgamb.
<range>
<range>
Gor Kawnan chinup gos ñinimuŋ aŋgiy niŋyiŋg mindenimimb.
Biynimb Gor minim aŋgep gok minim aŋgeniŋgiy ma kirginimimb.
Pen biynimb gunap yesek aŋgniŋgiy rek ayip ak, niŋrep yimb ginimimb. Gor minim yipund giy ak aŋgeniŋgiy niŋiy dinimimb; yesek aŋgeniŋgiy ma dinimimb. Timey ar gunap ma nep ginimimb.
<range>
Gor Biyomb biynimb direp gip ak nup aŋgniŋiy apun, “Tesalonayka biynimb nip gosimb niŋbay gok kuyip, kond mindenimin ñin ar nip ak mindey, kuyip kond mindrep yimb ginimin. Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays andkind winiŋgamb ñin ak, minim bap ma mindek; gos kuŋay ma niŋniŋgiy apun.” Chin niŋbun: gos nuk key niŋiy nimbip dak ak, apun apun rek nimbip giniŋgamb. Pen nuk aŋgip rek nep gip ak, nimbip kond mindeniŋgamb ak mey, gos sek mindenimimb.
<range>
Mam ay sikop. Chinup gos niŋiy, Gor nup aŋgniŋnimimb.
Mam ay gunap kuyip niŋiy aŋgnimimb, “Pol bi gok minj tikiy apay, ‘Nimb mindpim?’ apay aŋgnimimb.”
Biyomb chin ak niŋmindip rek nimbip aspiyn, minj tiksipiyn kun biy, mam ay gok kuyip maŋgiysek riytiym gem niŋniŋgiy.
Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays nimbip simb niŋiy, direp giyiŋg mindonimuŋ.
Chin Pol, Salas, Timotiy nimbip Tesalonayka biynimb Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays apiymiŋay ker mindpim gok, minj tiksipun.
Chinup tep gip ak; kiy apiymiŋay nimbip simb niŋiy kond minder, ñin ar kuyipapiy ak mindiy, mindrep ginimimb.
Pen mam ay sikop. Jiysis nup chiŋgrep giyiŋg gem amjap ak chinup tep gip. Biynimb nup ker mindpay gok kuyip, wasemb ay direp yimb gipim ak; Gor nup tep aŋgyiŋg nep mindpun.
Gor ker mindem, biynimb gunap nimbip timey gey kosyam mindpim ak pen; gos kun ak ma niŋiy, nup chiŋgrep yimb gipim. Kun ak biynimb Gor ker miñmon keykey gok per apun, “Tesalonayka biynimb Gor nup gosimb niŋbay gok, nup chiŋgrep yimb gipay apun.”
Mindrep gipim kun ak, biynimb nuk mindpun aŋgem nimbip miker ñiyiŋg nep mindpay rek; Gor bi per minim tuŋgasikrep gip ak, nimbip biynimb yand yimb aŋgiy diniŋgamb.
Pen nuk Biyomb mindip rek, miñ yipund giniŋgamb ar ak nep giniŋgamb ak mey; biynimb nimbip miker ñiyiŋg mindpay gok kuyip, pen kunep miker ñiniŋgamb.
Pen chin biynimb nuk miker diyiŋg nep mindpun gok, direp yimb giniŋgamb. Ñin kun ak Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays, enjol kalrimey nuk gok poŋind mon maŋlaŋ rek yinakniŋ winiŋgamb.
Biynimb Nop nup kirgiy, Biyomb chin Jiysis nup minim tep ak kirgiy, timey ar ak gey amimb gok, yiwur yomb ñiniŋgamb.
Biynimb kun gok tip tep nuk mindeniŋgamb siŋak, amniŋgiy rek ma ayniŋgamb; per gol okok mindiy, yiwur yomb diyiŋg mindeniŋgambay.
Pen winiŋgamb ñin kun ak tikiy, biynimb nuk gok, gos kiyk ak am nup kom kom gakniŋ, miñmiñ yimb giyiŋg, yimb nup dand aranyiŋg pernep mindeniŋgambay. Pen nimb minim nup ak aŋgonuk niŋbik rek, chin yip kun giniŋgambun.
Ar kun ak Gor nup per aŋgniŋiy apun, “Nand Biyomb mindpan rek, Tesalonayka biynimb key niŋay dinak gok kond mindenimin, biynimb tep nak gok mindiy, niripapiy gosimb niŋyiŋg, woŋg tep yerip yerip giniŋgiy gok amrep ginimuŋ apun.”
Gor nup aŋgniŋbun kun ak; kiy apiymiŋay nimbip simb niŋiy direp gipiyr rek, yimb kuyip apiymiŋay ak sek, nimbip ak sek aranimuŋ apun.
Mam ay sikop. Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays andkind apiy chinup yipruŋg dek, nuk yip mindoniŋgambun minim ak niŋyiŋg mindenimimb.
Pen biynimb gunap ñin yomb nuk pisnep wip aŋgiy, nimbip yesek aŋgeniŋgiy, gos yomb kun ak ma niŋnimimb. Gor gos ñek aspun akaŋ, Pol bi gok minj bap tikiy minim kun ak rek aŋgey aspun aŋgeniŋgiy; minim kuyip ak ma dinimimb. Chin minj kun ak rek aŋgiy ma tikpun. Ñin yomb kun ak winiŋg gakniŋ, biynimb kuŋaynep Gor nup kirgiy, monmon giniŋgambay. Kun giyakniŋ, bi timey Gor low timbrikep mon key yinjap amniŋgamb ak niŋniŋgambay.
<range>
Bi timey kun ak Gor sek, tap yerip tap yomb aŋgiy aŋgniŋbay gok sek aŋgsikoy giy, yand nep biyomb aŋgiy; am Gor aŋgniŋep korip ak am bisgiy, yand mey Gor aŋgniŋgamb.
Nimb yip mindiy, bi kun ak nind ap kun giniŋgamb aŋgiy aŋgnik ak pen; sakiy gipim rek ayip.
Nimb niŋbim: tap bap kinjeŋ tikip ak mey; miñiy kun ginimuŋ rek ma ayip. Gor nuk key aŋgayak ñin ak apek, kun giniŋgamb.
Pen miñiy ñin biy, bi low timbrikep apek giniŋgambay ar ak gispay ak pen, kisen nep gispay. Bi kinjeŋ timey kun gok rek tikip ak mindakniŋ, bi low timbrikep ak, biynimb gok tapin kind nuk okok dand amnimuŋ rek ma ayip. Pen Gor bi kinjeŋ tikip kun ak nup dand key okok amek, bi low timbrikep ak, Gor aŋgip ar ak pisnep kirgiy, ar ak key gek amniŋgamb. Timey yimb giniŋgambay ñin kun ak, biynimb yikop gok Gor giniŋgamb aŋgak rek nep gisap aŋgiy, niŋniŋgiy rek ma ayniŋgamb. Pen chinup per gos tep ñek niŋbun rek, ñek niŋniŋgambun. Bi low timbrikep kun ak winiŋgamb ak pen; Jiysis mokyaŋ giy apiy minim aŋgek, pisnep apyowniŋgamb.
<range>
Pen Seytan bi timey kun ak nup ambaŋ ayek, biynimb gok kuyip yesek aŋgiyn aŋgiy, tap mageprek yesek gok giniŋgamb. Gakniŋ, biynimb wal yimb aŋgyakniŋ aŋgniŋgamb, “Yand mey biyomb aŋgniŋgamb.”
Aŋgek, biynimb pisnep kumniŋgambay gok, niŋind aŋgip aŋgiy niŋniŋgambay. Pen minim nup ak kirgiy, Gor minim ak tep aŋgiy dembiyap: Gor kuyip dipkop.
Yenen, minim niŋind yimb ak kirgiy, minim yesek niŋun aŋgiy giniŋgambay kun ak; Gor gek ar kun ak tapin gey amniŋgamb.
Kun ak mey, biynimb minim niŋind yimb nup ak kirgiy, minim yesek kun ak niŋey tep giniŋgamb gok, maŋgiysek yiwur yomb yimb ak diniŋgambay.
Pen chin per nimbip Biyomb chin ak wasemb ayip rek niŋiy, Gor nup tep aŋgjun. Nimbip simb niŋiy diniŋg, Kawnan nuk ak yokek, ap nimbip gos ñek mey, nup gosimb niŋiy, biynimb suŋ-tep nuk yimb mindpim. Kun ak, nup aŋgniŋiy, tep aŋgjun.
Pen Gor nuk key nimbip niŋay, Ñiyand ak yip perper mindrep giyaŋ aŋgiy gek, minim tep ak nimbip aŋgonuk niŋbik.
Kun ak mey mam ay sikop. Gor gek, Ñinuk yip mindrep giniŋgambun kun ak, minim aŋgñon niŋbik ak sek, minj tikiy aŋgon niŋbik ak sek niŋiy, mindrep ginimimb.
Bapiy yomb apiymiŋay chinup gos niŋiy kond mindrep gipiyr ak, chinup per kond mindeniŋgayr aŋgiy, gos sek mindpun.
Kun ak Tesalonayka biynimb, Gor apiymiŋay nimbip kond minder, woŋg kuyipapiy ak ma kirgiy, minim tep aŋgyiŋg, woŋg tep giyiŋg nep mindenimimb.
Mam ay sikop. Minim bap aspun ak, chinup Gor nup aŋgniŋyiŋg mindenimimb. Nimbip Jiysis minim aŋgñon niŋiy dem, biynimb kuŋaynep nimbip niŋiy kunep dey, Jiysis minim tep ak aŋgey kind kind amnak rek, miñiy akniy aŋgon kunep ginimuŋ.
Pen bap nup aŋgniŋem, bi timey mindrep ma gipay gok, chinup tap bap giniŋgiy rek ma aynimuŋ. Yenen: biynimb maŋgiysek Gor nup gosimb ma niŋbay.
Pen Biyomb chin ak nuk bi biynimb kond mindep ak mey, nimbip kond mindakniŋ, Seytan nimbip timey ginimuŋ rek ma ayniŋgamb.
Pen chinup gos ñek niŋiy apun ar ak nep giyiŋg mindenimimb.
Nup aŋgniŋiy apun, “Kuyip gos tep ñenimin, nand biynimb wasemb aypan rek niŋiy, Ñinak yiwur yomb dak ak pen; minim nip ma kirgak rek niŋiy, kiyk kunep giniŋgiy apun.”
Mam ay sikop. Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays aŋgñinimimb aŋgak rek nimbip aspun. Mam gunap woŋg ma giy yikop nep giraŋgiy, apun rek ma geniŋgiy, kiy yip minim minim ma aŋgnimimb.
Nimb key niŋbim: chin nimb yip mindiy giyiŋgipun ar ak geniŋgambim, tep giniŋgamb. Chin yikop ma mindyiŋgipun.
Biynimb gunap tap keñmaŋgiy kuyip yikop ma ñiŋjun aŋgiy, pumbnamb kisyimken tiŋiy yiwur giy nep tap ñimbyiŋgipun.
Gor woŋg gipun rek, nimbip aŋgniŋiy tap monmon diy ñimbinup ak pen; nimbip miñ tep ar ak yomon niŋyaŋ aŋgiy, key tiŋiy yiwur giy tap ñimbyiŋgipun.
Pen nimb yip mindiy aŋgnuk, “Biynimb woŋg ma giniŋgiy gok tap ma ñiŋniŋgiy aŋgnuk” ak niŋbim.
Minim bap niŋbun ak; biynimb nimb gunap woŋg ma giy, yikop nep mindiy, biynimb aŋgjiwpay.
Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays mindip rek, biynimb kun gok kuyip minim kilis giy aspun ak, woŋg key giy, tap ñimbyiŋg kapkap mindrep giniŋgiy.
Pen mam ay sikop. Gor nup yenen woŋg gispun aŋgiy yiruk ma niŋiy, mindrep giyiŋg gem amnimuŋ.
Minim minj tikiy aspun biy, biynimb gunap ma niŋeniŋgiy, kuyip minim minim ma aŋgnimimb; yikop mindem kuyip nambiŋ ginimuŋ.
Pen kuyip miluk ma niŋnimimb; mam chin aŋgiy aŋgñirep ginimimb.
Biyomb biynimb kond mindek mindrep gipay ak, nimbip kond mindonimuŋ, mindrep giyiŋg nep mindenimimb.
Yand Pol. Minj day biy yand key tikiy, “Nimb mindpim?” aspiyn. Minj yand tikpiyn ak, per kun biy rek nep tikpiyn ak mey, niŋniŋgambim.
Pen Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays chinup simb niŋimb ak, nimbip kond mindonimuŋ.
Yand Pol. Gor apiymiŋay chinup pisnep diy dand amniŋgayr aŋgiy niŋbun omiŋal ak nep, yip aŋger, Jiysis minim dand amemb ak mindpiyn.
Timotiy. Yand nep aŋgrep genik, Jiysis nup gosimb niŋban ak; nip ñi yand apiyn. Bapiy Gor yip, Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays yip nip simb niŋiy, kond mindrep ginimiyr.
Yand Yipiyses mindiy, Masedoniya propens amniŋg, nip kun okok aŋgay, biynimb Gor minim aspun aŋgiy minim yesek apay gok kuyip aŋgenimin, minim kun ak kirginiŋgiy aŋgnik rek, tip ak aspiyn.
Sosim ar gunap apay gok sek, nusind nupis yes yerer giy tikey wip aŋgiy apay gok sek aŋgey, kirginiŋgiy. Minim kun gok aŋgiy, penpen nep apay. Gor biynimb dinimuŋ minim ar ak aŋgey, yomb ginimuŋ ak pen; minim kiyk apay kun gok niŋiy, Gor nup gosimb niŋniŋgiy ak ma mindip.
Pen biynimb gok suŋ-tep mindiy, Gor nup di mindmaŋgiy yimb ay, mindrep gembiyap yip tep gipkop.
Pen gunap kinjeŋ tep ar kun ak kirgiy, minim yikop okok aŋg amiy apiy gipay.
Chin Gor low tiysa gok mindon apay ak pen, minim apay gok, minim junj aspun ak aŋgiy, niŋrep ma gipay.
Chin kun ak rek ma ginjun. Gor low minim nuk aŋgak ak, tep yimb mindip ak pen; low minim nep aŋgiy, minim nup gunap kirginiŋgambun ak, tep ma giniŋgamb.
Per low minim apun ak, biynimb mindrep gipay gok kuyip ma apun; biynimb monmon gipay gok kuyip apun. Biynimb mindrep ma giy, timey gipay, chip ñapay, nonim nop kiyk key pikaypay,
biyn siy bi siy gipay, biynimb siŋgil waŋ gipay, biynimb yesek aŋgiy akaŋ, yerer giyiŋg minim niŋind yimb ak kirpay.
Minim niŋind yimb apiyn kun ak, Jiysis Krays minim tep ak. Gor Biyomb melik sek ak, biynimb direp giyn aŋgiy yip aŋgek, minim tep kun ak aŋgñirapiyn.
Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays, yip niŋek woŋg nup ak gep rek ayek; woŋg kun ak aŋgay kond mindakniŋ gipiyn ak, nup tep apiyn.
Nind mindrep ma yimb giyiŋgipiyn. Gor biynimb nup gok kuyip timey giy, Gor nup aŋgjiwiy giyiŋgipiyn. Pen Gor nup ma niŋiy, minim aŋgak kiñiŋ ak ma niŋiy genik mey, yip simb niŋiy dak.
Kun ak yand bi tep mer ak pen, biynimb nuk gok kuyip per gip rek, yip gos tep ñek, nup gosimb niŋyiŋg, biynimb gok kuyip wasemb aypiyn. Kun ak nup tep yimb aspiyn.
Minim niŋind yimb niŋiy, pisnep diniŋgambun bap aŋgniŋg gispiyn. Krays Jiysis biynimb man ar biy, tap siy tap timey gipay gok kuyip, diniŋg owak. Bi tap siy tap timey yomb yimb giyiŋgip ak mey, yand nep.
Pen yip diniŋg aŋgak, “Bi tap siy tap timey yimb gip ak nup den mey, aŋgniŋgambay, Jiysis chinup kunep diniŋgamb aŋgiy, yip ker apey, kuyip den, perper mindeniŋgambay aŋgak.”
Kun ak, Gor nuk Biyomb yimb; miseŋ ma niŋbun; ma kumniŋgamb; nuk nokom Gor niŋind yimb ak, nup perper nep yimb dand aranjun. Tep.
Ñiyand Timotiy. Nip minim bap aŋgniŋg gispiyn. Bi Gor minim aŋgep gok, nip aŋgyak rek nep ginimin. Minim yip ak diy, mindrep giy, Gor nup gosimb niŋyiŋg, biynimb nup alemb alemb ñimbay gok kuyip, aŋgñirep ginimin. Biynimb gunap mindrep ma giy, Gor kuyip gos ñimb ak kirgiy, apyap pikpay.
<range>
Haymeniyas yip, Aleksanda yip kun ak rek gerik aŋgnik, “Kun gipiyr ak, chin yip jimñiy lotiw ma giniŋgayr. Nirip kirgon, Seytan kind ak mindiy, miker yimb gek, Gor nup aŋgjiwpiyr ak, kirginimiyr rek ayip aŋgnik.”
Kun ak nen, Gor nup aŋgniŋyiŋg, tep aŋgyiŋg gi mindenjun. Nup aŋgniŋon; gapman biyomb gok, biynimb yikop gok maŋgiysek, kond mindonimuŋ.
Kond mindakniŋ, chin kapkap mindrep giy, Gor nup gosimb niŋyiŋg mindonjun.
Gor Biyomb chinup simb niŋiy dip ak;
biynimb okok keykey mindpay rek den, gos tep ak niŋyaŋ aŋgiy niŋimb.
Yenen: Gor nokom bap mindip. Pen bi nambnimb ak, kunep nokom bap mindip. Gor piskind ak mindip, chin biynimb gok piskind ak mindpun; bi nambnimb chin mey, Ñinuk Jiysis Krays. Nuk biynimb maŋgiysek di Nop yip jimñiy ayin aŋgiy kumak.
Nind minim kun ak, ma niŋyiŋgipay ak pen; biynimb niŋyaŋ aŋgiy, Ñinuk nup yokek apiy, chinup nen kumek mey, miseŋ niŋbun.
Niŋind yimb apiyn. Ar kun ak, Gor nep yip aŋgek, bi Jiysis minim dand amemb ak mindiy, biynimb miñmon keykey okok kuyip aŋgñirapiyn.
Minim bap pen, bi gok miñmon okok maŋgiysek Gor nup chiŋgrep giy, miluk ma niŋiy, penpen ma aŋgiy, Gor nup aŋgniŋyiŋg mindeniŋgiy.
Pen minim bap, biyn gok kapkap mindrep giniŋgiy. Mindrep giniŋg, junkas malikiy, chech tep, biys, tap gol diy giyak gok ma ayniŋgiy;
Gor nup gosimb niŋbun aŋgiy, kapkap mindiy, biynimb gok kuyip direp giniŋgiy.
Gor minim aŋgniŋgiy won ak, biyn gok kapkap mindiy, niŋniŋgiy.
Yand biyn gok kuyip aŋgen, tikjakiy bi gok kuyip kond mindiy, minim ma aŋgñimbay. Kiyk kapkap mindiy, minim apay ak niŋbay. Gipiyn kun ak, kiñiŋ ak aŋgniŋg gispiyn.
Gor Andam nup nind gay, kisen biynuk Yiyp nup gayak.
Pen Seytan minim tom gak ak, Andam ma dak; biynuk nep minim yesek aŋgak kun ak diy, tap siy tap timey gek, Andam kisen gak.
Pen biyn gok ñapan tikyiŋg, Gor nup gosimb niŋyiŋg, suŋ-tep mindey amek, kuyip diniŋgamb.
Biynimb Gor nup woŋg giy, biynimb nup gok kuyip kond mindonjun aŋgiy niŋbay gok, gos tep yimb niŋbay.
Pen nimb bi Gor biynimb nuk gok kuyip, kond mindeniŋgiy gunap dun aŋgiy, bi yikop gok ma dinimimb; bi minim sayn gos niŋrep giy, minim aŋgñirep giniŋgiy rek gok niŋiy dinimimb. Bi minim sayn tep, tap timey ma giy, ñiŋg kilis kuŋay ma ñimbiy, biynimb okok wasemb ay, biyn kiyk nokom diy, biynimb gunap niŋey tep gek, kuyip aŋgjiwniŋgiy rek ma aynimuŋ, bi gok niŋiy dinimimb.
Pen bi kalrimey jiwpay gok, penpen apay gok, ñiŋg kilis ñimbiy sakiy aypay gok, gur-maniy nep gos niŋbay gok ma dinimimb. Bi tep mindrep giniŋgiy rek aynimuŋ gok niŋiy dinimimb.
Bi ñapan kiyk amyoŋg gok kuyip, kond mindrep gey, ñapan kiyk gok pen bapiy niŋind aŋgip aŋgiy, niŋdiniŋgiy bi gok niŋiy dinimimb.
Pen bi biyn ñapan kiyk key gok, kond mindrep ma giniŋgambay ak; Gor biynimb nuk gok kuyip, yergiy kond mindrep giniŋgambay?
Bi Gor nup kisen nep chiŋgipay gok ma dinimimb. Bi kisen nep chiŋgipay kun gok, biyomb mindpun aŋgiy, Gor nup kirgiy, apyap pikniŋgiy rek ayip. Seytan nind biyomb mindpiyn aŋgiy, Gor nup kirgek, aŋgyokak rek ak, kuyip giniŋgamb.
Bi dinimimb kun gok, biynimb Gor ker ma mindpay gok niŋiy, bi tep aŋgiy niŋbay gok kuyip dinimimb. Yikop ak, Seytan gek, biynimb Gor nup ma dipay gok kuyip aŋgjiwey, apyap pikniŋgiy rek ayip.
Nimb bi diykon don, biynimb kond mindeyaŋ aŋgiy, bi yikop gok diy, woŋg kun ak ma aŋgaynimimb. Biynimb niŋey mindrep giy, ñiŋg kilis kuŋay ma ñimbiy, minim yesek ma aŋgiy, maniy tap gok yand nep diyn aŋgiy gos ak ma niŋiy,
Gor minim niŋind yimb ak, direp gipay gok nep niŋiy dinimimb.
Kun ak woŋg sikoy gunap aŋgayem, yergiy rek giniŋgambay ak niŋiy, aŋgem diykon woŋg ak giniŋgiy.
Pen biyn kiyk gok kunep, ñiŋg kilis kuŋay ma ñimbiy, biynimb gunap kuyip ma aŋgjiwiy, minim yesek ma aŋgiy; minim niŋind yimb aŋgiy, mindrep giniŋgiy.
Pen bi diykon gok biyn nokom diy, biyn amyoŋg kiyk gok kuyip, aŋgey mindrep giniŋgiy.
Bi diykon woŋg tep giniŋgambay gok, biynimb namb ak yimb tep ak diy, Jiysis Krays nup direp giyiŋg mindeniŋgambay.
Kasek niniŋgayn rek ayip aŋgiy, nip minj tiksipiyn.
Pen kasek ma niniŋgayn ak, minj biy niŋiy, chin Gor biynimb nuk yimb gok, biynimb nuk gunap yip yergiy rek mindenjun aŋgiy, niŋrep giniŋgamban. Chin Gor biynimb nuk gok, jimñiy korip sap kilis yimb rek mindon mey, minim niŋind yimb nuk ak, kurginimuŋ rek ma ayip.
Minim tep chin niŋbun ak key yimb. Jiysis Krays Nop yip mindiy, bi yimb ay miseŋ owak. Kun giy apek enjol gok niŋyak. Gor Kawnan nuk ak, biynimb gok kuyip aŋgak, “Gor Ñinuk wip aŋgak.” Minim tep nup ak, miñmon okok aŋgñey amnakniŋ, nup gosimb niŋyak. Nop nup dand andkind miñmon tep nuk biyoŋ amnak.
Gor Kawnan aŋgak ak miseŋ niŋbun. Ñin kisen ak awakniŋ, Gor nup gosimb niŋbun ak kirgiy, kichekiy malñiluk nop kiyk Seytan gos yesek ñimb ar ak, kisen giyiŋg aŋgñiniŋgambay.
Biynimb minim yesek aŋgñimbay kun gok, nambiŋ ma gip. Minim yesek nep aŋg dand amiy, monmon yimb aŋgñimbay.
Kiyk apay: bi gok biyn ma diy, biyn gok bi ma diy, tap keñmaŋgiy gunap asikrep giniŋgiy apay. Pen Gor nuk asikep minim kun ak rek ma aŋgak. Tap keñmaŋgiy gay, biynimb minim yipul yimb nuk ak niŋiy, nup gosimb niŋbay gok, di nup tep aŋgyiŋg ñiŋniŋgambay. Yenen: tap nuk gayak gok maŋgiysek, tep anep gayak.
<range>
Nup aŋgniŋbun rek, minim nuk aŋgip ak, tap kun gok suŋ nep mindip ak mey, ñimbyiŋg mindeniŋgambun.
Minim kun ak, mam ay gok kuyip aŋgñirep giniŋgamban ak mey; Gor minim tep aŋgñey, Jiysis nup gosimb niŋnak miñ tep ak direp giyiŋg, Krays Jiysis bi minim aŋgñemb, tep bap mindeniŋgamban.
Pen minim yikop, Gor nup aŋgjiwpay gok, ma aŋg amiy apiy ginimin. Gor nup nep gosimb niŋmindenimin.
Biynimb eksays yikop gipay gok, kilis gunap dipay ak pen; biynimb Gor nup chiŋgun aŋgiy tapin gey amimb gok, miñiy mindrep giy, kisen mindrep giy giniŋgambay.
Minim niŋind kun ak, niŋrep yimb ginjun.
Gor gek, mindrep giniŋgambun gos ak niŋiy mey, kilisrimey yimb giy nep gon amimb. Nuk bi gin yimb, biynimb miñmon keykey mindpay rek, diyn aŋgiy niŋakniŋ, biynimb nup gosimb niŋbay gok, maŋgiysek di nuk yip jimñiy ayip.
Minim aspiyn biy, biynimb Gor ker mindpay gok aŋgñenimin niŋniŋgiy.
Biynimb gunap, nip bi paranj aŋgiy, minim nip kirginiŋgiy rek ayip ak, niŋrep ginimin. Pen mindrep giy nep gey amek, biynimb Gor nup chiŋgipay gok; nup gosimb niŋban rek, minim tep apan rek, biynimb wasemb aypan rek, mindrep gipan rek niŋiy; kuyip tep gek kunep giniŋgiy.
Niniŋgayn ak pen, yip kond mindpan ñin biy, Gor biynimb nuk gok kuyip, Baybol buk minim ak riyt giyiŋg, junj ak aŋgñirep giyiŋg mindenimin.
Gor nup woŋg giniŋg genak ñin ak, biyomb gok Gor nup aŋgniŋniŋg, ñin jun ar nip ak ay, Gor nip kond mindakniŋ, biynimb gok kuyip aŋgñirep giniŋgamban aŋgyak. Bi Gor minim aŋgep gok kunep, kun ak rek aŋgyak. Kun ak, Gor nip gos tep ñimb rek, sakiy ma ginimin; minim nup ak monmon aŋgñinimin.
Woŋg nup kun ak, girep genimin, biynimb gok niŋey tep gek, minim nip ak diniŋgambay.
Gor aŋgip rek giyiŋg, minim niŋind nup ak, aŋgñirep giyiŋg gey amek mey, nak sek, biynimb aŋgñimban gok sek Gor yip, mindrep giniŋgambim.
Bi nop day gok kuyip, ma aŋg ginimin; nap nak key ak rek, aŋgñirep ginimin. Bi paranj gok kuyip, ma aŋg ginimin; namam nak key ak rek, aŋgñirep ginimin.
Biyn gok, nanim sikop kuyip, aŋgñirep gipan rek aŋgñinimin. Biyn piñ gok, nanay nak key gok yip, mindrep giy aŋgñimban rek, aŋgñinimin.
Biyn yandiw ñapan ma mindip gok kuyip, kond mindrep ginimin.
Pen ñapan kiyk gunap mindeniŋgiy, kuyip aŋgenimin, Gor nup gosimb niŋbay rek, nonim akaŋ, nupis sikop, kuyip yimaŋgiyak rek, pen kond mindrep giniŋgiy. Kun geniŋgambay mey, Gor nup tep giniŋgamb.
Biyn yandiw key asiy yimb mindpay gok, Gor chinup kond mindeniŋgamb aŋgiy, pumbnamb kisyimken nup aŋgniŋyiŋg nep mindpay.
Pen biyn yandiw miñmiñ girapay gok, kim mindpun aŋgiy niŋbay ak pen, kumiy kurginiŋgiy rek mindip.
Minim kun biy, biynimb gok kuyip aŋgey, biyn yandiw kiyk gok, kond mindey mey, biynimb gunap, kuyip niŋchikiy ma aŋgniŋgambay.
Pen biynimb an, biynimb kiyk key yimb gok, direp ma giy, pen biynimb kiyk kiñiŋ nokom gok, maŋgiysek direp ma gipay ak, Gor nup gosimb ak sakiy giy, mindrep ma giy mey, kun gipay. Biynimb Gor nup gosimb ma niŋbay gok, timey yimb gipay kun ak rek, ma gipay.
Pen biyn yandiw gunap aŋgniŋgiy, “Yimb chinup ak, biyn yandiw Gor nup woŋg gipay gok yip tikem, Gor woŋg ginukniŋ, chinup tap ñiŋemb tap gok, ñinimimb aŋgeniŋgiy,” niŋrep giy dinimimb. Biyn kun gok diniŋg, biyn tokiy bi nokom dey, kumyak gok nep dinimimb.
Pen biyn miñ tep ar ak nep giy, ñapan wasemb ay, biynimb okok nimb gok direp giy, biynimb Gor ker mindpay gok kuyip direp giy, biynimb kosyam mindiy, gospar ay mindpay gok kuyip, direp giy gipay gok nep dinimimb.
Biyn tokiy ma aypay gunap, Gor woŋg ak giniŋgambun aŋgniŋgambay ak pen; mind dand amiy, bi kisen dun aŋgiy, Krays nup woŋg ak yiruk niŋiy, bi kisenimb diniŋgambay.
Minim kiyk key nind aŋgayak gok, timbrikniŋgambay ak, tep ma giniŋgamb.
Pen biyn yandiw tokiy ma aypay gok, woŋg kun ak giniŋg, yikop korip korip giraŋgiy, biynimb gunap aŋgjiwyiŋg, minim yesek kun gipay kun gipay aŋgyiŋg, gi mindeniŋgambay.
Kun ak yand apiyn, “Biyn yandiw tokiy ma aypay gok woŋg kun ak ma aŋgaynimimb apiyn.” Kiyk pen, bi kisenimb diy, ñapan tikiy, korip kiyk key woŋg giy, mindrep giniŋgambay. Mindrep giniŋgambay kun ak, biynimb Gor nup miluk niŋbay gok, kuyip aŋgjiwniŋgiy rek ma ayniŋgamb.
Pen biyn yandiw gunap, Gor nup kirgiy, Seytan nup kisen gipay.
Minim bap, biyn Gor ker mindpay gok, biyn yandiw kiyk key mindonimuŋ, kiyk key kond mindeniŋgiy. Kun gey mey, biynimb Gor ker gok jimñiy, biyn yandiw key asiy yimb mindpay gok, kond mindeniŋgambay. Yikop ak, biyn yandiw kuŋay mindey, kosyam yimb kond mindeniŋgambay.
Biynimb gok kuyip aŋgenimin, bi Gor nup woŋg gipay gok kuyip, ma kirginiŋgiy. Gor minim aŋgñirep gipay akaŋ, Gor woŋg yerip gunap girep gipay gok, pey kuyip ak ñirep giniŋgiy.
Baybol buk tikiy aŋgyak: “Nimb kanj makaw poŋind apiy, lays chinup gok tawsimb jakey, maŋgiy gok key ay, cheŋg gok key ay gaŋ aŋgiy; ar kun ak giniŋg, kanj lays chinup gok ñiŋniŋgambay aŋgiy, meŋg miŋgan kuyip ak, ma tiwniŋgrimbiknimimb; woŋg gipay rek, gunap ñiŋniŋg ñiŋniŋgiy aŋgyak.” Pen minim bap aŋgyak: “Bi woŋg gipay gok, pey ñemb aŋgyak.”
Bi nokom bap nep, apiy aŋgniŋgamb, “Bi Gor nup woŋg gip ak, kun kun giy timey gip aŋgonimuŋ” ma niŋnimin. Biynimb omiŋal akaŋ, omiŋal nokom rek niŋiy ap aŋgeniŋgiy, niŋind apay rek ayip aŋgiy, niŋnimimb.
Pen bi Gor woŋg gipay gunap, tap siy diy tap timey geniŋgiy, biynimb lotiw opay rek, maŋgiysek niŋmindyakniŋ, kuyip aŋg ginimin. Kun geniŋgamban, gunap niŋiy ñawil diy, kunep ma giniŋgambay.
Pen bi yand gok, timey ma gipay; bi kiyk gok nep gipay aŋgiy, ma aŋgnimin. Minim mindonimuŋ, kiñiŋ ak niŋrep giy nep aŋgñinimin. Nip minim kun biy, yikop ma aspiyn; Jiysis ak, Gor ak, enjol suŋ-tep nuk gok sek niŋmindyakniŋ aspiyn.
Pen bi Gor woŋg gep kisenimb gok diniŋg, niŋrep giy nep dinimin. Biynimb gunap timey geniŋgiy, nand yip ma giy, suŋ-tep nep mindenimin.
Pen nip tap minek minek giy, koŋgiy siwip ak, ñiŋg nep ma ñiŋnimin, ñiŋg wayn siskoy gunap sek ñiŋnimin.
Bi gunap mindrep ma gipay ak, kasek niŋbun; pen gunap mindrep ma gipay ak, ma niŋbun. Kiyk gipay ak, aŋg amiy apiy giyakniŋ, niŋniŋgambun.
Bi mindrep giy, biynimb kond mindrep giy gipay gok kunep, gunap nep niŋbun. Pen mindrep gipay rek minim ak, weygiy mindonimuŋ rek ma ayip.
Biynimb Gor ker kalambis woŋg rek gipay gok kuyip aŋgenimin, biyomb kuyip taw dand wiyak gok direp giniŋgiy. Pen mindrep ma geniŋgambay, biynimb gunap niŋiy, Gor nup aŋgjiwiy, minim tep aŋgñimbun ak, aŋgjiwiy giniŋgambay.
Pen biynimb Gor nup gosimb niŋbay gok, bi Gor nup gosimb niŋbay gunap kuyip, kalambis woŋg rek giñiyiŋg, mam chin key gok yenen woŋg giñispun aŋgiy, ma aŋgniŋgiy; mam tep chin Gor nup gosimb niŋbay gok kondsipun aŋgiy, woŋg kuyip ak giñirep giniŋgiy. Minim tiksipiyn biy, biynimb gok kuyip aŋgñirep ginimin.
Biynimb Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays minim aŋgak ak sek, Gor minim per aŋgñimbun ak sek kirgiy, minim key gunap aŋgñimbay gok,
chin nep biynimb yomb mindpun aŋgiy, sakiy ay gos ma mindek, kun gipay. Kun ak biynimb gunap kuyip gos timey niŋiy, penpen aŋg amiy apiy giy, miluk yapek, penpen aŋgjiwpay.
Tap siy tap timey gi dand amiy, sakiy ayek, lotiw minim ak penpen yimb apay. Pen Gor minim ak aŋgiy, gur-maniy tap gok di nan-giy, mindrep giniŋgambun apay.
Pen nimb mindrep ginjun aŋgiy, Gor aŋgip rek giy mey, kapkap nuk yip mindrep giniŋgambim.
Amiy sikop chinup tikyak ñin ak, tap gunap dand ma winuk: pen kumniŋgambun ñin ak, tap gunap dand ma amniŋgambun.
Kun ak chech tap ñiŋemb chin gunap mindonimuŋ, tap chin rek mey sikoy ak aŋgjun.
Pen biynimb tap kuŋay dun aŋgiy gos niŋbay gok sakiy ayek, monmon gey amek, kimin tap ñiŋniŋg apiy gon diy, yiwur yomb dipay rek ak kuyip giniŋgamb.
Biynimb maniy tap gok gosimb niŋbay gok, tap siy tap timey ar keykey gipay. Gunap gos kun ak niŋiy, Gor nup gos ak kirgiy, mindrep ma gey, kuyip key simb timey yimb gip.
Timotiy. Nand Gor binuk yimb ak, biynimb gunap gipay rek ma ginimin; bi suŋ-tep nuk, nup gosimb niŋiy, biynimb wasemb ay, kapkap mindpay rek bap minden aŋgiy, ar kun ak nep gey amnimuŋ.
Kosyam mindeniŋgayn aŋgiy gos ak ma niŋnimin; Gor nip diniŋg gek, biynimb kuŋay niŋmindyakniŋ, Gor nup chiŋgipiyn aŋgnak ak, nup ma kirginimin. Aŋgip rek, sakiy giy nep gey amek mey, perper mindeniŋgamban.
Gor Biyomb gek kim mindpun ak sek, Ñinuk Jiysis Krays Ponsis Paylat nup, minim yipund giy aŋgak ak sek niŋmindrikniŋ, nip kilis giy aspiyn;
Gor minim tep ak, yipund giy mindip rek nep niŋniŋgiy aŋgiy, gey amek amek, kisen Biyomb chin Jiysis Krays andkind winimuŋ.
Jiysis andkind winiŋgamb ñin kun ak, Nop nuk key aŋgayak. Nuk Biyomb chin kun anep, bi tep yimb; biyomb yikop gok kuyip, maŋgiysek kond mindip.
Pen nuk nokom kumnimuŋ rek ma mindip; per yimb nep mindeniŋgamb. Melik tep nuk ak, key yimb mindip; biynimb gunap nup ma yimb niŋbay; kiñiŋ siŋak amniŋgiy rek ma ayip. Nuk Biyomb key yimb ak, biynimb maŋgiysek yimb nup ak, perper dand araniŋgiy. Tep.
Biynimb gur-maniy tap kuŋay mindip gok kuyip aŋgenimin, chin nep biynimb key yimb mindpun aŋgiy, tap kasek kurgip kun gok gosimb ma niŋniŋgiy; Biyomb biynimb kond minden, tap ma tikdek, mindrep giniŋgiy aŋgip anup, gosimb niŋniŋgiy.
Kun ak, kuyip aŋgenimin, tap kuŋay mindip rek, biynimb direp gun aŋgiy, tap monmon ñiniŋgiy.
Kun ak rek giy mey, miñiy mindrep giy, ñin kisen ak apek, Gor yip perper mindrep giniŋgambay.
Timotiy. Gor minim tep ñin ar nip ayak ak, direp ginimin. Minim yesek kiyk niŋrep giy aspun aŋgiy, aŋg amiy apiy gipay gok, ma dinimin.
Biynimb gunap, minim yesek kiyk kun ak diyiŋg, Gor nup pisnep kirpay. Gor nimbip simb niŋiy, kond mindonimuŋ.
Yand Pol. Gor yip aŋgek, bi minim nup dand amemb ak mindiy, Jiysis Krays nup chiŋgiy, perper mindeniŋgambim aŋgak minim ak aŋgñirapiyn.
Ñi tep yand Timotiy, nip minj tiksipiyn. Bapiy Gor yip, Ñinuk Jiysis Krays yip nip simb niŋiy kond minder, kapkap mindrep ginimin.
Yand apis basind sikop, Gor nup gosimb niŋyiŋgipay rek nep niŋbiyn ak mey, gos yomb gunap ma niŋbiyn. Nup gosimb niŋyiŋg, pumbnamb kisyimken nup tep apiyn.
Nip kiriŋg apenik siy aŋgnak ak, niŋyiŋg mindpiyn. Kun ak nip am niŋen, yip tep ginimuŋ aŋgiy niŋbiyn.
Nand Gor nup chiŋgrep gipan ak, niŋyiŋg mindpiyn. Napis Loyis yip, nanim Yiwniys yip nup chiŋgrep giy mindyiŋgipiyr rek, nand kunep gipan.
Kun ak nip ñin jun ar ay, Gor Kawnan nuk yokek, ap nand yip nep mindip ak, ma piriknimin; aŋgek woŋg giyiŋgipan rek ginimin.
Chinup Kawnan nuk yokip ak, ma pirikpun; key mindrep giy, biynimb wasemb ay, Gor nup direp yimb gipun.
Kun ak, Gor woŋg genik, yip kalambis ayak ak, nambiŋ ma dinimin. Nand key kunep, Gor minim aŋgiyn aŋgiy, nambiŋ ma diy, biynimb gok kuyip monmon aŋgñinimin. Pen Gor nip kond mindip rek, minim tep nup ak aŋgñiraŋgey, nip timey geniŋgiy, gos kuŋay ma niŋnimin.
Chinup dak ak, miñ tep gonuk niŋiy ma dak; nuk key chinup simb niŋak rek dek, biynimb suŋ-tep nuk mindpun. Miñmon ma alwol gayak ñin ak, nuk biynimb simb niŋiy diniŋgamb rek, gos niŋak ak mey,
miñiy Ñinuk nup yokek apiy, kumiy tikjakak rek, minim kun ak miseŋ niŋbun. Kumiy pisnep kuyiŋg yowpinup ak pen, minim tep nuk dand owak ak dipun rek, perper mindonjun rek ayip.
Ar kun ak nep, Gor yip aŋgek, bi Jiysis minim dand amemb ak mindiy, biynimb okok kuyip aŋgñi tapiyn.
Aŋgñi taŋgen, yip timey gey, kosyam mindpiyn ak pen; ñawil amnakniŋ ma mindpiyn. Biyomb tep Jiysis nup gosimb niŋbiyn rek, nambiŋ ma diy, biynimb okok kuyip monmon aŋgñimbiyn. Minim tep yip aŋgñinimin aŋgak kun ak, ma kurginiŋgamb; nuk gek mind dand amiy amiy, ñin yomb nuk ak winiŋgamb.
Kun ak, Jiysis Krays nup gosimb niŋyiŋg, biynimb wasemb ayiŋg, minim aŋgen niŋban ak, yipund giy nep mindip aŋgiy, biynimb gok kuyip aŋgñinimin.
Minim tep ñin ar nip aynik kun ak; biynimb gunap minim monmon okok nimb gunap, sesek wilikniŋgiy rek ayip ak, niŋrep ginimin. Gor Kawnan yip mindpun rek, nip gos tep ñek, sisker aŋgñeniŋgiy niŋiy, biynimb gok kuyip aŋgñirep ginimin.
Nand niŋban: kalambis minden; Piygeylas sek, Hemoseniys sek, biynimb kiyk Esiya nimb gok maŋgiysek yip kirgiy ambay.
Binak Onesiyporas nep yip ay mindip. Miñmon Rom biy kalambis minden nuk apiy, nambiŋ diniŋgayn aŋgiy yip ma kirgak; kosyam piyow niŋiy, ap yip niŋak. Ñin kuŋaynep ap niŋek, yip tep yimb gip. Kun ak, Biyomb chin ak nup aŋgniŋiy apiyn, “Onesiyporas biynimb nup gok sek kond mindenimin, ñin yomb nand ak apek, Onesiyporas nup simb niŋnimin apiyn.” Pen Yipiyses mindenik, yip direp yimb giyiŋgip ak niŋrep gipan.
<range>
<range>
Ñiyand Timotiy. Gor chinup simb niŋiy, Ñinuk Jiysis Krays nup yokek apiy, chinup aŋgiy kumak ar ak nep, Gor yip jimñiy mindpun. Kun ak Jiysis nup chiŋgiy, gosimb gunap ma niŋnimin.
Minim tep biynimb okok kuyip, per aŋgen niŋban ak; biynimb Gor nup direp giyiŋg mindeniŋgambay gunap piyow niŋiy, aŋgñirep genimin; kiy pen biynimb gunap kuyip, aŋgñirep giniŋgiy.
Gor nup woŋg gipun rek, biynimb gunap chinup timey gipay. Yip kunep giniŋgiy aŋgiy pirikiy, Biyomb tep chin anup ma kirginimin; woŋg nup ak monmon ginimin.
Amiybi gok, woŋg mis okok giniŋg, tap kiyk okok gos ak ma niŋbay; biyomb kiyk anup tep gaŋ aŋgiy, gos nokom niŋbay.
Biynimb resis gipay gok, bi resis kond mindpay gok, apay apay rek nep giy, tap dipay.
Pen biynimb manj woŋg gipay gok, tiŋiy yiwur gipay rek, nind yiŋgñimbiy, kisen biynimb gunap kuyip yiŋgñimbay.
Gor nip gos ñimb rek, minim maŋgiysek niŋnimin rek ayip ak mey, minim apiyn kun gok niŋyiŋg mindey, Gor nip gos ñek, niŋrep giniŋgamban.
Jiysis Krays minim tep per apiyn ak, sakiy ma ginimin. Basind yes Depiyt tikek, tik dand amiy, nup tikyak. Pen yomb giy ñaŋgayey kumiy, tip ak tikjakak.
Yand tap siy tap timey ma giy, minim kun anep aŋgenik, yip timey giy kalambis ayey mindpiyn. Pen Gor minim ak, kalambis ma mindip; miñmon okok kind kind amjap.
Kun ak, yip timey gipay rek, gos yomb ma niŋbiyn; Gor biynimb nuk diniŋg niŋayak gok, Jiysis Krays nup gosimb niŋsipay rek, perper mindeniŋgambay gos anep niŋbiyn.
Minim aŋgniŋg gispiyn biy, minim niŋind yimb niŋiy, pisnep dep ak. Jiysis chinup nen kumak ak, chin yip kumnuk rek ayip ak mey; nuk yip kim mindoniŋgambun.
Nup chiŋgiy miker diyiŋg, nup ma kirginiŋgambun ak; nuk kiyŋ mindiy, biynimb kond mindeniŋgamb ñin ak, yip mindiy mindrep yimb giniŋgambun. Pen nup kirgoniŋgambun, chinup kunep kirginiŋgamb.
Nup minim gunap aŋgiy, kisen kirginiŋgambun ak pen; nuk minim chinup aŋgip ak ma kirginiŋgamb; giniŋg nep aŋgip.
Gor niŋmindakniŋ, biynimb gok kuyip aŋgrep genimin, minim ar keykey aŋgiy penpen ma aŋgniŋgiy. Gor minim aspun apay ak pen; minim apay kun ak rek, biynimb gok kuyip gos timey ñek, mindrep ma giy, apyap pikniŋgiy rek ayip.
Pen Gor minim nup ak niŋrep giy, kuyip aŋgñirep giyiŋg, nambiŋ ma dinimin.
Minim monmon okok aŋg amiy apiy gipay ak, nand yip ma aŋgnimimb. Aŋg dand amiy apiy giy, mindrep ma yimb giniŋgambay.
Soy sikoy bap ay, mind dand amiy, yomb yimb ayip rek ak giniŋgamb. Bi tiysa Haymeniyas yip, Payliytas yip ar kun ak gipiyr.
Gor minim tep ak kirgiy apay, “Chin kumiy tip ak ma tikjakniŋgambun; yikop Gor nup gosimb niŋbun rek, tip tikjakpun apay.” Pen kiyk minim yipund ma gip kun ak aŋgey, biynimb gunap Jiysis minim niŋind yimb ak kirpay.
Pen biynimb Jiysis nup gosimb niŋbay gok, kamb rek piŋiy wos giy mindpay. Kun ak, nup ma kirginiŋgambay. Baybol buk ak tikiy aŋgyak, “Biyomb ak, biynimb nup ker mindpay gok kuyip, niŋimb aŋgyak.” Minim bap pen tikiy aŋgyak, “Biynimb Biyomb ker mindpun apay gok, timey ar gok ma giniŋgiy aŋgyak.”
Pen korip yomb yimb gok, diys keykey mindip. Diys gunap, gol tap gok diy giyak. Gunap pen mon, man, tap yikop gok nep diy giyak. Gunap diy, tap gach mer, tap tep tep gok nep aypay; pen gunap tap gach tap monmon okok aypay.
Kun ak, Biyomb biynimb nuk tap gach tap monmon okok asikrep giniŋgambay gok, suŋ-tep mindpay rek niŋiy, di woŋg tep nuk yerip yerip mindeniŋgamb gok, aŋgayek giniŋgambay.
Pen bi paranj gunap, gos timey niŋbay rek ma niŋnimin. Bi suŋ-tep minden aŋgiy, gey amnimuŋ. Gor nup gosimb niŋiy, biynimb gok kuyip direp giy, kapkap mindiy, biynimb Biyomb chin anup gosimb niŋiy, mindrep gipay gok yip, mindrep ginimin.
Pen minim yikop aŋg amiy apiy giy, penpen apay gok, nand yip ma aŋgnimimb.
Bi Gor nup woŋg giniŋgiy gok, penpen ma aŋgiy, kapkap mindiy, biynimb direp giy, aŋgñirep giniŋgiy. Kuyip timey gey, pen timey ma giniŋgiy.
Pen biynimb gunap minim kuyip ma deniŋgiy, kapkap aŋgñirep giyiŋg mindey mey; Gor biynimb kun gok kuyip gos tep ñek, yenen kun gipun aŋgiy, andkind nup ker apiy, minim yipul yimb ak niŋiy, diniŋgiy rek ayip.
Kun ak, Seytan kuyip yesek tom giy dek, kind nuk ak mindiy, minim nup niŋyiŋgipay ak kirgiy, mindrep giniŋgambay.
Pen nand niŋban: ñin kisen ak winiŋg gakniŋ, kosyam mindeniŋgambay.
Ñin kun ak, biynimb mindrep ma yimb giniŋgambay. Maniy nep gos niŋiy, mumbwak kiyk nep gos niŋiy, timey nep giy, Gor nup aŋgjiwiy, nop nonim sikop kuyip minim timbrikiy, biynimb gok minim tep ma aŋgiy, Gor nup gosimb ak ma niŋiy,
biynimb wasemb ma ay, kuyip yergey niŋiy ma kirgiy, biynimb aŋgjiwiy, kalrimey jiwiy, mindrep gep miñ ak niŋey, kuyip miluk yowniŋgamb.
Biynimb gok kuyip direp ma giy, monmon timey giy, chin nep biynimb yomb mindpun aŋgiy, key miñmiñ gun aŋgiy, Gor nup kirginiŋgambay.
Lotiw rek giniŋgambay ak pen, Gor biynimb direp ginimuŋ rek ma ayip aŋgiy niŋniŋgambay. Biynimb kun ak rek gipay gok yip, yiŋgoŋg ma ginimin.
Biynimb kun gok rek gunap, bi gok minim chinup ak ma diniŋgambay aŋgiy, biyn gos niŋrep ma gipay gunap, piyow niŋbay. Korip gunap kapkap amiy; biyn tap siy tap timey giy, gos yomb niŋyiŋg mindpay gok niŋiy aŋgñimbay.
Biyn kun gok rek, minim okok nimb okok nimb niŋniŋgambay ak pen, minim niŋind yimb ak ma dipay.
Pen bi Jeniys yip, Jambriys yip Mosis minim aŋgak ak, yiruk niŋrik rek, Yipiyses bi aspun gok, minim yipund giy mindip ak kunep gispay. Gos kiyk ak timey yimb gip; Gor nup gosimb ak kirpay.
Pen gipay ar kun ak, tapin gey amnimuŋ rek ma mindip. Jeniys yip, Jambriys yip timey gerik, biynimb niŋyak rek, biynimb miñiy mindpay gok, kunep miseŋ niŋniŋgambay.
Pen yand yip taŋgyiŋgipur rek, miñ yand gipiyn ak niŋrep gipan. Gor nup gosimb nokom niŋiy, woŋg nup ak marik yimb giyiŋg, biynimb gok kuyip simb niŋiy aŋgñirep gipiyn.
Biynimb miñmon Antiyok, Aykoniyam, Liystra okok yip timey gey, kosyam mindenik ak pen; Gor yip kond mindek ak niŋban.
Biynimb Jiysis Krays nup chiŋgiy, aŋgip rek giniŋgambay gok, kuyip maŋgiysek miker ñey, kosyam mindeniŋgambay.
Pen biynimb timey, minim yesek ar ak aŋgñimbay gok, timey yimb gey amek, kiyk key Gor kinjeŋ tep ak ma niŋiy, biynimb gunap kuyip, minim yesek gok aŋgñey niŋniŋgambay.
Pen nand ñiskoy miŋg mindiy, minim niŋind ak aŋgey, niŋrep ginak ak mey, niŋyiŋg mindenimin. Chin biynimb nip aŋgñonuk niŋnak gok, mindrep gipun rek niŋban.
Ñiskoy yimb mindenak ñin ak, nip Baybol buk minim tep ak aŋgñiyak. Biynimb gok minim tep kun ak niŋey mey, Gor kuyip di nuk yip jimñiy ayip.
Baybol buk minim ak maŋgiysek, Gor Kawnan ak nep gos ñek, tikyak ak mey; minim nokom kun ak diy, biynimb gok kuyip yikop aŋgñiniŋgambun; timund winjkniŋgambun; suŋrep mindeyaŋ aŋgiy, aŋgrep giniŋgambun.
Bi Gor nup woŋg giñimbay gok, Baybol buk minim kun ak diy mey, biynimb gok kuyip miker yerip gek, niŋrep yimb giy, kuyip aŋgñirep yimb giniŋgambay.
Nip aspiyn: Gor minim yipund giy yimb ak, kilis giy aŋgñinimin. Gor apiymiŋay biyomb yimb mindpiyr rek, Ñinuk apiy, biynimb gok kond mindeniŋgamb. Ñin kun ak, apiymiŋay giy biynimb kumyak gok sek, kim mindeniŋgambay gok sek bilok keykey ayniŋgayr. Kun ak mey, Gor minim ak minek minek aŋgñinimin. Biynimb gok kuyip tep giniŋgamb akaŋ, tep ma giniŋgamb aŋgiy yiruk ma niŋnimin; niŋrep giyaŋ aŋgiy, aŋg giyiŋg, niŋchikiy aŋgyiŋg, kapkap aŋgñirep giyiŋg mindenimin.
<range>
Yenen: ñin kisen ak, Gor minim yipund giy ak niŋiy ma diniŋgambay; minim yesek gos kiyk key amimb ar gok nep, aŋgey niŋiy diniŋgambay.
Gor minim tep ak kirgiy, kesim yikop gok aŋgey, kasek niŋniŋgambay.
Pen yerer giniŋgamb ak, gos niŋrep giyiŋg mindenimin. Miker gonimuŋ, gos yomb kun ak ma niŋnimin. Nand bi Gor nup woŋg giñemb ak, minim tep nup ak, aŋgñiyiŋg nep mindenimin.
Yand Krays woŋg nup gen, yip kalambis ayeyak minden minden, miñiy pikayon likañ nup yownimuŋ aŋgiy, yip gispay. Kun ak, lum ar mindpiyn biy, kiriŋg amemb ñin ak, maŋ mindip.
Yand Gor nup gosimb niŋmindiy, woŋg yip aŋgak ak ma kirpiyn; aŋgak rek maŋgiysek gipiyn.
Nuk Biyomb niŋrep giy aŋgip ak mey; yerip yerip gipiyn ak niŋmindiy, ñin yomb nuk ak apek, yip aŋgek mindrep giniŋgayn. Yand nep mer: biynimb Biyomb asaw aŋgiy, tep gakniŋ kond mindpay gok maŋgiysek giniŋgamb.
Timotiy. Yand mindpiyn biy, kasek winimin.
Bi yand yip mindyiŋgipun gok, miñiy yand yip biy ma mindpay. Binak Demas tap man ar biy gos niŋiy, yip pisnep kiriŋg miñmon Tesalonayka amnak. Bi yand Kreyseniys miñmon Galesiya amnak. Ñi Taytas miñmon Dalmesiya amnak.
Tikiykas nup aŋgyoken, miñmon Yipiyses amnak. Pen Luk yand yip mindpur. Nand pen, Mak nup am poŋind apey, yand yip mindiy, Gor woŋg ak ginjur.
<range>
Winiŋgamban ñin ak, miñmon Trowas apiy, kolsiyor yand ak, binak Kapas korip daynik ak diy, buk meymey siypsiyp wak yimb sek tikyak gok maŋgiysek diy, dand winimin.
Bi kapa woŋg gip Aleksanda yip minim yesek yimb aŋgiy kor gip. Yip gip kun ak, Gor nup pen kunep giniŋgamb.
Minim tep chin apun ak, nup yiruk timey yimb gip ak mey; yip timey gip rek, nip kunep ginimuŋ rek ayip ak, niŋrep ginimin.
Yip nind kor giyak ñin ak, biynimb bap yip kund okok niŋmindek kor ma ginik; maŋgiysek yip kirgiyak. Pen Gor kuyip, gos kun ak niŋyiŋg ma mindonimuŋ.
Yip kor giyak kun ak, Gor yip kond mindakniŋ, minim tep nup ak biynimb okok nimb kuŋaynep ap mindeyak gok kuyip sakiy giy aŋgenik niŋyak. Pen kayn ayndik gok, yip siwñiŋniŋgiy rek ma ayak.
Yand niŋbiyn: Gor yip kond mindek, tap bap yip ginimuŋ rek ma ayniŋgamb; yip dand miñmon tep nuk ak amniŋgamb. Bi tep kun ak, yimb nup ak, perper nep dey aranimuŋ. Tep.
Binak Akiwiyla sek biynuk Priysiyla sek, binak Onesiyporas biynimb korip nuk mindpay gok sek kuyip aŋgnimin, Pol “Nimb mindpim?” aŋgip aŋgnimin.
Binak Yirastas biy ma owak; mindip miñmon Koriyn. Binak Tropiymas nup tap gek, kiriŋg ownik miñmon Mayliytas.
Yiŋgen yomb wip ñin ak maŋ mindip rek, kasek winimin. Pen Yiwbiyiwlas, Pudens, Liynas, Kilawdiya biynimb gok kuyip, biynimb Jiysis minim niŋbay akniy maŋgiysek, “Nimb mindpim?” aspay.
Biyomb tep chin ak, nip kond mindeŋ. Nimbip simb niŋiy, direp ginimuŋ.
Yand Pol. Gor nup woŋg giñiyiŋg, Ñinuk Jiysis Krays nup minim tep ak dand tapiyn. Dand taŋgiy, Gor biynimb diniŋg gip gok kuyip aŋgrep gen, Krays biynimb nuk mindonjun aŋgiy nup diy,
per mindeniŋgambun aŋgiy nup kond mindpay. Gor bi minim niŋind yimb nep aŋgip ak, biynimb ma gayak ñin ak, biynimb yand gok kuyip gen perper mindeniŋgambay aŋgek mey, nuk yesek ma aŋgip rek,
ñin nuk key aŋgayak ak apek, minim tep kun ak chinup aŋgyikak. Pen Bapiy yomb chinup simb niŋiy dip kun ak, yip aŋgek; minim tep kun ak dand tapiyn.
Taytas. Nip minim tep aŋgen, Jiysis nup gosimb niŋban rek, nip ñiyand apiyn. Minim ar nokom niŋbur kun anep, nip minj tiksipiyn. Kun ak, Jiysis Krays apiymiŋay chinup kond mindpiyr ak, kuyip aŋgniŋiy, Taytas nup kond minder, mindrep ginimuŋ apiyn.
Yand nip miñmon Kriyt aŋgayiŋg aŋgnik, “Biynimb aŋgñiruk gok kuyip tip am niŋiy, woŋg gunap ma giruk ak giyiŋg, biyomb kuyip kond mindeniŋgiy gunap, miñmon keykey mindpay rek aŋgaynimin aŋgnik.”
Pen Gor biynimb nup kondmindep bi gok diniŋg, bi mindrep giy, biyn nokom diy, ñapan kiyk aŋgrep gey mey, Gor nup gosimb niŋiy, biynimb gunap ñapan sakiy monmon gipay aŋgyiŋg, nop sikop kuyip aŋgjiwniŋgiy rek ma ayniŋgamb.
Pen bi Gor nup woŋg giyiŋg, biynimb kond mindeniŋgambay kun gok, bi sayn minim ma mindonimuŋ gok nep dinimimb.
Bi kun gok, biynimb wasiw aŋgdiy, mindrep giy, bi suŋ-tep Gor aŋgip rek nep giniŋgiy.
Minim yipund giy per aŋgñimbun ak diy, minim key gunap ma diniŋgambay ak mey; biynimb gok kuyip minim tep yipund giy ak nep aŋgey, mindrep giniŋgiy. Pen biynimb minim yipund ma gip ar ak dipay gok, kuyip minim yipund gip ar ak aŋgrep yimb geniŋgambay, minim pen aŋgniŋgiy rek bap ma mindeniŋgamb.
Yenen: biynimb minim yesek aŋgep gok kuŋaynep mindiy, nimbip nembnemb giyiŋg, kumbak tikiy Jiwda low aŋgip aŋgip rek ginimimb apay.
Maniy tap gok dun aŋgiy, minim yesek kun gok aŋgñey, korip gunap biynimb kinbay rek dispay. Kun ak kuyip aŋgenimin, minim yesek aspay kun ak kirginiŋgiy.
Bi minim aŋgep kiyk Kriyt nimb bap wosrey aŋgak, “Biynimb chin Kriyt nimb gok, per yiruk gek woŋg ma giy, yesek yimb nep aŋgiy, tap ayndik biynimb siwñiŋimb ak, mindpay aŋgak.”
Minim kun ak, niŋind yimb aŋgak. Kun gipay kun ak, nand kuyip kilis giy aŋgenimin; minim yesek apay kun ak kirgiy, Gor nup gosimb ak niŋniŋgiy.
Niŋiy mey, biynimb Krays nup kirgiy minim yesek apay gok sek, kesim Jiwda biynimb aŋgyiŋgipay gok sek ma diniŋgiy.
Biynimb suŋ mindpay gok, tap keykey gok suŋ nep mindip. Pen biynimb suŋ ma mindpay gok, Krays nup ma dipay rek, tap kuŋaynep asikpay. Minim kiyk niŋbay ak sek, gosimb kiyk ak sek suŋ ma mindip. Biynimb kun gok rek, gos timund pisnep timey gek, niŋrep ma gipay.
Gor biynimb nuk mindpun apay ak pen; gipay rek niŋon, nup ker ma mindpay rek ayip. Minim nup kirpay ak mey, mindrep giniŋgiy rek ma ayip. Kun ak Gor kuyip niŋek tep ma gip.
Pen nand biynimb gok kuyip, Gor minim yipund giy ar ak nep aŋgey niŋniŋgiy.
Bi nop day gok kuyip aŋgenimin, ñiŋg kilis ñimbiy sakiy ma ayniŋgiy. Gos niŋrep giy, mindrep giniŋgiy. Yerer gonimuŋ, Gor nup gosimb nokom niŋiy, biynimb gok kuyip wasemb ayiŋg direp giniŋgiy.
Biyn tokiy yomb gok kunep aŋgñirep genimin, biynimb gunap ma aŋgjiwiy, ñiŋg kilis kuŋay ñiŋun aŋgiy, ma ñiŋniŋgiy. Gor nup gosimb niŋiy mindrep giniŋgiy. Kun giy mey, biyn tomb aŋgin kisen aypay gok kuyip aŋgñirep gey, nuŋgumiy sikop kuyip wasemb ay, ñapan kiyk gok wasemb ay,
<range>
mindrep giy, suŋ-tep mindiy, woŋg kiyk key ak giy, biynimb direp giy, nuŋgumiy sikop beŋ okok mindey mey, biynimb gunap niŋiy, Gor nup minim ak ma aŋgjiwniŋgambay.
Pen Taytas. Nand mindrep yimb giy, bi paranj gok kuyip, minim kilis giy aŋgenimin, kunep mindrep yimb giniŋgiy. Pen sik sik aŋgyiŋg ma aŋgnimin: Gor minim ak yipund giy aŋgñirep ginimin.
<range>
Niŋrep giy aŋgenimin, biynimb chinup miluk niŋbay gok, minim gunap piyow mer niŋiy, nambiŋ diniŋgiy.
Pen biynimb Krays ker, biynimb gunap taw dand apey, kalambis woŋg rek gipay gok aŋgenimin, tap siy ma diy, minim gunap pen ma aŋgiy, bi nop kiyk gok, aŋgniŋgiy rek nep giniŋgiy. Kun gey mey, nop kiyk gok, Krays chinup di Nop yip jimñiy ayip minim tep ak aŋgey niŋiy, niŋind nep apay aŋgiy, nup gosimb niŋniŋgiy.
<range>
Gor chinup biynimb maŋgiysek simb niŋiy diniŋg, Ñinuk nup yokek awak ak, miñiy miseŋ niŋbun.
Kun ak nuk Biyomb yimb mindiy, tip andkind winiŋgamb aŋgiy; tep gakniŋ, nup gosimb niŋyiŋg, tap siy tap timey gipun ak kirgiy, mindrep yimb ginjun.
<range>
Pen nuk kumniŋg chinup aŋgak, “Kuyip nen kumen, tap siy tap timey gipay ak kirgiy, biynimb yand key yimb gok mindeniŋgambay aŋgak.” Kun ak biynimb nuk key yimb mindpun ak, mindrep ginjun.
Minim kun biy, biynimb gok kuyip aŋgrep ginimin. Pen biynimb monmon gipay gok kuyip, minim kilis giy aŋgenimin, joŋimb kind nip ak sipsip ma niŋniŋgiy.
Biynimb gok kuyip aŋgrep genimin, gapman biyomb gok sek, bi kiyk gok sek minim aŋgniŋgiy ak niŋiy, tep ar ak giniŋgiy.
Pen aŋgenimin, biynimb gunap kuyip minim timey ma aŋgiy, penpen ma giy, biynimb okok yip maŋgiysek kapkap mindon aŋgiy, mindrep yimb giniŋgiy.
Pen yenen: chin kunep nind mindrep ma yimb giyiŋgipun. Chin biynimb sakiy; key niŋbun aŋgiy, minim aŋgyiŋgipay gok ma niŋiy; yerer giniŋg, gos chin keynep niŋiy giyiŋgipun. Seytan yip mindiy mey, key niŋbun aŋgyiŋg minim ma niŋiy, chinup key tep giyiŋgip ar ak nep giyiŋgipun. Biynimb gok kuyip miluk niŋiy, penpen yiruk niŋyiŋgipun.
Kun giyiŋgipun ak pen, Krays apiy kumek, Gor biynimb simb niŋiy dip rek niŋonuk, chinup dak.
Chin mindrep gon niŋiy, chinup ma dak; nuk key chinup simb niŋak rek dak. Gach chinup ak wiykyokiy, Kawnan nuk ak chinup yokek apek, biynimb kisenimb yimb aypun.
Kun ak Krays chinup aŋgiy kumak rek, Nop Kawnan nuk yokek ap, chin yip mindip ak mey;
Gor biynimb suŋ-tep nuk gok perper mindonjun aŋgiy niŋbun rek nep, perper mindoniŋgambun.
Minim niŋind yimb mey, kun ak. Minim kun biy, kilis giy aŋgenimin, biynimb Gor nup gosimb niŋbay gok, gos nokom kun ak niŋiy, mindrep giniŋgiy. Minim tep yimb kun ak, biynimb diniŋgambay gok mindrep giniŋgambay.
Pen minim monmon aŋg amiy apiy giy, basind apis chin gok kun kun giy ayip aŋgiy, Jiwda low minim ak kun giy mindip aŋgiy, penpen aŋgeniŋgiy, nand yip ma aŋgnimimb. Minim kun gok junj bap ma mindip; aŋg dand amiy yergiy mindrep giniŋgambay.
Kun ak biynimb gunap, Gor minim yipund giy ak kirgiy, minim gunap key aŋgeniŋgiy, minek nokom bap aŋgnimin. Pen ma niŋey, minek ak kunep aŋgnimin. Minek ak kunep ma niŋey, kuyip pisnep kirginimin.
Nand niŋban: biynimb timey gipay kun gok, timey gispay ak key niŋbay.
Yand kisen Atemas nup akaŋ, Tikiykas nup aŋgyoken, nip am aŋgek, kasek wep rek ayonimuŋ; kasek winimin miñmon Niykopoliys. Yombip ay takil giniŋgamb ñin ak, yand am miñmon kun ak mindeniŋgayn.
Binak Seynas, low minim niŋimb ak yip, binak Apolas yip kuyip direp ginimin. Kinjeŋ amniŋg gispiyr rek, tap kiyk gunap tikdonimuŋ, ñey dand amnimiyr.
Biynimb chin gok kuyip aŋgrep genimin, yikop ma mindeniŋgiy; woŋg giyiŋg tap mindakniŋ, biynimb tap ma mindip gok kuyip, gunap ñiniŋgiy.
Biynimb yand yip mindpun gok, “Nip mindpan?” apay. Nimb pen, biynimb Gor nup gosimb niŋiy, chinup wasemb aypay gok kuyip, “Nimb mindpim?” aŋgnimimb. Minim yand aŋgjiwpiyn. Gor nimbip maŋgiysek kond mindonimuŋ!
Yand Pol. Jiysis Krays nup woŋg gen yip kalambis ayey mindpiyn. Mam tep yand Piyliymon; chir woŋg jimñiy gipur. Yand mam chin Timotiy yip mindiy, nimbip minj tiksipur. Nand ak, ay chin Apiya ak, bi Gor woŋg kilis giy gip Akiypas ak, biynimb korip nand apiy lotiw gipim gok maŋgiysek, nimbip minj tiksipur.
<range>
Gor apiymiŋay nimbip kond minder, ñin ar kiy apiymiŋay ak mindiy, mindrep ginimimb.
Nand Gor Ñinuk nup gosimb niŋyiŋg, biynimb nuk gok kuyip wasemb aypan ak; per Gor nup aŋgniŋyiŋg, tep apiyn.
<range>
Nup apiyn, “Bapiy. Chin Piyliymon yip minim aŋg amiy apiy giy mey, chinup biynimb nip ker mindpun gok, yerer gipan ak niŋrep giy, nip chiŋgrep yimb ginimuŋ apiyn.”
Pen mam Piyliymon niŋan! Nand Gor biynimb nuk gok kuyip wasemb aypan ak, kuyip tep gip. Yand kunep niŋen tep gek, miñmiñ gipiyn.
Pen Jiysis minim aŋgñi taŋgen, yip kalambis ayey mindpiyn ak; yip simb niŋiy aŋgnim rek ginimin. Krays binuk mindpiyn rek, nip minim kilis aŋgniŋg apnip ak pen, nand bi mapin yand ak, nip kun ma aŋgnim aŋgiy kirpiyn.
<range>
Pen minim yand ak, ñi Oniysmas nup ma aŋg ginimin. Nip woŋg giy kiriŋg amnak ak, miñiy yand kalambis mindiy, Gor minim tep ak aŋgñen niŋimb ak mey, nup minj sek yoksipiyn.
Nip kiriŋg amnak ak pen, miñiy yip kond mindiy, nip kond mindiy giniŋgamb.
Pen ñi mapin yand rek ak nip yoksipiyn.
Nind aŋgniŋiy minim nip ak diy rek, nup ma yokpinip. Krays minim tep aŋgen, yip kalambis ayey mindpiyn biy, nand ap yip kond mindenimin rek ma ayip ak; Oniysmas yip kond mindombikop.
Pen yand key nup di mindeniŋgayn yipund ma giniŋgamb aŋgiy, nup nind yokiy, nip kisen aŋgniŋsipiyn. Yip ker tip yokniŋg yoknimin.
Yand aŋgniŋbiyn-eŋ Gor gek, Oniysmas nip kirgiy amimb ak mey, miñiy perper chiŋgiy mindeniŋgayr.
Bi yikop woŋg giñemb rek ma mindeniŋgamb; nuk miñiy mam chir omiŋal yipund giy ak, nip chiŋgiy mindeniŋgamb. Nup bi woŋg giñemb rek ma niŋniŋgamban; nuk Gor binuk bap, namam nand key ak rek mapin niŋniŋgamban.
Kun ak yip buŋgiy yand yimb aŋgiy niŋban rek, ñi Oniysmas nup aŋg giyn aŋgiy ma aŋgnimin. Nup direp ginimin. Yand amjaken, yip direp gipnap rek ak, nup ginimin.
Pen nip timey gak akaŋ, tap gunap pen ma ñak aŋgiy, minim gunap mindonimuŋ nup ma aŋgnimin; minim kun ak yip aŋgnimin. Aŋgey, yand nip pen ñiniŋgayn.
Niŋind apiyn rek, yimb yand ak aŋgiy, minj sek tikiy aysipiyn. Pen yand nep Gor minim tep aŋgenik niŋban ak, nip ma aspiyn; nand key niŋban.
Mam. Krays chirupmiŋay direp gip rek nip aspiyn: Oniysmas nup ma aŋg ginimin. Yip simb niŋiy ak, nup direp ginimin.
Apiyn rek, nup direp giniŋgamban aŋgiy, tep gakniŋ minj tiksipiyn.
Minim nokom bap mindip ak ma apiyn. Yip korip ñiluk miŋgan bap niŋiy gayrep genimin; Gor nup aŋgniŋban rek, maŋ mindip kalambis kirgiy, ninim rek ayip.
Binak Epapras kunep Gor minim aŋgñek, nup kalambis ayeyak, yand yip mindpur biy. Nuk “Nip mindpan?” aŋgip.
Bi woŋg jimñiy gipun Mak ak, Ariystakas ak, Demas ak, Luk ak “Nip mindpan?” apay.
Jiysis Krays nip kond mindakniŋ, Gor nup gosimb niŋyiŋg mindenimin.
Gor basind apis ikop kuyip minim aŋgniŋg, bi minim nup aŋgep gok gek, minim nup ar ak wisin niŋiy akaŋ, day niŋiy akaŋ, gos kiyk namb okok niŋiy aŋgñiyiŋgipay.
Nind kun giy gek, biynimb gok kuyip aŋgñiyiŋgipay ak pen, ñin kisen mindpun biy, Ñinuk ak key yokek apiy, chinup minim aŋgñak. Pen Ñinuk nuk key ma mindip: Nop mindip rek nep mindip. Nuk kunep Gor ak mey, chinup sup melik puŋgyomimb. Nop aŋgek, Ñinuk miñmon tap okok maŋgiysek alwol gayek mey, miñiy maŋgiysek kond mindip. Nuk nep minim aŋgek, miñmon tap okok timey ma gip, mindep nep mindip. Tap siy tap timey gach chinup ak nep aŋgiy, kumiy tip ak tikjakiy, am Nop ñin yipund kind okok ken mindiy, woŋg jimñiy gipiyr.
<range>
Nuk enjol gok rek mer: nup Gor Ñinuk apay rek, nuk Biyomb yimb. Yimb nuk yiy ar biyoŋ mindip.
Gor enjol nuk gok kuyip, bap minim aŋgiy apkop, “Miñiy nup dipiyn ak, yip ‘Nop nuk;’ yand nup ‘Ñiyand’ aŋgiy” ma aŋgak. Akaŋ pen: “Yip ‘Nap nak;’ yand nip ‘Ñiyand’ aŋgiy,” ma aŋgak. Ñinuk nup nep, minim kun ak rek aŋgak.
Pen Ñinuk key yimb ak, mankumb biy yokniŋg, enjol gok yimb nup dand araniŋgiy aŋgak.
Pen enjol gok kuyip, minim ak aŋgiy aŋgak, “Enjol nuk gok gek, key yimb mindiy, yiŋgen rek diy opay aŋgak.”
Pen Ñinuk nup minim ak aŋgiy aŋgak: “Gor. Nand kiyŋ gunap monmon gipay rek ma giniŋgamban; suŋ-tep mindiy, biynimb gok perper kond mindeniŋgamban.
Mindrep gipay ak nip tep gip, pen mindrep ma gipay ak nip tep ma gip. Kun ak nip aŋgen, Biyomb key yimb mindpan. Kun ak buŋgiy nand gok, beŋ nip okok mindpay; nand mey Biyomb yimb mindpan aŋgak.”
Minim gunap sek aŋgiy aŋgak, “Nand Biyomb wosrey kondoŋ okok mindiy, mankumb biy sek, semb biyoŋ sek alwol gaynak.
Tap kun gok mindiy, kurginiŋgamb rek ayip ak pen; nand mindnep mindeniŋgamban. Tap kun gok, chech wor ay yapek, tuŋgasik key siŋak ay, kisenimb aypay rek giniŋgamb ak pen; nand Biyomb chin ak, kun ak rek ma giniŋgamban. Nak mindpan rek nep mindeniŋgamban aŋgak.”
<range>
Pen Ñinuk nup minim bap sek aŋgak: “Nand ñin yipund kind yand akniy bisiŋg mindey, tap yerip yerip nip miluk niŋbay gok maŋgiysek, talak miŋgan nip okok ayniŋgayn aŋgak.” Pen enjol gok kuyip, Ñinuk nup aŋgak kun ak rek, ma yimb aŋgak.
Kun ak enjol gok yerip rek mindpay? Kiyk Gor nup woŋg giñemb gok mindyiŋg, biynimb nuk perper mindeniŋgambay aŋgiy niŋimb gok kuyip, kond mindpay.
Kun ak minim aŋgñey niŋbun ak, pisnep dinjun. Pen direp ma giniŋgambun ak, gos yesek gunap niŋiy, yesek kind okok amniŋgambun.
Enjol gok nep, low minim ak dand apiy, Mosis nup ñiyak ak pen; biynimb minim kun ak kirgiyak gok, yiwur yomb yimb diyak.
Kun ak chin Gor Ñinuk minim tep dand wip ak kirgiy, kim amjun rek ma ayniŋgamb. Ñinuk ak key, minim kun ak dand apek, biynimb niŋiy diyak gok, chinup minim niŋind yimb kun ak niŋnimimb aŋgiy, aŋgñirep giyak. Pen gos kiyk anep niŋiy ma aŋgyak; Gor kiy yip mindakniŋ, tap mageprek gunap giyiŋg, chinup aŋgñiyak. Gor gos nuk key niŋiy, Kawnan nuk ak yokek ap, biynimb gunap yip mindiy, key yimb geyak kunep niŋnuk. Kun ak mey, minim tep nuk ak, niŋind yimb aspay aŋgiy niŋnuk.
<range>
Pen Gor chinup di nuk yip jimñiy aysap minim apun ar ak, enjol gok biyomb koyoŋ rek, chin kayaŋ rek ma mindpun.
Minim ar kun ak, Baybol buk ak tikiy aŋgyak: “Gor. Nand biynimb gok kuyip gos niŋiy dipan. Nand rek ma mindpay; biynimb yikop ak pen, yenen kuyip kond mindrep gipan?
Nand genak, enjol gok biyomb rek mindeyak; biynimb gok tam okok rek mindeyak ak pen; miñiy biynimb gok kuyip gey, yimb mindek, tap maŋgiysek kond mindpay aŋgyak.” Minim kun aŋgiy tikyak ak niŋbun: miñiy tap gunap nep kond mindpun; ñin kisen ak apek, tap maŋgiysek kond mindeniŋgambun.
<range>
Gor Ñinuk Jiysis nup yokek ap mindek ñin ak nep, enjol gok, biynimb yomb rek mindeyak: nuk bi yikop rek mindek. Pen yiwur yomb diy kumek, Gor gek miñiy Biyomb mindakniŋ, yimb nup nep apay.
Gor nuk Biyomb tap okok maŋgiysek gay kond mindip ak, niŋrep gip ak mey, biynimb kuŋaynep di miñmon tep nuk ak ayniŋg, Ñinuk Krays nup yokek apiy, minim nup ak niŋiy, miker ar keykey dak rek, chinup di Nop yip jimñiy ayip.
Pen chinup dek, biynimb nuk mindpun ak, Bapiy chin nokom yimb. Chinup gek, nuk suŋ-tep mindip rek mindpun ak mey, mam ay aŋgniŋg nambiŋ ma dip; wisimb yapiy nep aŋgip.
Nuk Nop nup aŋgak: “Mam ay sikop kuyip, kesim nip ak diñiyiŋg, kamep aŋgyiŋg, yimb nip dand araniŋgayn aŋgak.”
Pen minim bap aŋgak: “Nup gos sek kond mindeniŋgayn; yip direp giniŋgamb aŋgak.” Pen bap aŋgak: “Gor ñapan yip aŋgak gok yip, mindpiyn biy aŋgak.”
Ñapan aŋgak kun gok, kiyk biynimb ak mey, nuk biynimb yimb bap ay apiy, bi biynimb gek kumbay anup ñaŋgjiwyokak.
Kun gek mey, biynimb kumniŋgambun aŋgiy pernep gos par ay mindeyak gok, perper mindeniŋgiy rek ayip.
Pen enjol gok direp giyn aŋgiy ma gak; Ebraham Gor nup gosimb niŋak rek niŋbun kiñiŋ ak, direp giyn aŋgiy kun gak.
Ar kun ak nep, Jiysis chin mindpun rek biyimb ay apiy, bi Nop nup simboŋgep tep chin ak mindiy, chin tap siy tap timey giy, Gor yip jimñiy mindonjun rek ma ayek, chinup di Nop yip jimñiy ayniŋg kumak.
Pen ap man ar biy mindiy, chinup miker yerip yerip gip ak, nup kunep gek mey; niŋrep gip rek, chinup simb niŋiy kond mindrep giniŋgamb.
Kun ak mam ay Gor niŋek tep gip gok. Jiysis bi Gor nup simboŋgep yomb yimb chin ak nup gosimb niŋyiŋg, Gor nup kisen gipun ak, nuk Bi yerip rek ak niŋrep ginjun.
Pen nimb gunap aŋgniŋgambim “Basind yes chin Mosis biyomb yimb; Jiysis bi yikop rek ayip aŋgniŋgambim.” Pen Jiysis nup gos kun ak rek ma niŋnimimb.
Gor Mosis nup, Ñinuk nup yimb dand ar biyoŋ aranak rek; ma gak. Bi korip gipay gok yimb dand aranbay ak pen; korip gipay gok tap yikop; yimb ma mindip. Kun ak rek, Jiysis Bi yimb sek, Mosis beŋ nup okok mindip.
Korip tap gok biynimb gaypay ak pen; Gor tap okok maŋgiysek alwol gayak.
Pen niŋind: Mosis Gor biynimb nuk namb ak woŋg giñirep giyiŋg, Gor chinup kisen giniŋgamb rek, minim tep gunap aŋgñak.
Pen Krays Gor Ñinuk yipund giy ak mey; chinup Gor kiñiŋ nuk mindpun gok, bi korip nop nimb rek, kond mindrep gip. Nup chiŋgiy nep mindon mey, andkind apek, biynimb nuk nep mindoniŋgambun.
Kun ak Gor Kawnan aŋgak rek niŋjun. Nuk aŋgak: “Ñin biy minim yip ak aŋgey niŋiy, niŋdinimimb.
Nasind napis sikop wosrey, simiy ñin jiwiy omiŋal miñmon nep namb okok mindey, kuyip tap mageprek gok giyiŋg, kond mindenik ak pen; minim yip ak ma niŋiy, gos kiyk keynep niŋiy gey amyiŋgip.
<range>
Kun gey, yip yiruk yimb gek aŋgnik, ‘Per minim yip ak ma niŋdiy kun gipay ak, yand yip mindiy, añiŋ ay mindrep giniŋgiy aŋgnik ak, ma diniŋgambay. Pisnep mer aspiyn aŋgak!”
<range>
Kun ak mam ay sikop. Gor minim ak kirgiy, gos nimb key niŋnimimb rek ayip ak, niŋrep ginimimb. Miñiy Gor minim niŋep ñin biy, namam nanay gok yip, minim tep ak minek minek aŋg amiy apiy giyiŋg, mindrep ginimimb. Mer ak, Gor nup minim ak kirgiy, gos yesek ar ak apek niŋdand amiy, apyap pikniŋgambun.
<range>
Pen Krays minim nind niŋiy aŋgñinik ak, niŋyiŋg nep mindiy mey, biynimb nuk yimb mindoniŋgambun.
Baybol buk ak tikiy aŋgyak: “Miñiy Gor minim nup ak niŋiy, yiruk ma niŋnimimb. Wosrey minim nup niŋiy diyokpik rek, ma ginimimb aŋgyak.”
Biynimb an Gor nup minim ak niŋiy, ma niŋjun aŋgyak? Mey Yisrel biynimb; Mosis Yijip nimb dand awak gok maŋgiysek.
Pen biynimb an simiy ñin jiwiy ñin jiwiy Gor minim ak ma niŋey, kuyip niŋek tep ma gak? Mey Yisrel biynimb; tap siy tap timey giy, miñmon nep namb okok taŋg taŋg, tokiy ay kumyak gok nep.
Gor biynimb minim kilis aŋgiy, ap yand yip ma mindeniŋgambay aŋgak gok an? Mey biynimb minim nup ma niŋniŋgambun aŋgyak gok nep.
Kun ak niŋbun: nup gosimb ma niŋiy, nup ma chiŋgyak rek, am nuk yip mindrep giniŋgiy rek ma ayak.
Pen chinup biynimb kisen dip gok, nund yip mindrep ginjun rek ma ayip aŋgiy, gos ak ma niŋjun. Pen minim tep nup niŋbun ak, niŋrep giyiŋg mindenjun. Mer ak, basind apis sikop minim nuk ak niŋiy, niŋind aŋgip aŋgiy pen, ma giyak rek giniŋgambun. Kiyk minim nup ma dey, minim kilis aŋgiy aŋgak, ‘Kuyip den, ap yand yip añiŋ ay mindeniŋgiy rek ma ayip aŋgak.’ Tap alwol gayak ñin ak, tip kuyip ak gayrep gak ak pen; minim nuk aŋgak gok, niŋind aŋgip aŋgiy nup ma diyak rek, kuyip kirgak.
<range>
<range>
Baybol buk ak tikiy aŋgyak, “Gor ñin onep kaŋgol ak, miñmon tap gok maŋgiysek gaydiy, ñin ar ak añiŋ ayin aŋgiy, yikop mindek aŋgyak.”
Pen minim kun ak nep tikiy aŋgyak, “Kiyk ap yand yip añiŋ ay, mindrep giniŋgiy rek ma ayip aŋgyak.”
Pen biynimb nind gok, gunap minim tep nup ak kirgiy, nup ma chiŋgeyak; biynimb kisenimb gok diniŋgayn aŋgak.
Kun ak biynimb minim nup niŋiy kirgiyak gok kumey, simiy kuŋaynep yinek, basind yes Depiyt Baybol buk minim aŋgambun ak tikiy aŋgak: “Ñin biy, Gor minim ak niŋyiŋg, yiruk ma niŋnimimb; aŋgnimuŋ rek nep niŋiy, ginimimb aŋgak.” Pen tip ak, “Ñin biy” aŋgak kun ak niŋbun: ñin nuk biynimb diniŋgamb ñin ak, mindep nep mindip.
Pen nimb aŋgniŋgambim, “Gor wosrey yip ker apiy, añiŋ ayrep giyiŋg mindeniŋgambim aŋgak ak, biyomb Josiwa basind apis sikop kuyip, dand miñmon Keynan amek, mindrep giyak ar ak, aŋgak aŋgniŋgambim.” Pen ñin kun ak nep ma aŋgak; am miñmon Keynan mindyakniŋ, minim kun ak tip aŋgak.
Kun ak chin nuk yip jimñiy mindiy, nuk yip añiŋ ay mindrep ginjun rek ayip.
Nup chiŋgiy, nuk yip añiŋ ay mindrep giniŋgambun aŋgip minim kun ak; tap kilrimey akaŋ, yerip yerip gon, Gor chinup diniŋgamb aŋgiy niŋbun gok kirgiy, nuk ñin onep kaŋgol ak tap gaydiy, minek ar ak, añiŋ ay yikop mindek rek mindoniŋgambun.
Kun ak añiŋ añiŋ ma ayjun; chinup kinjeŋ pisnep pindak rek, korip miŋgan amiy, nuk yip añiŋ ay mindrep ginjun. Mer ak; biynimb chin wosrey mindyiŋgipay gok, apyap pikyak rek ak giniŋgambun.
Yenen: Gor minim nuk aŋgek, kim mindeniŋgambun ak, baynat rek kind yimb. Namb chinup biyaŋ amiy, gos tep niŋbun akaŋ, gos timey niŋbun ak, di mis ayek niŋrep gipun.
Yerip yerip gipun gok, Gor niŋmindakniŋ gipun; kapkap weygiy ginjun rek ma ayip. Pen nuk nep chinup kor giy, yerer gipun minim ak, aŋgniŋakniŋ aŋgñiniŋgambun.
Kun ak Bi Gor nup simboŋgep yomb yimb chin ak, am Nop yip mindip rek, minim tep niŋiy dipun ak, dinep mindonjun.
Nuk ap lum ar biy mindyiŋgip rek, tap siy tap timey chinup lipiŋg dand amnimuŋ rek ayip gok sek, miker chinup yerip yerip gip gok sek nup kunep gak ak pen, nuk timey ma gak. Kun ak miker yerip yerip chinup gip ak niŋrep gip rek, chinup simb yimb niŋiy,
bi nambnimb chin tep yimb ak mindip. Kun ak Nop Biyomb jel gip ak nup pirikiy, ma kirginjun. Chinup simb niŋiy, Ñinuk nup yokek apiy kumak rek, mindip maŋ siŋak amiy, tap timey gipun gok aŋgyikon, chinup dep rek ayek, dinimuŋ.
Bi Gor nup simboŋgep gok maŋgiysek, bi yikop biynimb namb okok nimb ak pen, Gor kuyip dek woŋg nup ak giyiŋg, biynimb tap siy tap timey giy, meymey siypsiyp dap ñey, bind ar ak pikdaŋgiy, Gor nup simboŋg ñimbay. Woŋg kiyk bap pen, biynimb yikop Gor nup niŋey tep gek, tap gunap dap ñey pikñimbay.
Pen bi Gor nup simboŋgep kun gok, biynimb yimb gok mey, kiyk key kunep tap siy tap timey giy, Gor nup tap simboŋg ñimbay. Kun ak biynimb niŋrep ma gipay gok, apyap pikniŋg rek gey, kuyip simb niŋiy, minim sayn apay.
<range>
Kiyk key biyomb mindon aŋgiy, woŋg kun ak ma dipay; Gor Eron nup aŋgek giyiŋgip rek, kuyip aŋgek gipay.
Ar kun ak nep, Krays yand biyomb mindiy, biynimb gok kuyip diyn aŋgiy ma aŋgak; Nop nep aŋgek, chinup nen Nop nup aŋgniŋ mindip. Nup aŋgak: “Miñiy yand nip Ñiyand; nand yip Nap nak aŋgak.”
Pen Ñinuk nup minim bap aŋgak: “Nip aspiyn: nand bi yip simboŋgep Melkiysadek rek ak, perper mindeniŋgamban aŋgak.”
Pen Jiysis man ar biy mindiy, nup ñaŋgniŋg geyak, Nop nup siy aŋgyiŋg, meŋg miŋgan dand araniy aŋgak, “Yip kond mindenimin. Pen kun kun ginimin ma aŋgniŋgayn; nand Biyomb ak, key niŋban rek yip ginimin aŋgak.” Kun aŋgek, nup kond mindakniŋ, kumiy tip ak tikjakak.
Nuk Biyomb, Gor Ñinuk yimb ak pen; chinup gip rek nep nup gak. Nop aŋgak rek giyiŋg, miker yomb ak dak.
Nop minim aŋgek, maŋgiysek gak ak mey; bi suŋ-tep biynimb minim nup niŋiy dipay gok, di Nop yip jimñiy ayek, perper mindeniŋgambay.
Pen ar kun ak nep, Nop aŋgak, “Nand bi yip simboŋgep Melkiysadek rek ak mindeniŋgamban aŋgak.”
Minim tiksipiyn kun biy rek, kuŋay mindip ak pen; kasek ma niŋbim ak, aŋgen kosyam niŋnimimb rek ayek kirpiyn.
Nimbip per aŋgñimbun ak niŋrep giy, biynimb gunap kuyip aŋgñimbikip ak pen; kasek ma niŋiy, minim nind niŋep gok, nimbip tip aŋgñemb rek ayip. Miñiy tap kilis ñiŋnimimb rek ak pen; tiy ñimb nep mindpim.
Ñapan ŋaŋ tiy ñimbnep mindpay gok; miñ ar ak tep, miñ ar ak timey aŋgiy, ma niŋrep gipay.
Pen biynimb gos sek gok gi dand amiy, ar ak gep, ar ak ma gep aŋgiy, niŋrep gipay.
